['EQRx believes responsibility can be revolutionary. Want to make a difference while advancing your career? Come join a team that is working towards our bold mission of developing innovative medicines at radically low prices to help people get the medicines they need.', '', 'You will build tools and processes for the ingestion and storage of data for a modern, data-driven and digital-native life sciences company, from drug and molecule development, to the clinic and patient data, to drug pricing and management, integrating across numerous data types and modalities. The Data Engineer will construct data infrastructure to support data science, analytics, and visualization uniting data across disparate sources and scales, from small ad hoc datasets to million+ patient claims and EHR datasets.', 'You have 5+ years of data engineering experience in industry or equivalent.You have experience working in health care, life sciences, and/or with scientific data.You are fluent in SQL and scripting languages.You intuitively think of how to organize, normalize, and store complex data, enabling both ETL and end users.You have a curious mind, constantly looking into novel approaches for the organization of complex life scientific data, e.g. FHIR for clinical data.You thrive on mapping and designing ingestion and transformation of data from multiple sources, creating a cohesive data asset.You are an expert in modern cloud data warehousing tools (e.g. BigQuery, Snowflake) and ETL tools (e.g. Stitch, Fivetran, DBT).You are an excellent communicator, empathetic with end users and internal customers.\xa0', 'You are fluent in SQL and scripting languages.', 'This role will help build a novel model of life sciences company, where data is stored and integrated across functions, informing every process from the beginning. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines by bringing a digital and data native technology stack to drug development. You will connect and integrate data sources that map the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs to patients and empower experts to explore them.\xa0You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a modern, and radically new paradigm in drug development, bringing cheaper and more accessible medicines to the market.', 'You intuitively think of how to organize, normalize, and store complex data, enabling both ETL and end users.', 'You are an expert in modern cloud data warehousing tools (e.g. BigQuery, Snowflake) and ETL tools (e.g. Stitch, Fivetran, DBT).', "The Impact You'll Have", 'You will map across different clinical data systems and ontologies to build common reference datasets. You will design and build consistent, reproducible, and testable ETL pipelines to ingest, normalize, and store data from large healthcare datasets, from clinical trials, to claims, and EHRs. You will also support the scaling, versioning, and usage of data science and machine learning to produce insights form data.', "What You'll Do", 'You have 5+ years of data engineering experience in industry or equivalent.', 'You have a curious mind, constantly looking into novel approaches for the organization of complex life scientific data, e.g. FHIR for clinical data.', 'You thrive on mapping and designing ingestion and transformation of data from multiple sources, creating a cohesive data asset.', '\xa0', 'Your Superpowers', 'You are an excellent communicator, empathetic with end users and internal customers.\xa0', 'You have experience working in health care, life sciences, and/or with scientific data.']

['', 'At Nyla, we talk about employee investment, not employee costs—a small way we outwardly provide our great people with benefits that cover your overall well-being.\xa0Nyla offers group benefits, 100% paid by Nyla, that include CareFirst medical, dental, and vision coverage. To support your personal goals for overall well-being and health, we provide a healthy living and fitness benefit of up to $500.00 per anniversary year. We believe that an ongoing investment in your professional learning and development is a cornerstone to our success, so we go all-in and provide up to $5,000 per anniversary year to support your growth.\xa0Tuition assistance of up to $5,250 per year. We want to protect you and your future—Nyla provides, at no cost to you, short-term and long-term disability, and life insurance. And, to augment your finances beyond today’s salary, Nyla offers up to 10% employer contribution/match in our retirement plan. Lastly, we understand the importance of recharging and replenishing yourself, so we provide new employees with 4 weeks of Paid Annual Leave and 10 holidays, plus each year you are with the company, you get an extra day off.', 'US Citizen', 'Nyla’s culture is built on the understanding that together, with our collective energy, talent, and fierce determination, we never stop believing and building the impossible. We are life-long learners, ever-curious, and not afraid to dream. To learn more about Nyla’s culture and exceptionalism, check out our Culture Deck here.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer--but we are more than that – We are open-minded, and care only about your capability, your drive, and your desire and determination to contribute your gifts and talents fully.', 'Nyla is seeking a Software Engineer that develops, maintains, and enhances complex and diverse software systems (e.g., processing-intensive analytics, novel algorithm development, manipulation of extremely large data sets, real-time systems, and business management information systems) based upon documented requirements. Works individually or as part of a team. Reviews and tests software components for adherence to the design requirements and documents test results. Resolves software problem reports. Utilizes software development and software design methodologies appropriate to the development environment. Provides specific input to the software components of system design to include hardware/software trade-offs, software reuse, use of Commercial Off-the-shelf (COTS)/Government Off-the-shelf (GOTS) in place of new development, and requirements analysis and synthesis from system level to individual software components.', 'TS/SCI with poly', 'Provide recommendations for improving documentation and software development process standards', 'Team Nyla shows up every day with the intention to be awesome—proactively work to accurately interpret and fully understand our client’s challenges and add your value to solving those challenges. Knowing the mission, context, and end-users is how we deliver optimal, creative, and innovative technological solutions. We design our systems with precision, logic, and adaptability, solving the technical and engineering needs of today with an eye on scaling for tomorrow. We endeavor to meet the highest standards of personal conduct and act as a trusted-provider for our clients--this is how we develop and maintain our enduring relationships with\xa0customers and business partners.\xa0', 'Nyla Technology Solutions is a women-owned small business with a bold approach and forward-thinking vision. Headquartered in the heart of Baltimore, Nyla delivers exceptional software systems engineering services for the U.S. Government. Our customers like how we tackle their toughest problems., and so Nyla is adding people who have a passion for doing fun, impactful work. If you are a person who welcomes opportunities to apply your skills in new ways, Nyla has challenges for you. We seek out people with agile, diverse mindsets who are looking for a place to grow—professionally and personally. We create opportunities for you to share your knowledge and experience with the Team, and learn from others via training, mentoring, and movement across the many contracts Nyla supports. Nyla endeavors to give back to our community—lending our energy and talents to support local area organizations helping people in need. At Nyla, you will have a place to grow, get, and give where you are passionate.', 'Analyze user requirements to derive software design and performance requirements', 'uniquely Nyla', 'We are pursuing five (5) individual(s) for the position of Software Engineer.\xa0Below is the position overview, the experience needs, and technical qualifications.\xa0If the position sounds like a good fit, and you have a track record of delivering solid technical results and developing trusted customer relationships, please consider the following opportunity:', 'Debug existing software and correct defects', 'Progress Through Our People', 'Design and code new software or modify existing software to add new features', 'How We Show Up Every Day', 'here.', "Experience as a SWE in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity is required. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline from an accredited college or university is required", 'here', 'We Have the Total Package | Healthy Lifestyle, Learning, Health and Wellness, Financial Wellness, Financial Protection', 'We Have the Total Package | Healthy Lifestyle, Learning, Health and Wellness, Financial Wellness, Financial Protection\xa0', 'Software Engineer.', '\xa0To learn more about our exceptional benefits packages click here.', '\xa0', 'We Have the Total Package | Healthy Lifestyle, Learning, Health and Wellness, Financial Wellness, Financial Protection\xa0From the start, Nyla is different. We never embraced the idea of a workplace and policies stuck in the industrial age--we treat our employees valued contributors, not commodities.\xa0At Nyla, we strive to understand the needs of our workforce and are committed to continuously evolving practices and policies, making adjustments that meaningfully address the changing needs and desires of our workforce.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Clearance Requirement: TS/SCI with poly', 'If you have the unique experience and expertise we are seeking, along with the desire and determination to invest your time and energy as a part of Nyla’s Team, we will provide you with a first-class compensation package along with our uniquely Nyla benefits.', 'Integrate existing software into new or modified systems or operating environments', "Experience as a SWE in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity is required. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline from an accredited college or university is requiredAnalyze user requirements to derive software design and performance requirementsDebug existing software and correct defectsProvide recommendations for improving documentation and software development process standardsDesign and code new software or modify existing software to add new featuresIntegrate existing software into new or modified systems or operating environmentsAnalyze user requirements to derive software design and performance requirementsDebug existing software and correct defectsProvide recommendations for improving documentation and software development process standardsDesign and code new software or modify existing software to add new featuresIntegrate existing software into new or modified systems or operating environmentsClearance Requirement: TS/SCI with polyUS Citizen", 'investment,']

job_title: Principal Data Scientist - eCommerce Modeling - Visa Predictive Models
job_text: ['', ' Master’s Degree in a quantitative field, such as Statistics, Mathematics, Operational Research, Computer Science, Economics, or Engineering 6+ years of working experience in a predictive modeling, data analysis or data visualization function', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Attention to details and problem-solving skills', ' Strong communication skills to work with internal and external clients', ' Master’s Degree in a quantitative field, such as Statistics, Mathematics, Operational Research, Computer Science, Economics, or Engineering', ' Proven ability of handling multi-tasks in a dynamic environment', ' 6+ years of working experience in a predictive modeling, data analysis or data visualization function', ' Develop business requirements and appropriate statistical analysis/prototypes to meet critical business needs', ' Candidates with a PhD in a quantitative field, such as Statistics, Mathematics, Operational Research, Computer Science, Economics, or Engineering preferred', ' Perform model validation for newly developed eCommerce models, generate performance analysis, interpret and present validation and model governance results to non-technical audience.', 'Company Description', "You're", ' Support sales and marketing efforts with sound statistical and financial analysis; job_title: Lead Data Engineer- Data Platform (Open to Remote Workers)
job_text: ['', 'Medidata: Conquering Diseases Together ', ' Leveraging semantic data modeling frameworks like RDF, OWL, and SHACL ', ' Identify meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', ' Applying machine learning algorithms to large data sets ', ' Provide technology leadership to a diverse engineering team ', ' Design and program event-driven streaming, batch or micro batch data pipelines to integrate and analyze diverse sources of clinical trial data to generate actionable insights and product enhancements ', ' Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions, which include the use of relational, dimensional, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests ', 'Your Mission', ' Excellent technical documentation and writing skills ', ' Providing technology leadership to a team of engineers ', ' Provide technology leadership to a diverse engineering team  Design and program event-driven streaming, batch or micro batch data pipelines to integrate and analyze diverse sources of clinical trial data to generate actionable insights and product enhancements  Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions, which include the use of relational, dimensional, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests  Identify meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', 'Your Competencies', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field ', ' Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS) ', ' Coding in multiple languages like Python, Java, Scala, SQL, SPARQL in the context of data-oriented problems ', ' Using a panoply of database technologies, relational and non-relational, including Cassandra, DynamoDB, Athena, Elasticsearch, Redis, various triplestores, and the like ', ' Designing enterprise data models and data-oriented APIs ', ' Providing technology leadership to a team of engineers  Designing enterprise data models and data-oriented APIs  Leveraging semantic data modeling frameworks like RDF, OWL, and SHACL  Building ETL or analytical pipelines combining multiple streaming data technologies including Kafka, Flink, Spark, S3, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Serverless or similar  Using a panoply of database technologies, relational and non-relational, including Cassandra, DynamoDB, Athena, Elasticsearch, Redis, various triplestores, and the like  Coding in multiple languages like Python, Java, Scala, SQL, SPARQL in the context of data-oriented problems  Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS)  Excellent technical documentation and writing skills  You have a bias towards automation, an Agile/Lean mindset and embrace the Devops culture  Applying machine learning algorithms to large data sets ', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field  Minimum 5 years of experience working in data engineering and or data science ', ' Medidata Solutions, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Medidata Solutions provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by the law. Medidata Solutions complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.', ' Minimum 5 years of experience working in data engineering and or data science ', ' You have a bias towards automation, an Agile/Lean mindset and embrace the Devops culture ', 'Your Education & Experience', ' Building ETL or analytical pipelines combining multiple streaming data technologies including Kafka, Flink, Spark, S3, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Serverless or similar ']

['', 'About Algorex Health', 'Algorex Health data engineers are tasked with a cross-section of responsibilities including programming, architecting and implementing cloud infrastructure, data-modelling, designing and implementing data pipelines, and even data analysis and model development.\xa0Algorex Health data engineers will work with the following technologies:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Docker', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Amazon Web Services (EC2, VPC, Cognito, S3, Route53)', 'directly', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with Program Design, Data Science, and Product teams to understand existing and new business needs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0General proficiency with Python (preferred), or any of Go, or Java', 'What you will do', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Implement strong security guarantees on data both at rest and in transit, with an eye toward compliance and ease-of-use', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge of Unix and Posix toolsets', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0SQL', 'What we’re looking for', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An eagerness to understand data at all levels of abstraction', 'Alternate names: Senior Engineer', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Commitment to understanding the healthcare industry and related data, including data security needs\xa0', 'Algorex Health is currently hiring. If you think that Algorex Health might be the company for you, feel free to send a resume and cover letter\xa0directly\xa0to\xa0recruiting@algorexhealth.com', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Program in Python to drive our pipeline from data ingestion through running performant models (balancing resources like CPU/memory/disk)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Willingness and capacity to independently learn new software engineering, data science and infrastructure skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Linux (Bash scripting, sed, awk, Make, cron, etc.)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Elixir (a growing product is implemented in Elixir using Phoenix LiveView and Postgres)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0High autonomy on technical projects with multiple stakeholders', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Architecture, both from a Software perspective to a Cloud Infrastructure perspective (modelling networks in Amazon VPC to deciding boundaries of batch and server software components)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with multiple programming languages across multiple paradigms (functional, logical, imperative, etc.)', '\xa0Algorex Health moves fast to deliver value to our clients and needs to process many types of health care data including rosters, claims files, and census geo-data (shapefiles).\xa0As such, a data engineer needs to be able to program at all levels of abstraction, from troubleshooting SSH connections, to hex-analyzing data files for corrupt data, to developing CloudFormation and Ansible scripts for re-usable server infrastructure, to writing libraries to geocode and geojoin geographic entities, to designing data models for new and to-de-developed machine learning models.\xa0Algorex Health is still a growing company and responsibilities are shared between client-focused teams requiring analysis and visualization and “back-end” work that supports the entire company.\xa0A background in statistics and data science is a strong plus, and growth back and forth between the engineering and data science teams is expected and encouraged.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04 to 8 years working experience in engineering and/or analytics/data science or related master’s degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge of software engineering practices (from source control, to QA, to continuous integration)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Python (from data cleansing pipelines to productionalizing Pandas and SciPy models to contributing to data science notebooks)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Sqlite and Postgres (strong SQL skills up to and including analytic windowing functions and spatial queries)', 'Senior Data Engineer Job Description', '\xa0', 'Technical Requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to clearly and confidently communicate engineering choices to a non-technical audience', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Research and integrate new data sources into the ML pipeline', 'Algorex Health is a data science- and advanced analytics- as-a-service company. The company enables value-based care organizations to make the most from data and health IT through a combination of open technology, pre-licensed data sets, and purpose-built algorithms. We enable organizations to deploy big-technology consumer marketing strategies across all elements of their business.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud Infrastructure', 'Only applicants who submit a cover letter and resume will be considered.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist the Data Science team in building, testing, and validating machine learning models using a disparate set of healthcare and consumer data sources', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A bias towards action in tackling new and unsolved problems (from networking, data, programming and troubleshooting)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design relational data models (understanding of trade-offs of the different normal forms)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Write and tune SQL queries both on Sqlite and Postgres (understanding of benefits and trade-offs of indexing and low-level storage strategies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong communication skills to diagram and document engineering choices to build the foundation for a larger team', 'The Position']

['', 'Build and manage machine learning systems and applications', 'At ClassPass we value people who are intellectually curious, who are pragmatic not dogmatic, and people who care about our product, their teammates, and their own personal growth. We are faced with an interesting set of technical challenges and we believe in giving our engineers the autonomy to go and solve them. Much of our team come from non-traditional computing backgrounds; we know that by bringing together a diverse set of voices we’ll be able to build a better product, and a better company. We care less about what languages or frameworks you know, and care more that you are excited to produce high-quality code and be constantly learning. Our engineers work in cross-functional teams that are focused on impact, and movement between teams is encouraged. We work very closely with our brilliant product team to deliver a world class user experience, and ultimately to empower our users to live their fullest, healthiest lives.', 'ClassPass is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We highly value diversity at our company and encourage people of all different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives to apply. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or other protected characteristics.', 'Experience in machine learning, data engineering, deep learning, search, natural language processing, data science, or computer vision', 'ClassPass is looking for senior and mid level Machine Learning Software Engineers. Our engineers are the brains behind some of the fitness industry’s biggest breakthroughs. These teams are constantly innovating and striving to create a better product for our users and drive more revenue to our studio partners.', 'Seek different perspectives, and solicit honest feedback', 'Write clear and concise technical design documents and gather feedback from your team and the broader engineering organization', 'Proficiency with Java, Kotlin, or Python', 'Collaborate closely with Product and Data Science teams to iterate on the design, implementation and deployment of data productsBuild and manage machine learning systems and applicationsUnderstand reliability and performance, and proactively find and address issues to build software at scaleWrite clear and concise technical design documents and gather feedback from your team and the broader engineering organizationProvide leadership and mentorship for junior engineers through code reviews and technical discussionsSeek different perspectives, and solicit honest feedbackTake delight in delighting our usersCare about our studio partners and want to help them grow their business', 'Understand reliability and performance, and proactively find and address issues to build software at scale', 'Strong analytical and problem solving skills', 'At ClassPass, we believe in the power of movement. But we believe in more than just that. We believe in building for the future, creating more opportunities for everyone around the world to live fully and in good health. We believe that we can always push ourselves and our company to be better, and that there is power in the hard things when we’re all working together toward the same goal. We believe in building a diverse company where a sense of belonging is felt by employees, customers and partners alike. And we believe that the secret to ClassPass’ success is its people.', "You enjoy both sides of machine learning: building robust ML infrastructure to make our data scientists' jobs easier as well as diving into the details of ML models directly. You know the best software is created through collaboration and iteration and you’re looking for the right opportunity, and the right team, to expand your experience. You seek feedback because it has the ability to turn good work into great work. You like to ship software early and often, you value simplicity and strive to eliminate unnecessary complexity.", 'Collaborate closely with Product and Data Science teams to iterate on the design, implementation and deployment of data products', 'Experience with some standard machine learning tools: Spark, Flink, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Theano, HDFS, Hive, or Athena', 'ClassPass is revolutionizing the fitness and wellness industry by bringing together the world’s best classes and experiences into one app. Founded in 2013 by Payal Kadakia, ClassPass connects members to millions of classes in 30 countries around the globe, and is now available as a wellness benefit with some of the world’s leading employers. We make it easy to prioritize your health, whether you decide to head to a local studio, play an on-demand workout or book yourself a much needed wellness appointment. Over 100 million reservations later, we truly believe that we’re just getting started.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Care about our studio partners and want to help them grow their business', 'Nice to Have', 'Provide leadership and mentorship for junior engineers through code reviews and technical discussions', 'Skills & Experience', 'About The Right Team Member', 'What We Believe', 'Understand reliability and microservice monitoring best practices', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Experience with some standard machine learning tools: Spark, Flink, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Theano, HDFS, Hive, or AthenaUnderstand reliability and microservice monitoring best practices', 'Proficiency with Java, Kotlin, or PythonExperience in machine learning, data engineering, deep learning, search, natural language processing, data science, or computer visionStrong analytical and problem solving skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Who We Are', 'Take delight in delighting our users']

job_title: Junior Software Engineer, Systems and Operations
job_text: ['', 'You like making people work better. If you’re the kind of person that gets satisfaction about building a tool that makes everyone’s life at work just a little better every day, you will love this job.', 'Design sensibility - we pride ourselves on building an intuitive product. We want our employees’ experience with their internal tools to be the same.', 'Your job is to write software that makes the company work well at scale. Make our systems work efficiently and reliably.', 'Example projects might include building components to visualize geographic data in Salesforce, or integrating and synchronizing our financial, sales, and fulfillment system databases.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent field, from a top program preferred.1-3 years’ professional experience, with at least 1 year of software development or engineering experience. (Or college project equivalent)Good software engineering fundamentals. Understand the different types of data structures and know when to apply them.You like making people work better. If you’re the kind of person that gets satisfaction about building a tool that makes everyone’s life at work just a little better every day, you will love this job.Design sensibility - we pride ourselves on building an intuitive product. We want our employees’ experience with their internal tools to be the same.Process and operational thinking - you can tackle a problem independently and quickly iterate to a solution, and then also document it in a way that’s easy to understand for all audiences (especially non-technical ones!).Good communication skills - be able to effectively work with stakeholders and senior engineers on creating project specifications, designing systems, and executing implementation plans.', 'Process and operational thinking - you can tackle a problem independently and quickly iterate to a solution, and then also document it in a way that’s easy to understand for all audiences (especially non-technical ones!).', 'Responsibilities', 'Requirements', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent field, from a top program preferred.', '1-3 years’ professional experience, with at least 1 year of software development or engineering experience. (Or college project equivalent)', 'Learn new languages and frameworks quickly. We don’t expect you’ll have written Apex code, for example, but you should be able to pick it up quickly.', 'Good communication skills - be able to effectively work with stakeholders and senior engineers on creating project specifications, designing systems, and executing implementation plans.', 'Your job is to write software that makes the company work well at scale. Make our systems work efficiently and reliably.Learn new languages and frameworks quickly. We don’t expect you’ll have written Apex code, for example, but you should be able to pick it up quickly.Example projects might include building components to visualize geographic data in Salesforce, or integrating and synchronizing our financial, sales, and fulfillment system databases.You should be comfortable learning new systems and APIs quickly, e.g., Salesforce Apex, and be comfortable with basic web technologies like HTML, JavaScript, restful APIs, and so forth. ', 'You should be comfortable learning new systems and APIs quickly, e.g., Salesforce Apex, and be comfortable with basic web technologies like HTML, JavaScript, restful APIs, and so forth. ', 'Good software engineering fundamentals. Understand the different types of data structures and know when to apply them.']

You have professional experience working on a team turning ideas into reliable, maintainable code. We believe in using a small number of well-known tools like AWS, Python, Javascript, MySQL, and Linux. We are looking for engineers that value simplicity, pragmatism, have a bias towards action, and are passionate about building products that bring real value to our customers. Software Engineers at Blink are responsible for building our world class products. Your job is to take ownership over one of our hardest problems, envision and refine strategic solutions, and drive execution like an entrepreneur. You will collaborate closely with a talented, cross-functional team designers, product managers, data scientists, marketers, and operators. Through these partnerships, you’ll grow our business, build our core platform, and - above all - make sure that our customers have access to the least expensive and highest satisfaction pharmacy experience on earth. ["Be a part of the ConsultNet difference. As a leading national provider of IT staffing and solutions, ConsultNet delivers exceptional services to startup, midmarket and Fortune 1000 companies across North America. Since 1996, we've partnered with clients to create rewarding opportunities for our consultants, successfully building teams that have surefire results. In the past two years alone, we have placed more than 1,500 consultants in contract, contract-to-hire, or direct placement opportunities. We understand communication is key to finding the right job that matches your skills and career goals. For us, it's not just the work that we do; it's how we do the work. Our breadth of offerings extends to multiple IT positions in major markets throughout the country, see more at www.consultnet.com"]

['', 'Experience with network-based machine learning algorithms is preferred, as well as traditional machine learning techniques, and statistical methods', 'Experience with analyzing biological data is preferred, and passionate to learn about application of AI algorithms in biology and biological datasets', 'Making an impact on the world with every line of code', 'We are looking for an exceptional data scientist to join our team. We have a fast-paced, high-performance, and result-oriented culture. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', 'Why you should join ReviveMed', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginning', 'Required Qualifications', 'Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients', 'Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data form small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data, and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver. We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', 'Ph.D. or M.S. in Computer Science, Statistics, bioinformatics, or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience,\xa0but we will consider strong candidates with less experience', 'The Role', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, and passionate about discovering the right therapeutics for the right patientsPh.D. or M.S. in Computer Science, Statistics, bioinformatics, or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience,\xa0but we will consider strong candidates with less experienceProven programming skills: We use Python along with shell scripts, R, SQL, and other programming languages as neededDemonstrated knowledge about one or more areas of machine-learning and analysis of large datasetsExperience with network-based machine learning algorithms is preferred, as well as traditional machine learning techniques, and statistical methodsExperience with analyzing biological data is preferred, and passionate to learn about application of AI algorithms in biology and biological datasetsStrong analytical, oral, and writing skills', 'Proven programming skills: We use Python along with shell scripts, R, SQL, and other programming languages as needed', 'Demonstrated knowledge about one or more areas of machine-learning and analysis of large datasets', 'Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands', '\xa0', 'Strong analytical, oral, and writing skills', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, and passionate about discovering the right therapeutics for the right patients', '\xa0Why you should join ReviveMed', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginningInvolvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clientsOpportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expandsCompetitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share optionsMaking an impact on the world with every line of code']

['', "  Minimum 7 years of industry experience as a Data Engineer or related specialty with demonstrable track record in developing data solutions that are correct, stable, and high performing; provide business value; and use resources efficiently (e.g. system hardware, data storage, query optimization, cloud infrastructure, etc.).  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience.", 'Lead Data Engineer', ' Be a self-starter, with the ability to learn new technologies and work independently -- an ideal candidate is curious and always willing to implement the latest and greatest technologies.', ' Adhere to timelines and excel in a fast-paced, high-energy environment.', ' Coding proficiency in one or more languages (e.g. Python, Scala, Ruby, Java), expertise in SQL (e.g. MS SQL, T-SQL, PostgreSQL, SPARQL), and familiarity with one or more schema definition languages (e.g. DDL, SDL, etc.).', ' Business Acumen and understanding of basic data flow and processes in a manufacturing business. ', "  Create and build robust data structures to support end user's analysis and decision making across multiple business verticals. This includes both end-to-end architecting and business solutioning.   Collaborate with end users and peers to understand requirements, formulate use cases, and then translate into an effective technical solution.  Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products.  Effectively communicate and interact with business and technical personnel in solving complex data related business and technical problems. ['', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'About Us:', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'Our Team:', 'About You:', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'What We Look For:', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users']

["We're looking for a software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. They're working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay active.Our companies look for software engineers proficient in Python or Java. The ideal candidate is motivated by working on complex technical problems and curious about the world around them. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.To apply to the network, we'll ask you to fill out a 60-second web form. It's absolutely free.If accepted, you'll hear directly from founders, hiring managers, and other key decision makers starting the following Monday. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer. To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.--- ", 'Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.']

['', 'Experience developing and deploying production software.', 'A history of solving hard problems with creative solutions.', 'Work well on a small team ', 'Self-manage development backlog ', 'Ability to communicate technical concepts to teammates and non-technical colleagues.', 'Desire to write testable code, and the test coverage to go along with it.', 'Design and building solutions to business problems ', 'Design and building solutions to business problems Work well on a small team Self-manage development backlog Write testable, efficient code Believe strongly in QA and scalability Collaborate with third party technology providers', 'Strong problem-solving skills paired with experience in programming, such as Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, Go, etc. (Experience in a specific language is not required, but will be expected to learn new languages quickly).', ' Required:A Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Engineering, Management Information Systems or related field.Strong problem-solving skills paired with experience in programming, such as Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, Go, etc. (Experience in a specific language is not required, but will be expected to learn new languages quickly).Experience using source control management (git) to collaboratively build software: branching, merging, code reviews.Ability to communicate technical concepts to teammates and non-technical colleagues.PreferredExperience developing and deploying production software.A history of solving hard problems with creative solutions.Experience with Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services, or Google Cloud Platform.Desire to write testable code, and the test coverage to go along with it.Solid Understanding of CI/CD and DevOps philosophies.About UsWe produce globally recognized brands and we grow the best business leaders in the industry. With a portfolio of trusted brands as diverse as ours, it is paramount our leaders are able to lead with courage the vast array of brands, categories and functions. We serve consumers around the world with one of the strongest portfolios of trusted, quality, leadership brands, including Always®, Ariel®, Gillette®, Head & Shoulders®, Herbal Essences®, Oral-B®, Pampers®, Pantene®, Tampax® and more. Our community includes operations in approximately 70 countries worldwide.Visit http://www.pg.com to know more.Our consumers are diverse and our talents - internally - mirror this diversity to best serve it. That is why we’re committed to building a winning culture based on Inclusion and our ideal candidate is passionate about the same principle: you will join our daily effort of being “in touch” so we craft brands and products to improve the lives of the world’s consumers now and in the future. We want you to inspire us with your unrivaled ideas.All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, age, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, marital status, citizenship, HIV/AIDS status or any other legally protected factor.', 'Experience using source control management (git) to collaboratively build software: branching, merging, code reviews.', 'Believe strongly in QA and scalability ', 'Description', 'Preferred', 'About Us', 'Qualifications', 'Key Responsibilities Will Include', 'Solid Understanding of CI/CD and DevOps philosophies.', 'A Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Engineering, Management Information Systems or related field.', 'Experience with Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services, or Google Cloud Platform.', 'Write testable, efficient code ', 'Collaborate with third party technology providers']

job_text: ['', 'Spot the most relevant partners, most promising integrations, best agencies for our reseller program, and the biggest opportunities for our co-marketing campaigns through data insights.', 'You like taking on big challenges—given the appropriate time and resources.\xa0', "You've worked in a company that's committed to fast growth.", "You're proficient with Looker.You've got experience with qualitative research (e.g. interviews, surveys).You've got extended experience working in the SaaS industry.You've worked in a company that's committed to fast growth.You've got working knowledge of Big Data technologies (e.g. Spark).", 'About You', "You've got extended experience working in the SaaS industry.", 'Continuously improve our data structure.\xa0Define benchmarks, goals, and KPIs and develop dashboards to visualize them.', "You're autonomous and scrappy: you strive to learn\xa0and enjoy wearing different hats to do the job.\xa0You have a great drive to push projects forward.", 'At Typeform, the Data team is making data our #1 asset. And we know how important that is— our product helps people collect information in the best way possible, by making it conversational.\xa0\xa0', 'Communicate results and insights from your analyses to our top stakeholders, including our Leadership Team.', "It'd be amazing if:", "You're empathic, enthusiastic, and collaborative.\xa0", "This role will be the first Data Team member based in San Francisco and will require strong analytical and data visualization skills, together with the ability to prioritize the most relevant initiatives based on their impact,\xa0and a natural drive to influence the Business Development team's roadmap through an outcome-oriented mindset.", "You've got 4+ years of experience as a data scientist.", 'About the Team', "You've got working knowledge of Big Data technologies (e.g. Spark).", 'Here’s what you’ll do:\xa0', 'You are proficient in programming (Python/R is a must) and building queries with SQL.', 'The most important interaction on the web is the exchange of information between a brand and its audience. And that exchange usually happens through online forms. We believe that even a utility like online forms should be remarkable. Our customers say they get more answers from their audience and even the occasional compliment. Make every interaction count.', 'Here’s what we’re after:\xa0', 'Senior Data Scientist to work with our Business Development team', "You're proficient with Looker.", 'You will be based in San Francisco and will work across all Business Development areas: Partnerships, Sales, and Reseller, as well as with the newly created Integrations team.\xa0', 'Liaise and build relationships with the most relevant stakeholders in other teams (e.g. Marketing, Product, CS).', 'You enjoy helping others grow through constant feedback and mentorship.', 'Typeform is a team of over 200 people representing over 30 countries. We have offices in Barcelona, Spain and in San Francisco, United States.\xa0', "You're fluent in English and eager to work in a multicultural, international environment.", '\xa0', "You've got experience with statistical modeling/applied machine learning with a focus on business development, revenue growth, sales, and/or marketing.\xa0", "You're a great communicator. You can take a complex concept and make it sound simple, using clear visual references to help.\xa0", "That’s why we need you. We are\xa0looking for a\xa0Senior Data Scientist to work with our Business Development team\xa0in a mission to empower data-driven decision making by analyzing, segmenting, and predicting existing customers and future prospects' behavior.\xa0", 'Founded circa 2012 in Barcelona, Typeform was founded by two designers: David Okuniev and Robert Muñoz. Their mission? Make online forms a little more human. Today, Typeform works on the future of online forms. Powering your brand’s interactions with beautifully designed, professional-looking online forms that people just love. Create forms, surveys, quizzes (and so much more) to grow your audience, improve just about anything, and validate (or invalidate) your best ideas.', "Segment our prospects and leverage machine learning solutions to identify Typeforms's best leads and optimise our sales efforts.\xa0Develop MVP machine learning models to predict customer behavior that will eventually get deployed by an ML Engineer/ ML Expert.", "You've got experience with qualitative research (e.g. interviews, surveys).", 'Continuously generate data-driven hypotheses and advocate on testing best practices, contributing to accelerating our testing cycles.', 'Mentor more junior members in the organization and help them grow professionally.', "You've got experience with data visualization tools (e.g. Looker, Tableau, Qlikview).", 'Collaborate, learn, share, and brainstorm with other data scientists.\xa0Continuously keep-up with our data best practices by ensuring communication with the rest of the Data Team based in Barcelona (Data Platform, Data Insights, Machine Learning).\xa0', "You've got 4+ years of experience as a data scientist.You are proficient in programming (Python/R is a must) and building queries with SQL.You have experience with A/B and Multivariate test design and implementation.You've got experience with data visualization tools (e.g. Looker, Tableau, Qlikview).You've got experience with statistical modeling/applied machine learning with a focus on business development, revenue growth, sales, and/or marketing.\xa0You're autonomous and scrappy: you strive to learn\xa0and enjoy wearing different hats to do the job.\xa0You have a great drive to push projects forward.You like taking on big challenges—given the appropriate time and resources.\xa0You value simple and effective solutions over complicated brain-melters.\xa0You're a great communicator. You can take a complex concept and make it sound simple, using clear visual references to help.\xa0You're empathic, enthusiastic, and collaborative.\xa0You enjoy helping others grow through constant feedback and mentorship.You're fluent in English and eager to work in a multicultural, international environment.", 'You value simple and effective solutions over complicated brain-melters.\xa0', 'You have experience with A/B and Multivariate test design and implementation.', 'About Typeform', "Spot the most relevant partners, most promising integrations, best agencies for our reseller program, and the biggest opportunities for our co-marketing campaigns through data insights.Segment our prospects and leverage machine learning solutions to identify Typeforms's best leads and optimise our sales efforts.\xa0Develop MVP machine learning models to predict customer behavior that will eventually get deployed by an ML Engineer/ ML Expert.Continuously generate data-driven hypotheses and advocate on testing best practices, contributing to accelerating our testing cycles.Continuously improve our data structure.\xa0Define benchmarks, goals, and KPIs and develop dashboards to visualize them.Communicate results and insights from your analyses to our top stakeholders, including our Leadership Team.Liaise and build relationships with the most relevant stakeholders in other teams (e.g. Marketing, Product, CS).Collaborate, learn, share, and brainstorm with other data scientists.\xa0Continuously keep-up with our data best practices by ensuring communication with the rest of the Data Team based in Barcelona (Data Platform, Data Insights, Machine Learning).\xa0Mentor more junior members in the organization and help them grow professionally.", 'About the Role']

job_title: Data Center Operations Engineer - remote USA
job_text: ['• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Design, perform and coordinate physical on-site installations of  hardware in racks, including PDUs, network equipment, servers and storge  devices, cable management etc. ', 'Your technical  skills and experience will enable to you to take on roles in designing,  managing and troubleshooting the critical devices used to provide the  foundation of our OneCloud Infrastructure and interact with colleagues  as well as with vendors and onsite datacenter staff globally. Your  organizational skills will contribute to managing activities such as  circuit cross connections within our datacenter locations, helping to  maintain inventories of parts needed in the locations and managing  operations and tasks that are happing simultaneously in multiple  facilities. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Help to design and implement physical devices within the global data center facilities. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Assist with management of data center and other provider portals (user account creation, access requests, etc.) ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to communicate in English in technical situations ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to liaise with the engineering teams, third party stakeholders and the wider business ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Assists teams and interfaces with NOC Team during crisis events ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Eye for detail ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Can do attitude', 'The role has a global remit and is based in North  America, with an expectation that there will be a significant focus on  the Americas region, but also a need to support out of hours operations  in Europe and Asia Pacific timezones. Some domestic and international  travel is likely needed around 25% of the time. Occasional visits to our  datacenters to perform on-site work will be needed, proximity to  Atlanta GA could be an advantage. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 An Analytical thinker with systematic and organized approach to project, ticket and inventory tracking ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Familiarity with Office Business applications such as Microsoft Office Suite, Skype for Business, Teams etc. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with tools used to maintain and monitor devices, such as Device42, Zabbix, iDrac, APC Management etc ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ensuring necessary consumables are on hand or ordered in a timely way ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Actively involved in break fix activities and coordination ', 'Professional / Technical Skills ', 'Key to Success ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to review and analyze sets of data, track and find patterns ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Design infrastructure  within datacenter facilities, including physical plant, power  consumption analysis and perform onsite or oversee work with remote  teams for installs ', 'Introduction ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Highly developed deductive reasoning skills with ability to troubleshoot & problem solve ', '\xa0 ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Good communication skills and experience of working in a a team to deliver complex projects with multiple moving parts ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Maintain and enhance systems to support tracking of activities with vendors and parts inventory ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 A self-starter - ability to capture and document key information that others might have missed ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Excellent organizational skills and ability to organize and track multiple ongoing projects simultaneously ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Interface with Datacenter service providers, telco providers and other  vendors to ensure timely completion of activities ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Maintains software licensing and support contracts ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Coordinating activities with datacenter and connectivity service  providers for circuit termination or equipment installations. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Experience in working with telco providers, datacenter providers and  understanding of telco and circuit terms and processes desired ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Follow established processes to identify and anticipate infrastructure or capacity issues across the datacenter estate ', 'Soft Skills ', 'Key Responsibilities ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Updates inventory management tools and ensures accuracy of those tools ', "As  an experienced Data Center Operations Engineer within the Datacenter  Operations team, you will be part of a key team which ensures  operational integrity of our global datacenters and network  infrastructure services in Europe, Asia, and the Americas. The  Datacenter Operations team works alongside other engineering teams,  managing and maintaining Arkadin's global datacenter facilities, which  provide accommodation for our network, compute and applications  infrastructure. You will work with a team of expert engineers and  architects responsible for the complete ownership of our global data  center infrastructure, with accountability for the design, deployment,  and operations of the devices within these facilities. This position  provides the opportunity to work with a small highly dynamic team,  working with colleagues globally, to provide the datacenter footprint  for our cutting-edge communication technologies. ", '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Manages shipments to and from data centers ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Supporting timely delivery of solutions for infrastructure aspects of customer/partner/supplier projects ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Orders data center cross connects ', ' ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Working alongside engineering teams to ensuring that the correct  processes, designs, and governance is applied in our datacenter-related  activities. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Attention to detail in maintaining inventory, tracking orders etc ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Help to evaluate new tools, and enhance current tools used for  monitoring and alerting on equipment used to support the core data  center infrastructure ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Maintains an appropriate inventory of spare consumables and network hardware ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Orders consumables (patch cables, optics) works with vendors on pricing, processing, and tracking orders ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Works with internal teams who manage devices within our datacenters for install, maintenance and decommission projects ']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Job Title : Data Center Engineer - Need locals', 'We have an immediate Openings with Our Direct Client for a Long term contract position', 'Best regards,', 'Duration:\xa012 Months', "We are looking for a detail-oriented Data Center Engineer to join the Client Data Center team to support and operate our Carrollton TX Data Center and Global Network Operations team. As a Data Center Engineer, you'll deploy and maintain Client’s Data Center Structured Cabling, Power, Server, Network and Storage Infrastructures. You’ll have the opportunity to collaborate amongst a team of engineers to resolve complex and challenging issues in a diverse production environment. You can expect to receive incidents and service requests as you track problems and change requests to completion. ['', 'Photon is a first-of-its-kind platform in the small satellite industry: a versatile satellite bus that is also an integral part of the Electron launch vehicle. ', 'Experience with software running in autonomous systems (satellites preferred, but other examples would include UAVs, self-driving cars, etc).', 'Direct experience writing satellite software.', 'Collaborate with systems engineers and embedded systems engineers in developing requirements and managing interfaces with hardware and software within the vehicle.Architect and develop application software for flight and ground systems.Develop documentation for operation and interface with software products.Develop and participate in test campaigns ranging from unit-level to automated testing at the subsystem and system-level.', 'Experience working with subcontractors and vendors.', 'The ideal Flight Software Engineer will have in-depth knowledge and experience with embedded systems, Linux, and network protocols.  Experience writting kalman filters and work with sensors are very applicable. ', 'Flight Software\xa0Engineer', 'An engineering degree in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering, or equivalent qualification.5-15 years of demonstrated applicable experience in both software development and program management.Software development in Linux and embedded environments, as well as C and C++.Experience with software running in autonomous systems (satellites preferred, but other examples would include UAVs, self-driving cars, etc).Experience with networked communications and/or distributed systems.Document management & systems engineering experience.Experience working with subcontractors and vendors.Demonstrated success working in a dynamic environment with multiple priorities.Demonstrated success meeting aggressive development schedules.', 'Direct experience writing satellite software.Knowledge of the radiation environment of space and its impact on software architecture.', 'To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, applicant must be a U.S. citizen as defined by ITAR (22 CFR §120.15) or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State.', 'Important Information', 'Rocket Lab USA is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment with Rocket Lab USA is governed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications and will not be influenced in any manner by race, color, religion, gender, national origin/ethnicity, veteran status, disability status, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, mental or physical disability or any other legally protected status.', 'Develop documentation for operation and interface with software products.', 'Document management & systems engineering experience.', 'Demonstrated success meeting aggressive development schedules.', '5-15 years of demonstrated applicable experience in both software development and program management.', 'Experience with networked communications and/or distributed systems.', 'Architect and develop application software for flight and ground systems.', 'Collaborate with systems engineers and embedded systems engineers in developing requirements and managing interfaces with hardware and software within the vehicle.', "Photon is being developed to enable a broad range of missions in low-Earth orbit and beyond. Photon was recently selected by NASA to deploy a CubeSat to the Moon in 2021 as a pathfinder for Gateway, the program to return humans to the lunar surface.  Launching 2023 Photon will release a small probe into Venus's atmosphere to search for evidence of life. ", 'Upcoming Photon Missions', 'Software development in Linux and embedded environments, as well as C and C++.', 'Duties & Responsibilities', 'Knowledge of the radiation environment of space and its impact on software architecture.', 'The Photon Program', 'Demonstrated success working in a dynamic environment with multiple priorities.', 'Required Skills & Experience', 'At Rocket Lab we believe the future will be defined and enabled by access to space. We’re making it easy to get there. We’re already the global leader in dedicated small satellite launch and now we’re also building satellites and space systems that enable exploration and innovation in low Earth orbit (LEO) and beyond.', 'About Rocket Lab', 'An engineering degree in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering, or equivalent qualification.', 'Preferred Skills & Experience', 'Develop and participate in test campaigns ranging from unit-level to automated testing at the subsystem and system-level.']

We want to know what really works, what doesn't—and why.", '3+ years of software engineering experience with a clear understanding of industry best practicesProven leadership, organization, and communication skillsComfort with ambiguity and possessing the ability to prioritize tasks across multiple stakeholdersA healthy bias towards actionKnowledge of computer science fundamentals (such as debugging or object-oriented design) and software engineering processes (such as agile software development, test automation, and continuous integration)Working experience with distributed computing infrastructure (Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc) and knowledge of large-scale, analysis-heavy database fundamentalsProficiency in at least two commonly used programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, or ScalaA passion for developing scalable, maintainable, testable codeThe ability to understand the big picture and align your work with larger organizational priorities', 'At Nuna, our mission is to make high-quality healthcare affordable for everyone. We are dedicated to tackling one of our nation’s biggest problems with ingenuity, creativity, and a keen moral compass.', 'A healthy bias towards action', 'At the core of these agreements is a considerable amount of data from various sources. The Value Platform team is building a high throughput pipeline to efficiently calculate performance measures for providers, identify opportunities for improvement, and present these insights in an easily digestible way. This involves running complicated data pipelines on distributed computing clusters with up to real-time data input.', 'Explore and pioneer novel technical solutions in the healthcare space. Most of this hasn’t been done before, so you’ll be uniquely positioned to pave the way', 'Nuna is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, genetics and/or veteran status.', 'Working experience with distributed computing infrastructure (Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc) and knowledge of large-scale, analysis-heavy database fundamentals', '3+ years of software engineering experience with a clear understanding of industry best practices', 'Explore and pioneer novel technical solutions in the healthcare space. Most of this hasn’t been done before, so you’ll be uniquely positioned to pave the wayHelp define a brand new product from the ground upUse the best tools/tech for the job, which means working on a diverse, polyglot codebaseWork on a cross-functional team of engineers and data scientists to design and build a scalable and efficient data pipelinePartner closely with data scientists to help them scale and productionalize the healthcare analytics they create', 'YOUR TEAM', 'Nuna partners with healthcare payers, including government agencies and health plans, to turn data into learnings and information into meaning.', 'Work on a cross-functional team of engineers and data scientists to design and build a scalable and efficient data pipeline', 'Comfort with ambiguity and possessing the ability to prioritize tasks across multiple stakeholders', 'BONUSES', 'Proven leadership, organization, and communication skills', '\xa0', '\ufeff', 'Knowledge of computer science fundamentals (such as debugging or object-oriented design) and software engineering processes (such as agile software development, test automation, and continuous integration)', 'YOU BRING', 'Nuna’s Value Platform team is building an impactful new product to help turn value-based care into a reality within the United States healthcare system. Value-based healthcare is a delivery model where hospitals are paid based on patient health outcomes, instead of the traditional fee for service model. These value-based payment arrangements are transforming healthcare, but operationalizing them is challenging and complex. That’s why we are tackling the daunting task of making it easier, by automating these value-based arrangements in an accurate, reliable, and transparent way.', 'YOUR OPPORTUNITIES', 'By joining the Value Platform team, you’ll have the unique opportunity to work with other passionate and skilled engineers to make a lasting impacting in improving the quality of healthcare.', 'Help define a brand new product from the ground up', 'Partner closely with data scientists to help them scale and productionalize the healthcare analytics they create', 'YOUR IMPACT']

['', "The Insights organization's mission is to make discovering the breadth and depth of impactful financial data available easier and quicker for finance professionals. IPaaS (Insights Platform As A Service) offers suggestions (known as insights) based on the context of the client's current workflow. An insight is a carefully crafted auto-generated short sentence. Similar to a well-written news headline, an insight communicates the bottom line without the need to read the whole story. Insights often come with clickable links, abstract text, and other metadata to provide even more information, analogous to reading the full body of a news story.The Insights Workflows team creates and manages the architecture and tools responsible for Insight creation on IPaaS. The challenge with Insight creation is allowing other partnering ENG team maximum flexibility and control over the Insights they create while maintaining stability and efficiency of the Insights platform. Partnering ENG teams currently use YAML (configuration) and Python (business logic) to build their Insights on our platform, and we are extending this to enable other implementation approaches and avenues compatible with our platform.", '    Experience with Rapid', '    Drive engineering best practices and quality within the team and sister teams', '    Strong communication & interpersonal skills (verbal & written)    Strong ability to understand business requests and convert into technical deliverables    Strong architecture and design skills    Strong C++ and/or Python experience    BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related technology field', 'Insights are a groundbreaking new way for clients to approach their workflow in the terminal. Instead of memorizing many different mnemonics and functions, clients have the ability to surface related, and potentially hard to discover, content where and when they need it within their day-to-day workflow in many different platforms such as IB, Mobile, and Launchpad.  Our clients can easily and swiftly dive further for more context to make critical financial decisions.', 'We are seeking an engineer interested in evolving a platform created for use by other engineers. This will be done by expanding the platform using BPaaS, Devise and other Bloomberg offered solutions. The individual would also be heavily involved with collaborating with our 2 sister teams, working with business and partners to define both client and non-client facing features, and mentor individuals on the team or sister teams. IPaaS currently has 40+ types of microservices written primarily in C++ and Python installed on Full Managed Linux(FML) machines. Our team strongly believes in adhering to the best industry practices, innovating impactful solutions, and continuous deployment to PROD.', '    Collaborate within the team, with sister teams, with Insights Product, and with external stakeholders', '    Experience with Streaming technologies (BMS Kafka, BMQ, RabbitMQ)', '    Experience working in an "Agile" environment (i.e. Scrum, Kanban, PI)', '    Collaborate within the team, with sister teams, with Insights Product, and with external stakeholders    Take ownership of the technical direction    Drive engineering best practices and quality within the team and sister teams    Mentor individuals on the team and sister teams    Identify bottlenecks and design strategies to address', '    Experience with DPKG, JaaS, and other DevX/SRE tooling', '    BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related technology field', '    Strong ability to understand business requests and convert into technical deliverables', '    Experience working in a Linux environment', '    Identify bottlenecks and design strategies to address', '    Mentor individuals on the team and sister teams', '    Strong architecture and design skills', '    Strong C++ and/or Python experience', "If this sounds like something you would be passionate about, please apply! We'll get in touch with you to let you know what the next steps are. ", 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '    Strong communication & interpersonal skills (verbal & written)', '    Experience with DPKG, JaaS, and other DevX/SRE tooling    Experience with Streaming technologies (BMS Kafka, BMQ, RabbitMQ)    Experience working in an "Agile" environment (i.e. Scrum, Kanban, PI)    Experience working in a Linux environment    Experience with Rapid', '    Take ownership of the technical direction']
