job_title: Staff Data Scientist - Applied Machine Learning
job_text: ['', 'Code Development & Testing: ', 'Generates appropriate graphical representations of data and model outcomes.', "Translates business problems within one's discipline to data related or mathematical solutions.", 'Tests the code using the appropriate testing approach.', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being human-led is our true disruption.\xa0', 'About Global Tech', 'Contributes code documentation, maintains playbooks, and provides timely progress updates.', 'Translates business requirements into projects, activities, and tasks and aligns to overall business strategy.', 'Ensures business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current plans, programs, and initiatives; consulting with business partners, managers, co-workers, or other key stakeholders; soliciting, evaluating, and applying suggestions for improving efficiency and cost- effectiveness; and participating in and supporting community outreach events.', 'Requirements:', 'Being human-led is our true disruption.', 'Applies best practice techniques for model testing and tuning to assess accuracy, fit, validity, and robustness for multi-stage models and model ensembles.', 'Generates appropriate graphical representations of data and model outcomes.Understands customer requirements to design appropriate data representation for multiple data sets.Work with User Experience designers and User Interface engineers as required to build front end applications.Presents to and influences the team and business audience using the appropriate frameworks and conveys clear messages through business and stakeholder understanding.Customize communication style based on stakeholder under guidance, and leverages rational arguments.Guide and mentor junior associates on story types, structures, and techniques based on context.', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'Identifies model parameters which may need modifications depending on scale of deployment.', 'Develops newer techniques (for example, advanced machine learning algorithms, auto ML) by leveraging the latest trends in machine learning, artificial intelligence to train algorithms to apply models to new data sets.', 'Identifies what methods (for example, analytics, big data analytics, automation) would provide a solution for the problem.', 'Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python, Spark, or R', 'Creates test cases to review and validate the proposed solution design.', 'The Trust and Safety Data Science team within the Catalog Data Science organization is responsible for developing machine learning models and ML-backed systems to ensure safe transactions and create trust perception across our marketplace businesses. A data scientist on this team will focus on understanding textual and image data - separately or together whenever possible - through deep-learning models, will work with engineers and analysts to scale the process of product data analysis and enrichment through data pipelines and real-time monitoring systems.', 'Selects and develops variables and features iteratively based on model responses in collaboration with the business.', 'Selects appropriate modeling techniques for complex problems with large scale, multiple structured and unstructured data sets.Selects and develops variables and features iteratively based on model responses in collaboration with the business.Conducts exploratory data analysis activities (for example, basic statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, statistical inferences) on available data.Identifies dimensions and designs of experiments and creates test and learn frameworks. Interprets data to identify trends to go across future data sets.Creates continuous, online model learning along with iterative model enhancements.Develops newer techniques (for example, advanced machine learning algorithms, auto ML) by leveraging the latest trends in machine learning, artificial intelligence to train algorithms to apply models to new data sets.Guides the team on feature engineering, experimentation, and advanced modeling techniques to be used for complex problems with unstructured and multiple data sets (for example, streaming data, raw text data).', 'Deploys models to production.Continuously logs and tracks model behavior once it is deployed against the defined metrics.Identifies model parameters which may need modifications depending on scale of deployment.', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Work with User Experience designers and User Interface engineers as required to build front end applications.', 'Presents to and influences the team and business audience using the appropriate frameworks and conveys clear messages through business and stakeholder understanding.', 'Selects appropriate modeling techniques for complex problems with large scale, multiple structured and unstructured data sets.', 'We’re virtual\xa0', 'Performs initial data quality checks on extracted data.', 'Supports the understanding of the priority order of requirements and service level agreements.Helps identify the most suitable source for data that is fit for purpose.Performs initial data quality checks on extracted data.', 'Writes code to develop the required solution and application features by determining the appropriate programming language and leveraging business, technical, and data requirements.', 'Analytical Modeling: ', 'Serves as an interpreter and conduit to connect business needs with tangible solutions and results. Recommends new processes and ways of working.', 'Customize communication style based on stakeholder under guidance, and leverages rational arguments.', 'Writes code to develop the required solution and application features by determining the appropriate programming language and leveraging business, technical, and data requirements.Creates test cases to review and validate the proposed solution design.Creates proofs of concept.Tests the code using the appropriate testing approach.Deploys software to production servers.Contributes code documentation, maintains playbooks, and provides timely progress updates.Drives the execution of multiple business plans and projects by identifying customer and operational needs; developing and communicating business plans and priorities; removing barriers and obstacles that impact performance; providing resources; identifying performance standards; measuring progress and adjusting performance accordingly; developing contingency plans; and demonstrating adaptability and supporting continuous learning.Promotes and supports company policies, procedures, mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by training and providing direction to others in their use and application; ensuring compliance with them; and utilizing and supporting the Open Door Policy.Ensures business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current plans, programs, and initiatives; consulting with business partners, managers, co-workers, or other key stakeholders; soliciting, evaluating, and applying suggestions for improving efficiency and cost- effectiveness; and participating in and supporting community outreach events.', 'Understands, articulates, and applies principles of the defined strategy to routine business problems that involve a single function.', 'Identifies the model evaluation metrics.', 'Data Source Identification: ', 'Data Strategy: ', 'Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python, Spark, or R5 years of field experience with Data science, machine learning models, computer vision / deep learningPhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics preferred2-3 years experience Using open source frameworks (for example, scikit learn, tensorflow, PyTorch)', "Translates business problems within one's discipline to data related or mathematical solutions.Identifies what methods (for example, analytics, big data analytics, automation) would provide a solution for the problem.Shares use cases and gives examples to demonstrate how the method would solve the business problem.", 'Promotes and supports company policies, procedures, mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by training and providing direction to others in their use and application; ensuring compliance with them; and utilizing and supporting the Open Door Policy.', 'Identifies the model evaluation metrics.Applies best practice techniques for model testing and tuning to assess accuracy, fit, validity, and robustness for multi-stage models and model ensembles.', 'Guides the team on feature engineering, experimentation, and advanced modeling techniques to be used for complex problems with unstructured and multiple data sets (for example, streaming data, raw text data).', 'Supports the understanding of the priority order of requirements and service level agreements.', '\xa0', 'Applied Business Acumen: ', 'We’re virtual', 'Data Visualization: ', 'Helps identify the most suitable source for data that is fit for purpose.', 'Provides recommendations to business stakeholders to solve complex business issues.', 'Develops business cases for projects with a projected return on investment or cost savings.', 'Deploys models to production.', 'Continuously logs and tracks model behavior once it is deployed against the defined metrics.', 'Identifies dimensions and designs of experiments and creates test and learn frameworks. Interprets data to identify trends to go across future data sets.', '2-3 years experience Using open source frameworks (for example, scikit learn, tensorflow, PyTorch)', 'Model Assessment & Validation: ', '5 years of field experience with Data science, machine learning models, computer vision / deep learning', 'Shares use cases and gives examples to demonstrate how the method would solve the business problem.', 'Deploys software to production servers.', 'Understands customer requirements to design appropriate data representation for multiple data sets.', 'Model Deployment & Scaling:', 'Guide and mentor junior associates on story types, structures, and techniques based on context.', 'Conducts exploratory data analysis activities (for example, basic statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, statistical inferences) on available data.', 'Creates continuous, online model learning along with iterative model enhancements.', 'Creates proofs of concept.', 'Drives the execution of multiple business plans and projects by identifying customer and operational needs; developing and communicating business plans and priorities; removing barriers and obstacles that impact performance; providing resources; identifying performance standards; measuring progress and adjusting performance accordingly; developing contingency plans; and demonstrating adaptability and supporting continuous learning.', 'Problem Formulation: ', 'Provides recommendations to business stakeholders to solve complex business issues.Develops business cases for projects with a projected return on investment or cost savings.Translates business requirements into projects, activities, and tasks and aligns to overall business strategy.Serves as an interpreter and conduit to connect business needs with tangible solutions and results. Recommends new processes and ways of working.', 'PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics preferred']

Our community is rich in talent, expertise, and passion and we seek to join other equity champions in a movement to better health and opportunity outcomes for our most marginalized citizens. We do this by amplifying the impact of existing nonprofits through the deployment of collective impact methodology and leveraging our expertise to scale data science, project management, and fundraising capacity across Southeastern North Carolina.\xa0', 'Experience with data visualization (ggplot, R Shiny, Tableau, arcGIS is a plus).', 'Qualifications and skills:', 'Produce annual baseline and results reports as directed.', 'Attention to detail.', 'Implement data ingestion processes for scalable, repeatable, consistent, and efficient work flow.', 'Scope of Work', 'Data Modeling.Implement predictive, prescriptive, and descriptive models using a variety of supervised and unsupervised techniques, as appropriate for the business use case.Mine and analyze data from data platform and other sources to drive continued insight.Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of models, processes, and data sources.', 'Data Socialization.', 'Advanced proficiency using R or Python to perform data analysis and apply statistical techniques.', 'Decision-making and problem-solving skills, driving toward outcomes with sometimes ambiguous direction.', 'Vision, hearing, speech, movements requiring the use of wrists, hands and/or fingers', 'The ability to work the days and hours required to fulfill the essential functions of the position', 'The Data Scientist directly reports to the Director of Data Science of CFC. ["Our Customer is one of the leading global interconnection platforms and the world’s largest data center provider. They connect the world's leading businesses to their customers, employees and partners inside the world's most connected data centers in 52 markets across five continents. Their mission is to protect, connect and power the digital economy. ", 'Company Industry:\xa0Technology ', 'What You’ll Do:● Develop and maintain scalable ETL pipelines, build new pipelines and facilitate API integrations to support new requirements● Writing complex SQL queries to serve new requirements for ETL, data analysis and debugging● Writing SQL functions, procedures as required based on the requirements● Fine-tune or optimize queries to support the increasing volume of data● Debug Python code, modify and enhance Python ETL applications based on the requirements on Linux environment● Writing reusable and efficient code in Java, Python and SQL● Develop Rest APIs using java libraries● Write unit, functional, regression tests for enhanced feature, maintain engineering documentation● Communicate closely with all product owners, Business and engineering teams to develop approaches for data platform architecture ', 'We are seeking a Senior SQL Data Engineer on a contract basis with advanced knowledge of SQL and intermediate knowledge of Python. ', 'In this role your primary focus will be writing complex SQL queries, optimizing them and development of all server-side backend data processing logic, ensuring high performance using Python and SQL. ', 'Opportunity:', 'Hours & Location:M-F, 40 hours/week. This role will be remote while Covid restrictions are in place. The expectation is to be onsite at Sunnyvale, CA location once it is deemed safe to do so. ', ' ', 'Now for the Perks!Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life (including spouse & child), 401k, STD/LTD, AD&D, and Commuter Benefits program.', 'Company Industry:', 'The candidate must be able to pass I-9 verification. ', 'Opportunity:\xa0The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a\xa0Senior SQL Data EngineerCommitment Level:\xa0 40 hours per week, on-site, contract through December 2020 ', 'Commitment Level:', 'Must Haves:● 5+ years of experience having hands on experience in writing, debugging and optimizing SQL queries, function and stored procedures.● 3+ years of experience with hands on experience in writing, debugging Python code on Linux.● Basics of Computer Science - OOPS, Data Structures and Algorithms● Basic understanding of regular Linux commands and usage● Experience writing Python applications that interact with ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries● Knowledge of XML and JSON parsing with unit test and debugging skills● Willingness and ability to learn new tools/languages as needed● Process-oriented with excellent verbal and written communication skill with a desire for customer service● Excellent team player and communicator who can work effectively with cross functional teams and ability to navigate ambiguity● Beginner or intermediate level java experience a plus! ', "Education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field "]

['', 'Clear communication, both in writing and in conversation', 'Cricket Health is looking to add a Senior Software Engineer to our growing team in our Cambridge office, to help scale our applications for improving the outcomes of patients with kidney disease. Your typical week would include writing code, writing tests, looking at others’ code and helping them make it better, deploying to production, designing future software, and communicating with other software engineers (and non-engineers) about all of the above.\xa0Solid, readable, well-tested code is more important to us than the quickest thing you can deploy to production (though we like to move fast, too).\xa0We use well-known technologies like Javascript, Node, and React.\xa0We’re in this for the long-haul (it is healthcare, after all), so we also reflect back on how we can improve our processes and get better for the next time (and what we want to learn along the way).\xa0Most importantly, you get to be the connection between software that serves the needs of its users, and helping our patients live their best lives.', 'Believe in shipping early and often', 'Love building things that solve the problems of real people', 'Team player, enjoy helping others around you be ['', 'You will spend your day collaborating with Quants and Traders on the Options desk to develop fault tolerant code for the firms primary trading platform. The team are very innovative so if you have ideas to implement new technologies or features then you have the freedom to do so (Machine Learning, Big Data, etc). You will be responsible for designing and implementing new trading strategies, analysing market data and developing new features at all levels of the software stack.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An open minded approach to solving complex problemsk', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working on Linux platform', 'Past hires have come both from within the financial technology industry and from large tech companies such as Microsoft, IBM, Google, and Facebook.', 'One of the leading hedge funds based in the Chicago vicinity is looking to hire a top mid level C++ Software Engineer with 4+ years of commercial experience in Options Market Making.\xa0Having built most of their own trading technology from scratch, this firm is a leader in high performance and highly technology driven trading.', "What we're looking for", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A Bachelor or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or a related discipline', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Options', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Recent hands on experience with C++', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 1+ years of progressive experience developing robust software applications', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical and problem solving skills']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Software Video Integration Team
job_text: ['', "Alarm.com is the leading platform solution for the connected home and business. Millions of people depend on Alarm.com's technology to monitor and control their property from anywhere. Centered on security and remote monitoring, our platform addresses a wide range of market needs and enables application-based control for a growing variety of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.", 'Work with latest technologies:\xa0As we continue to lead the industry, we require expertise across a broad spectrum of technologies including short and long-range wireless communication, video surveillance, lighting and HVAC automation, web development, and backend application development and hosting.\xa0', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:\xa0We hire only the best. Our quality standards are high, and our employees enjoy working alongside other high achievers.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:\xa0We hire only the best. Our quality standards are high, and our employees enjoy working alongside other high achievers.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Make an immediate impact:\xa0New employees can expect to be given responsibility for bringing new technologies to the marketplace within weeks. You are empowered to perform as soon as you join the Alarm.com team!\xa0\xa0Gain well rounded experience:\xa0Alarm.com offers a diverse and dynamic environment where you will get the chance to work directly with executives and gain a broad knowledge base across multiple areas of the business.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with latest technologies:\xa0As we continue to lead the industry, we require expertise across a broad spectrum of technologies including short and long-range wireless communication, video surveillance, lighting and HVAC automation, web development, and backend application development and hosting.\xa0Focus on fun:\xa0Alarm.com places high value on our team culture. We even have a committee dedicated to hosting a stand-out holiday party, happy hours, and an annual corporate retreat.', 'Strong programming skills; C#, Java, and/or object-oriented programming.', 'Manage a small team of software engineers', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, related field or equivalent work experience.5+ years of professional software development experience.', 'Gain well rounded experience:\xa0', 'Develop full-stack and edge computing software for a wide variety of platforms and technologies.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, related field or equivalent work experience.', "Our security, video monitoring, intelligent automation and energy management solutions are available through our network of thousands of professional service providers in North America and around the globe. Alarm.com's common stock is traded on the Nasdaq under the ticker symbol ALRM.", 'Advantageous Skills', 'In connection with your application, we collect information that identifies, reasonably relates to or describes you (“Personal Information”). The categories of Personal Information that we may collect include your name, government-issued identification number(s), email address, mailing address, other contact information, emergency contact information, employment history, educational history, criminal record, and demographic information.\xa0We collect and use those categories of Personal Information about you for human resources and other business management purposes, including identifying and evaluating you as a candidate for potential or future employment or future contract positions, record keeping in relation to recruiting and hiring, conducting criminal background checks as permitted by law, conducting analytics, and ensuring compliance with applicable legal requirements and Company policies.', 'As a Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to work across a variety of technical areas. Typical projects will involve diverse technologies and skills. Strong multi-tasking skills and the ability to self-learn are must-have attributes. Candidate must be able to communicate well within a team environment and work independently on self-directed tasks. Motivated and creative problem solvers will have opportunities to influence future projects.', 'Manage a small team of software engineersDevelop full-stack and edge computing software for a wide variety of platforms and technologies.Engage in the research, evaluation, and application of new technologies and methodologies to solve challenging project goals.Take part in the entire project lifecycle, from requirements development to deployment.Work with cross functional teams to develop highly reliable software that runs at scale.', 'Make an immediate impact:\xa0', 'Take part in the entire project lifecycle, from requirements development to deployment.', 'Very few medium sized companies innovate and develop across such a broad range of technologies as Alarm.com. This position is ideal for the candidate who seeks a small, friendly company culture where one can work closely with smart and highly productive people across a very interesting spectrum of wireless, software, and hardware/device technologies to develop outstanding consumer products.', 'Prior experience with managing software engineer(s)Strong programming skills; C#, Java, and/or object-oriented programming.Software engineering experience gained from work experience, academic projects, internship experience or independent hacking projects.Knowledge of networking concepts, principles, and technologies.', 'Familiarity with image processing, video processing, and/or computer vision a plus.', '5+ years of professional software development experience.', 'WHY WORK FOR ALARM.COM?', 'COMPANY INFO', 'Alarm.com is an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Engage in the research, evaluation, and application of new technologies and methodologies to solve challenging project goals.', 'Essential Skills Required', 'Alarm.com is looking for a highly motivated self-starter to work in a fast-paced product development environment on our video team! The successful candidate will work with small teams to design, prototype, and develop state-of-the-art camera integration, video streaming, and video analytics solutions.', 'Gain well rounded experience:\xa0Alarm.com offers a diverse and dynamic environment where you will get the chance to work directly with executives and gain a broad knowledge base across multiple areas of the business.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Familiarity with image processing, video processing, and/or computer vision a plus.Experience with RTSP/RTP, WebRTC or other video streaming technologies.', 'Work with cross functional teams to develop highly reliable software that runs at scale.', 'Qualifications', 'Prior experience with managing software engineer(s)', '\xa0', 'In this role, You Will', 'Alarm.com offers competitive pay and benefits including a wide choice of healthcare options with generous company subsidy, a health savings account option with company contribution, 401(k) with employer match, paid holidays and paid time off increasing with tenure, paid maternity and paternity leave, company paid STD/LTD and life insurance, flexible spending accounts, and a casual dress work environment.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Focus on fun:', '\ufeff', 'Knowledge of networking concepts, principles, and technologies.', 'Experience with RTSP/RTP, WebRTC or other video streaming technologies.', 'Software engineering experience gained from work experience, academic projects, internship experience or independent hacking projects.', 'Alarm.com earned the Top Workplace™ award for its employee culture and the meaningful work we do every day to develop and bring to market new technology that will make millions of people safer and help them use energy more efficiently. We’re seeking those who are passionate about creating change through technology and who want to make a lasting impact on the world around them.', 'Focus on fun:\xa0Alarm.com places high value on our team culture. We even have a committee dedicated to hosting a stand-out holiday party, happy hours, and an annual corporate retreat.', 'Make an immediate impact:\xa0New employees can expect to be given responsibility for bringing new technologies to the marketplace within weeks. You are empowered to perform as soon as you join the Alarm.com team!\xa0\xa0', 'Work with latest technologies:', 'COMPANY BENEFITS']

The software engineer supports business process improvement through technical, design, development, and outreach work with ServiceNow. This position will work closely with business and technical teams to ensure that correct functionality is developed and allows the university to continue financial operations. This position will need to translate Finance requirements into ServiceNow and Workday functionality. The position will escalate gaps or trade-offs in designs across technical and non-technical audiences using effective communication skills. The software engineer will participate in recommending the most effective and efficient solution design over the course of the project implementation. job_text: ['', 'Top 5 Must Haves: AWS, Python, Github, Terraform, Artifactory, Service Now', 'The Software Engineer designs, configures, implements and supports majority of cloud environments. ['**Role can be located in Austin, TX or Newport Beach, CA**Role:We are seeking a hardworking application developer to join our team. Building on top of PIMCO’s modern cloud-based solution infrastructure, we develop and maintain the central applications, platforms and tools that are the backbone of PIMCO’s trading and portfolio management processes by maximizing scalable technology solutions provided by PIMCO’s core engineering team. Dedicated to supporting a culture of diversity, inclusion and acceptance, at PIMCO we work to create an environment where all our people can be their authentic selves. We strive to heighten our employees’ appreciation for diverse perspectives and skills, facilitating increased collaboration and enhancing our ability to attract and engage top talent.In this role, you will be working on:•  Trade risk sizing and capital allocation decision support tools•  Order generation•  Fine-grained trade risk and performance tracking•  Portfolio PnL and historical performance attribution•  Customized Trade Floor reportingResponsibilities:•  Forward development of new system components and enhancements to the existing codebase•  Direct interaction with business users (Trade Floor, PMs, Risk Managers, etc.) in order to define, rollout, and support new platform features•  Detailed understanding of various aspects of PIMCO business and operational processes•  Architecture, design, and coding; solving engineering challenges associated with large data processing volumes, complex calculation dependencies, horizontal compute scale vs centralized data storage, etc. ', 'Requirements:•\xa0Candidates should have 5 years of experience in the investment domain building large-scale application solutions by using modern full stack technologies in a front office environment or supporting a portfolio management technology capacity•  Solid experience in writing backend services using Java or C# (while we are using Java, we will consider strong candidates in other languages as long as they show ability to learn Java)•  Interest in learning about / working with modern UI technologies']

job_text: ['', ' High school diploma or GED. ', ' Advanced knowledge of OLAP technologies, and dimensional modeling. ', ' Optimize processes involving large data sets to improve performance. ', ' Excellent problem solving and analytical skills. Advanced knowledge of OLAP technologies, and dimensional modeling. Work closely with Product Management team to prioritize development work, timelines, scope sprints and releases. Understanding and working with multiple data sources to meet business rules and supports analytical needs. Analyze potential data quality issues to determine the root cause, and creating effective solutions.  Optimize processes involving large data sets to improve performance. ['', '3+ years of professional Python development experience (or more, for more senior candidates)', "We're looking for several Python developers (both mid-level and senior level) with solid cloud services experience (preferably AWS.)", 'Experience in the design, implementation and integration of APIs', "Great communication skills and teamwork skills (we're a small group and need to work well together)", "We'd love it if you have experience working with the following, but these skills aren't required  if you bring strong experience in the above:  Pandas, React, Docker, any healthcare industry experience", 'No C2C or third party inquires.', "Skills we're looking for include:", "3+ years of professional Python development experience (or more, for more senior candidates)Experience in the design, implementation and integration of APIsGreat communication skills and teamwork skills (we're a small group and need to work well together)We'd love it if you have experience working with the following, but these skills aren't required  if you bring strong experience in the above:  Pandas, React, Docker, any healthcare industry experience", "SourceFactor's client is a start-up company in the healthcare technology (health tech) space.  They are building a Platform as a Service (Spark / Python / AWS) that enables healthcare providers and insurance companies to work together to drive better health outcomes.  Interacting with data from many diverse sources, the data challenge is unique and interesting."]

['', 'Scala', 'Akka http', 'Docker, Kubernetes', 'We use a wide variety of technologies:', 'oftware\xa0Engineer', 'Design, develop, and maintain several high performance microservices', 'Ensure code follows the design and insist on the highest coding standards', 'AWS products: S3, Kinesis, ElasticCache, RDS, EC2', 'Follow and create best practices for clean code and architecture', '2 - 3 years of experience in at least 1 widely used programming language, such as C#, C++, Python, Java, or Scala\xa0Knowledge of programming fundamentalsFundamentals around JVM and garbage collection optimization understandingA Degree in Computer Science or related areaAWS Cloud experience with EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and VPC in a big data environment', 'Knowledge / Experience with Docker or containerized applicationsKnowledge / Experience with Kubernetes or related systemExperience with functional programmingExperience building multi-tenant scalable enterprise software in cloud', 'Ekata prides itself on celebrating diversity, inclusivity, and being an equal-opportunity employer.', 'As a\xa0Software Engineer, you will:', 'Our ideal\xa0Software Engineer\xa0will have:', 'ClojureIntegrantPathomScalaAkka httpAirflowDocker, KubernetesRedis, Elastic Search, and SolrAWS products: S3, Kinesis, ElasticCache, RDS, EC2', 'AWS Cloud experience with EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and VPC in a big data environment', 'To learn more about the experience of working at Ekata visit:\xa0https://ekata.com/careers/', 'Knowledge / Experience with Kubernetes or related system', '2 - 3 years of experience in at least 1 widely used programming language, such as C#, C++, Python, Java, or Scala\xa0', 'Fundamentals around JVM and garbage collection optimization understanding', 'Experience with functional programming', 'We are looking for a\xa0Software\xa0Engineer\xa0to help our team build and maintain high performance backend services. Our group is responsible for the Ekata Identity Graph – state-of-the-art technology linking businesses back to humanity (people, businesses, locations, phone numbers, email addresses, and URLs). The graph represents 5 billion unique data elements and enormous size of 11TB. Our microservices are the backbone of our products and are developed with high availability and performance in mind. Catering to low latency and high query volume at this scale opens up exciting opportunities.', 'Knowledge of programming fundamentals', 'Clojure', 'A Degree in Computer Science or related area', 'Integrant', 'Ekata provides global identity verification via enterprise-grade APIs and a SaaS solution. Our product suite is powered by Ekata Identity Engine, the first and only cross-border identity engine of its kind. It uses complex machine learning algorithms across the five consumer attributes of email, phone, name, physical address, and IP to derive unique data links and features from billions of real-time transactions within our customer network and the globally sourced data of our graph. Businesses around the world including Alipay, Stripe, Airbnb, and Microsoft leverage our solutions to approve more good transactions, reduce friction, and find fraud.', 'Design, develop, and maintain several high performance microservicesEnsure code follows the design and insist on the highest coding standardsFollow and create best practices for clean code and architecture', 'Experience building multi-tenant scalable enterprise software in cloud', 'Nice to have experience:', 'Redis, Elastic Search, and Solr', 'Unwavering in our pursuit of standardizing global identity data, we are approachable, real people that genuinely care about the success of those we partner with. With a commitment to service, innovation, and ownership, Ekata is a dynamic place to work for folks who want to make an impact on a global scale. We provide a learning & development opportunities for each employee and promote work-life flexibility through self-managed time off. Headquartered in downtown Seattle, Ekata is growing internationally with offices in Budapest, Amsterdam, and in Singapore.', 'Pathom', 'Knowledge / Experience with Docker or containerized applications', 'Airflow']

job_text: ['M.S. in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field', 'Relevant Degree in Electrical/Computer/Software Engineering, Computer Science, Math or Information Systems', 'Active TS/SCI with Polygraph clearance Preferred/Desired Skills:', 'Operational intelligence experience, applying intelligence business processes to meet Army operational needs, at Army brigade and division levels', 'Mission knowledge of military intelligence operations, the intelligence life cycle, intelligence systems, and open source intelligence analysis or commercial marketing methods', 'The System Engineer shall have minimum 6 years of experience. Additional Certifications can account for time as well. A Bachelors Degree can be substituted for 4 years experience and Masters can be substituted for 6 years experience. Additional Certifications can substitute for years of experience', 'Experience at Joint Special Operations Command (JSOC), United States Army Intelligence Support Activity (USAISA), Army division targeting cell, Theater Military Intelligence Brigade, Joint Task Force J-2, Unified Command J-2 or other service equivalent (e.g. Air Force-DCGS, Commander Task Force N2)', 'Ability to brief and engage with senior government personnel Qualifications:', 'Ability to leverage technologies and systems from other intelligence agencies Work will be performed in Annapolis Junction, Linthicum, area. Must be able to obtain, maintain and/or currently possess a security clearance.']

['', ' Validate conceptual problem solutions by performing trade studies and analyses.', ' Operate as a key element in a team of creative, independent individuals.', ' Create reliable designs through a comprehensive experimental development test program.', 'MS Degree, preferably in Mechanical, Aeronautical or Electrical Engineering plus three years of design/development engineering experience.', ' Be a key contributor to the preparation of successful proposal designs, cost estimates, and technical volume write ups.', 'What You Will Need...', ' Document designs, analyses, and test results with accurate and concise reports.', 'As an alternative, the candidate would have a BS Degree plus six years minimum of design/development engineering experience', 'Accountabilities', 'Moog Aircraft Group', 'Mechanical Engineer should have a good sense of three dimensional spatial orientation and seasoned knowledge of mechanical hardware design', ' Due to certain military programs, US citizenship with ability to obtain D.O.D. secret clearance is required. Having an existing clearance is a plus.At Moog we work in an environment where people trust, respect and encourage one another. We believe in our people, and it shows in everything we do. We invite you to become part of our continued success.Life at Moog YouTube Video - http://bit.ly/2ZIJKYNEOE/AA Minority/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Female/Disability/Veteran', 'Life at Moog YouTube Video - http://bit.ly/2ZIJKYN', 'Electrical Design Engineer should have solid knowledge of circuit design and a wide range of electrical component', 'Must have self starting instincts and strong analytical skills', ' Represent Moog in a manner consistent with its technical reputation.', ' Contribute to the development of new product requirements through consulting with customers and sales personnel.']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - Activision Blizzard Media
job_text: ['', 'Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with new products.', 'Experience using machine learning libraries or platforms, including Tensorflow, Caffe, Theanos, Scikit- Learn,or ML Lib for production or commercial products.', 'Ability to communicate effectively between Product managers, business teams, data analysts and production engineers, both in code and conversation.', 'Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP).', 'Experience of working with advertising platform.', 'Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models.', 'Level Up - Your Role With Activision Blizzard Media', 'Job Description', 'Strong adherence to metrics driven development, with a disciplined and analytical approach to product development.', 'PhD or MS in computer science, engineering or related field.', 'Ready to Play? Apply now!', 'Game Changer - What You Bring To The Role', 'Experience in stream processing—Storm, Spark, Flink etc.— and graph processing technologies.', 'Work as the lead data strategist to help identify compelling patterns and advise the solutions.', 'Experience in finding patterns, trends and actionable insights from huge data sets.', 'You have expertise in one or more object- oriented languages, including Python, Go, Java, or C++, and an eagerness to learn more', 'Experience with distributed storage and database systems, including SQL or NoSQL, MySQL, or Cassandra.', 'A strong desire to learn the details of advanced machine learning algorithms.', 'Ability to solve complex business problems and apply machine learning to optimize critical business metrics.', ' Work as the lead data strategist to help identify compelling patterns and advise the solutions. Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with new products. Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models. Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting. Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion. Improve the run- time of existing algorithms. Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms.Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms. ', ' PhD or MS in computer science, engineering or related field. Experience in finding patterns, trends and actionable insights from huge data sets. 10 years of experience as machine learning engineer / data scientist. You have expertise in one or more object- oriented languages, including Python, Go, Java, or C++, and an eagerness to learn more Experience with both machine learning and building scalable production services. Experience with distributed storage and database systems, including SQL or NoSQL, MySQL, or Cassandra. Experience using machine learning libraries or platforms, including Tensorflow, Caffe, Theanos, Scikit- Learn,or ML Lib for production or commercial products. A strong desire to learn the details of advanced machine learning algorithms. Ability to communicate effectively between Product managers, business teams, data analysts and production engineers, both in code and conversation. Ability to solve complex business problems and apply machine learning to optimize critical business metrics. Strong adherence to metrics driven development, with a disciplined and analytical approach to product development. ', 'Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting.', 'Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms.Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms.', 'Experience with both machine learning and building scalable production services.', 'About Activision And Our Family Of Brands', '10 years of experience as machine learning engineer / data scientist.', 'Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion.', 'Improve the run- time of existing algorithms.', " Experience in stream processing—Storm, Spark, Flink etc.— and graph processing technologies. Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Experience of working with advertising platform.About Activision And Our Family Of BrandsActivision Blizzard, Inc. (NASDAQ: ATVI), is one of the world's largest and most successful interactive entertainment companies and is at the intersection of media, technology and entertainment. Our combined entertainment network delights hundreds of millions of monthly active users in 196 countries, making us the largest gaming network on the planet!Activision develops, distributes, and publishes deeply immersive interactive entertainment for gaming consoles, mobile and tablet platforms, and PCs, including blockbuster franchises like Call of Duty® and Skylanders®.Blizzard Entertainment develops, distributes and publishes some of the most iconic entertainment experiences in gaming, such as World of Warcraft®, StarCraft®, Diablo®, Hearthstone®, and Heroes of the Storm™, for PCs, mobile and tablet platforms, and consoles.King Digital Entertainment creates leading interactive entertainment for the mobile world. With more than 200 fun titles, King's franchises include Candy Crush ®, Farm Heroes®, Pet Rescue®, and Bubble Witch®.Ready to Play? Apply now!Come join our world and work alongside some of the best and brightest minds in the business.All applications should be made in English."]

['', 'Ability to debug and troubleshoot code', 'Recent or soon to be college grads are encouraged to apply.', 'PC OS internals, RTOS, device driver, threading & interrupt knowledge a plus', "RSI’s culture is dynamic and friendly. Our office is located in the Chicago Loop (next to the bean) and next to all mass transit. Other than having fun with projects, RSI hosts monthly activities where the team gets together for events such as a Cubs game, Bull's game, Escape room, ping pong contests in the office, bowling, laser tag, whirly ball, beer/scotch tasting, board games, etc.", 'Your salary and bonuses are only limited by your passion and the desire for growth. There is no bureaucracy at RSI so decisions are made collectively and quickly. Your hard work will be recognized by everyone, and your ideas will be heard and implemented.', 'The candidate should have:', 'About RSI', 'A passion for Problem SolvingDegree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering\xa0C#, C++ and C programming skillsAbility to debug and troubleshoot codeAbility to design tests and find edge casesStrong OO skills including knowledge of design patternsStrong understanding of Data Structures and AlgorithmsPC OS internals, RTOS, device driver, threading & interrupt knowledge a plusAbility to work independently or collaboratively as neededEffective Communication Skills', 'At Robotic Systems Integration (“RSI”), our goal is to develop user-friendly software and solve complex problems involving motion, robotics, analytics, and vision so our customers are able to program a machine, vision, or robot with ease.', 'Our ideal candidate is a self-motivated individual who is willing to work hard to get the job done. Learning our motion controls technology will mostly be a hands-on experience.', 'A passion for Problem Solving', 'Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering\xa0', 'Ability to work independently or collaboratively as needed', 'We offer very competitive salaries and benefits, comprehensive training, and the opportunity to work in a casual, exciting, and innovative environment.', 'Strong understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms', 'Ability to design tests and find edge cases', 'As a back-end Software Engineer at RSI, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects, develop powerful software, and receive guidance as you learn about software architecture implementation and coding practices.', 'Effective Communication Skills', 'Please describe why you are a great candidate for this position, including any relevant experience or hobbies. Please also attach a copy of your resume and transcript (unofficial transcript acceptable).', 'Strong OO skills including knowledge of design patterns', 'C#, C++ and C programming skills']

', 'Experience in Cloud API development.', 'Experience with language development and database/information technologies.', 'Experience with Ruby and SQL. ', "Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.With your technical expertise you will manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions.", 'Minimum qualifications:', 'Experience in developing scalable systems, comprehensive applications and intuitive interfaces.', 'Preferred qualifications:', 'Advanced degree in engineering, computer science or other technical related field.Experience in Cloud API development.Experience in developing scalable systems, comprehensive applications and intuitive interfaces.Experience with data modeling. Experience with language development and database/information technologies.', 'About the job', 'Exemplify technical excellence in collaborative planning, implementation, and review of code.', 'Empathize with customers and your peers.', 'Drive technical discussions regarding application architecture in support of high quality and maintainability of complex systems.', 'Looker is a unified platform that powers data experiences and delivers actionable business insights to employees at the point of decision. Looker integrates data into the daily workflows of users to allow organizations to extract value from data at web-scale.', 'Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Santa Cruz, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA', 'Santa Cruz, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA', 'Provide seamless support for integrating Looker modeled data in data pipelines and data workflows.', 'Software development experience in Java.', 'Lead projects related to data movement and transformation from design through development.Provide seamless support for integrating Looker modeled data in data pipelines and data workflows.Exemplify technical excellence in collaborative planning, implementation, and review of code.Drive technical discussions regarding application architecture in support of high quality and maintainability of complex systems.Empathize with customers and your peers.', '6 years of professional software development experience or 3 years with a  relevant advanced degree.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with data modeling. ', 'Advanced degree in engineering, computer science or other technical related field.', "The Model Development Team is responsible for the Data Modeling Language (LookML) which powers the entire data platform and in-database transformations. In this role, you will be a back-end engineer that helps our users leverage database technologies and integrate with ETL tools. As a Software Engineer, you'll be passionate about programming languages, data pipelines, and seek to empower the next generation of business intelligence, data analytics, and applications."]

['', 'Experience in the public cloud (For example S3, RDS, Athena, VPCs, etc)', " Design, implement, and maintain end-to-end data pipelines with an understanding of ML lifecycles   Drive development of data products in collaboration with data scientists and analysts .  Build and scale data platform infrastructure that powers analytics both batch and real-time.  Working with stakeholders and other team members to deliver and operate large scale, distributed services in the cloud  Responsible for overall system architecture, scalability, reliability, and performance of one or more data pipelines and data platform components.  Provide Architecture guidance and work closely to uplevel the engineering organization.  Actively participate and improve the data engineering craftsmanship and follow the best practices.  Review others' work and share knowledge. Skill Set Needed ::6-8 years of experience in relevant areas in building large scale, distributed systems which can handle 10s of petabytes of data spread across multiple regionsExperience in big data technologies. (Spark, Flink, MapReduce, HDFS, Hive, Presto, Avro, Parquet, Airflow, etc)Experience in large scale messaging system (Kinesis, Kafka, etc)Experience in the public cloud (For example S3, RDS, Athena, VPCs, etc)Practical experience in building solid, distributed, internet-scale enterprise-class solutions/services in Java, Python, Golang Experience with big data design, ETL, technology, efficient designs for distributed systems, and big data environments. We’re seeking a Senior Software Engineer who is ready to take control of large-scale programs and applications for one of our clients in Boston. ', 'Do you remember when the first YouTube video was uploaded in 2005? We don’t, because we were too busy creating the best technology placement firm in the country. Back then, we saw how extreme the demand was for technologists. Companies needed help finding them, and technologists needed help sifting through the noise. That’s our specialty.', ' EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOB', 'Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', 'Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of engineers. ', 'Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.', 'Experience with CI/CD containerization and deployment technology: Docker, Kubernetes, etc.', 'EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOB', 'ABOUT BRIDGEVIEW IT', 'Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.', 'Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others.', 'We are unable to sponsor H1B candidates at this time.\xa0Those authorized to work in the US without restriction are encouraged to apply. BridgeView IT is an equal opportunity employer.', 'Experience building cross-functional consensus and working with stakeholders such as product managers.', 'Experience with microservice architecture and / or RESTful web service development preferred.', 'Provide high-quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.Work with senior leadership to architect solutions and ensure that we deliver the right functionality, in a timely manner.Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of engineers. See your work as it powers improved customer understanding / experience or enables new features and functionality in the tech stack. Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others.Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', '\xa0', '5+ years of experience in software development; strong fluency in a server-side programming language required (Java, Python, C#, or PHP preferred).Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.Experience with big data (Spark, Hive, etc.)Experience with microservice architecture and / or RESTful web service development preferred.Experience with CI/CD containerization and deployment technology: Docker, Kubernetes, etc.Experience building cross-functional consensus and working with stakeholders such as product managers.', '5+ years of experience in software development; strong fluency in a server-side programming language required (Java, Python, C#, or PHP preferred).', 'Experience with big data (Spark, Hive, etc.)', 'Provide high-quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.', 'Here’s the thing – large companies have a distinct need for help with their massive technology functions. Whether it’s SAP, a Java application, or SharePoint, these businesses require talent who can keep them up and running smoothly. If you have the breadth of knowledge it takes to work at the enterprise level, our client’s opening is waiting.', 'Work with senior leadership to architect solutions and ensure that we deliver the right functionality, in a timely manner.']

job_title: Big Data Engineer- No third parties plz
job_text: ['', '• Troubleshoot data quality issues - identifying root cause/system & documentation/communication of resolution', '• Ensure the effective collection, organization and distribution of data, from a variety of data sources', '• Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical data analysis results to business people and business processes, challenges and issues to technical people', '• Good knowledge of database client software (i.e. TOAD, SQL+, SQL Developer)', '• Design logical/physical data structures leveraging modeling experience', '• Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing data infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', '• Translate business requirements and unstructured business issues into data analytic problems', 'Be a subject matter expert on ARS data and reporting solutions to influence the design of logical and physical data structures for integrity, scalability and performance', '• Drive the adoption of cloud-based data storage or reporting tools', '• Experience in data extraction, data manipulation, analysis and reporting required', '#ME – 12107', 'Architect is responsible for understanding data and analytical needs, conceptualizing the cutting-edge analytical approaches, enabling high-volume complex advanced analytics services on an ongoing basis and leading the development of reusable solutions. ', '• Perform an enablement role to facilitate data scientists in locating, understanding and selecting the appropriate ARS data', '• Create best practices for testing/profiling of data to ensure proper operation and accuracy', '• Bachelor’s or Masters in a field such as Math, Computer Science or Data Architecture', 'Location: \xa0NORTHBROOK, IL', '• Advanced data management, quality assurance and data flow skills', '• Deliver value-add solutions at the speed of business', '• Experience building BI platforms in hybrid cloud and on-premise environment', 'Job Description:', 'Duration:', '• Business acumen and strong stakeholder management skills', '• Assist with data-related technical issues and support data infrastructure needs', '• Create and maintain excellent data documentation that allows the data to be understood (Metadata) and leveraged for additional use.', '• Microsoft Office experience required', '• Deep expertise in relational databases and data warehousing required', '• Experience in dashboard design and development preferred', '• Experience working with Big Data distributed computing such as Hadoop/MapReduce preferred\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Duration: \xa06 Months+', 'This role ensures there are robust data strategies in place that align to business goals, reporting and analytical capabilities that meet the full breadth of company needs. ', 'The Data & Business Intelligence Architect is responsible for the reporting and data architecture of ARS. ', 'Key Responsibilities:', '• Lead/influence the selection of next generation of data storage/management/reporting tools', 'Big Data Engineer', '• Partner with ETL team to ensure efficient and accurate data loads', '• 5-7 years of direct experience in business intelligence, reporting and data design, development, support and operations with a leading tool suite', 'Skillsets and Experience:', '• Technical expertise in Oracle PL/SQL and MSSQL (T-SQL) queries', '• Experience with BI tool such as Power BI, Business Objects/Cognos and Tableau.', 'Location:', '• Design presentation/consumption layer to enable BI reporting']

job_text: ['', 'simple', 'Understanding of Linux and OS internals', 'Developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for Systems’ software stack', 'We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being', 'Collaborating with cloud operation and SRE teams to reduce fleet failures related to systems’ software stack', ' Professional experience in QA engineering Experience in developing test automation at scale Experience as a developer / QA engineer in a large scale, distributed environment Experience writing secure, testable and robust code Understanding of Linux and OS internals Excellent written and verbal communication skills ', 'Have you ever wondered what happens inside the cloud?', 'Our Team: ', ' Development of regression analysis testing automation Developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for Systems’ software stack Development of telemetry for fleet failure analysis Triaging and fixing operating system issues impacting the reliability of product offerings Collaborating with cloud operation and SRE teams to reduce fleet failures related to systems’ software stack 5-20% of your time is spent on innovation, education, and/or open source ', ', ', 'We value development', 'Development of telemetry for fleet failure analysis', 'Experience in developing test automation at scale', 'We value diversity and inclusivity', 'We support our remote employee experience', 'We want people who are passionate about designing and operating secure systems at scale.', '5-20% of your time is spent on innovation, education, and/or open source', 'We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer competitive health, dental, and vision benefits for employees and their dependents, a monthly gym reimbursement to support your physical health, and a commute or internet allowance to make your trips to your office or your desk easier. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. ', 'We value development. You will work with some of the smartest and most interesting people in the industry. We are a high-performance organization that is always challenging ourselves to continuously grow. We maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development through formalized mentorship, LinkedIn Learning tracks, and other internal programs. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education.', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'Professional experience in QA engineering', 'our community', 'Why You’ll Like Working For DigitalOcean', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Our Stack: ', 'We value diversity and inclusivity. We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'We support our remote employee experience. While we have great office spaces in NYC, Cambridge and Palo Alto, we’re very distributed—we use a number of communication tools to connect across the company—and all remote employees have the opportunity to visit our offices and meet their teams face-to-face at team offsites. We also have an annual company offsite, Shark Week, to get quality in-person time with the entire company at least once a year. We also allow employees to outfit their workstations to meet their needs—whether remote or in office.', ' We value development. We maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development through formalized mentorship, LinkedIn Learning tracks, and other internal programs. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education. We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. While we have great office spaces in NYC, Cambridge and Palo Alto, we’re very distributed—we use a number of communication tools to connect across the company—and all remote employees have the opportunity to visit our offices and meet their teams face-to-face at team offsites. ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Craft the architectural strategy, and own the technical landscape, for a major domain in the world of logistics that powers global trade. Design systems that represent the real-world intricacies of logistics entities, such as cargo, routing, customs, and pricing. Work closely with business partners and product managers to distill complex business problems into elegant technical solutions. Build and launch products rapidly and incrementally. We ship to production dozens of times per day. Geek out about shipping and logistics. (We do this often.) You play a significant role in the career development of others, actively mentoring and educating the larger software engineering community on trends, technologies, and best practices. Model business processes to ingest costs and variances, understanding root cause, analyzing discrepancies, automating remedies / disputes to detect and stop financial leakage.  Design simple solutions to onboard partners to broaden financial visibility coverage. Create services to automate business processes and consolidate them into central logic hubs. Drive data accuracy architecture and improvement loops through various subsystems. ', ' Don’t be! We’re building the first Operating System for Global Trade. That’s why it’s incredibly important for us to bring people from diverse backgrounds and experiences together with our industry veterans to help move the freight forwarding industry forward. What’s freight forwarding and why does it matter? Freight forwarding is the coordination and shipment of goods from one place to another and it’s what makes global trade possible. Flexport is on a mission to make global trade easier for everyone because we believe it can help connect the world and break down economic barriers. We know this industry is complex. That’s why we invest in education starting day one with Flexport Academy, a one week intensive onboarding program designed specifically to set every new Flexport employee up for success. ', 'About Flexport', '3+ years of design and architecture knowledge as well as familiarity with object-oriented analysis and design patterns (OOA/OOD)', 'Design systems that represent the real-world intricacies of logistics entities, such as cargo, routing, customs, and pricing.', 'Design simple solutions to onboard partners to broaden financial visibility coverage. Create services to automate business processes and consolidate them into central logic hubs.', 'Determine, in real-time, the cost to move freight between any two points in the world.', 'Worried about not having any freight forwarding experience?', 'Automate archaic filing processes and save the operations team thousands of phone calls per week.', 'Engineering Culture And Values', ' A love of simple, well-tested code that is easy to extend and hard to break. The ability to convey technical ideas in common terms to business partners, product managers, and engineers alike. Understanding of performance tradeoffs, load balancing and operational issues Demonstrated ability to mentor junior software engineers in all aspects of their engineering skill-sets Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, continuous deployments, testing, and operations Non-optional: an aptitude for learning quickly. ', 'We know this industry is complex. Automate archaic filing processes and save the operations team thousands of phone calls per week. Deliver supply chain insights to logistics teams via a world-class analytics experience. job_text: ['', '*For eligible employees', 'ABOUT THE ROLE', 'BENEFITS AT GAP INC.', 'Expertise in designing and integrating with service-oriented architectures, keeping performance and security in mind.', 'Develop code using standards-based solutions, drive adoption via mentoring and guiding others', 'Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk', '7-10 years of database engineering experience with a primary focus on multi-node database systems, backing extremely high-volume Java-based servicesIn-depth knowledge and technical expertise with both SQL and NoSQL based database and data cache systems including Oracle RDBMS / RAC, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, Redis, HBaseExperience running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, leveraging Cloud-native PaaS databases such as Cosmos, Azure SQL, RDS is a major plus.Solid experience in query tuning, performance optimization and database “build and run” with a DevOps mindsetExpertise in designing and integrating with service-oriented architectures, keeping performance and security in mind.Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk', '7-10 years of database engineering experience with a primary focus on multi-node database systems, backing extremely high-volume Java-based services', "But we’re more than the clothes that we make. We know that business can and should be a force for good, and it’s why we work hard to make product that makes people feel good, inside and out. It’s why we’re committed to giving back to the communities where we live and work. If you're one of the super-talented who thrive on change, aren't afraid to take risks and love to make a difference, come grow with us.\xa0", 'Gap Inc. is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to providing a workplace free from harassment and discrimination. We are committed to recruiting, hiring, training and promoting qualified people of all backgrounds, and make all employment decisions without regard to any protected status. We have received numerous awards for our long-held commitment to equality and will continue to foster a diverse and inclusive environment of belonging. This year, we’ve been named as one of the\xa0Best Places to Work by the Humans Rights Campaign\xa0for the fourteenth consecutive year and have been included in the\xa02019 Bloomberg Gender-Equality Index\xa0for the second year in a row.', 'Engage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodology', 'Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*Employee stock purchase plan.*Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*See more\xa0of the benefits we offer.', 'Solid experience in query tuning, performance optimization and database “build and run” with a DevOps mindset', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.', 'Create robust database solutions and multi-task across initiatives while maintaining code simplicity and extensibility, reliability, scalability and performance', 'Our past is full of iconic moments — but our future is going to spark many more. Our brands — Gap, Banana Republic, Old Navy, Athleta, INTERMIX and Hill City —\xa0have dressed people from all walks of life and all kinds of families, all over the world, for every occasion for more than 50 years.', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*', 'Experience running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, leveraging Cloud-native PaaS databases such as Cosmos, Azure SQL, RDS is a major plus.', 'ABOUT GAP INC.', 'At Gap Inc., we are passionate about creating and delivering quality software by utilizing Agile and DevOps best practices. We are creating Cloud-based solutions using Automation, Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration & Delivery, Pair Programming, and story-based iterative development. In this role, you will have key responsibilities for enhancing, scaling and optimizing high-performance database systems powering one of the most trafficked e-commerce sites on the Internet!', 'See more\xa0of the benefits we offer.', 'WHO YOU ARE', 'Work collaboratively with engineering and technical operations team members to build integrated, high-volume services', 'Employee stock purchase plan.*', 'We are looking for imaginative individuals experienced with cutting-edge database technologies, and state-of-the-art Engineering and DevOps practices powering commerce systems at scale.', 'In-depth knowledge and technical expertise with both SQL and NoSQL based database and data cache systems including Oracle RDBMS / RAC, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, Redis, HBase', 'One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*', 'Engage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilities', 'Work collaboratively with engineering and technical operations team members to build integrated, high-volume servicesCreate robust database solutions and multi-task across initiatives while maintaining code simplicity and extensibility, reliability, scalability and performanceEngage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodologyEngage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilitiesDevelop code using standards-based solutions, drive adoption via mentoring and guiding others', 'Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*']
