job_title: Senior Data Engineer (Python, Spark, Airflow, AWS)
job_text: ['', 'Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.Python developmentPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'You are an experienced technologist who has a proven track record of designing and building large scale solutions using big data technologies, ideally using Spark, Airflow and Python.\xa0', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion framework', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer on the Healthcare Map / Data Platform team to play a key role in enabling Komodo scalability. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help solve complex challenges and be a part of a great team. Our engineering team is currently about 90 and growing rapidly. You will be able to use one of the biggest, most complete healthcare datasets to solve real world problems that deliver value to clients and positive impact on the world.\xa0Some of the tools we use are: Python, Snowflake, Airflow, AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Spark, AWS EKS, and Docker.', 'As one of the members of this business-critical team, you will:', 'Write code to ingest new data sources at high scale', 'Help operate existing data sources', 'Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'Python development', 'Nice to have:', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion frameworkWrite code to ingest new data sources at high scaleHelp operate existing data sources', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'After three months, you will:\xa0', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.', 'Basic knowledge (college level or hands on) of machine learning and statistics.', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0', '5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0', 'What you bring to Komodo Health:\xa0', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.']

['As a Data Scientist in our Decision Sciences R&D organization, you will be responsible for researching and building optimization, control theory, simulation, and machine learning applications to extend Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform. Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform analyzes anonymized data at Internet scale and evaluates more than one trillion advertising opportunities per month in real-time. You will work on real-world problems as part of our highly collaborative R&D team, and your solutions will directly and rapidly impact our business.\xa0This includes analyzing raw source data and derived data; researching and developing models, algorithms, and applications; building tools and analyses for new and existing products; and presenting findings.', 'External Title: Data ScientistInternal Title: Decision Science Scientist\xa0', 'Participate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasets', 'Use your optimization, control theory, simulation, or machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problems', 'External Title:', 'Internal Title:', 'Design, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters', 'Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization Platform', '\xa0RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasetsUse your optimization, control theory, simulation, or machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problemsDesign, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clustersWork with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization PlatformParticipate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects']

job_title: Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up
job_text: ['', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniquesProfessional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and mungingProfessional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQueryExperience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modelingA self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value CreationExperience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', "Orama are proud to announce their exclusive partnership with an AI Marketing Software Start-up who are tipped to be one of the biggest success stories of 2021. Their unique value proposition allows enterprise companies to understand and predict their customers' buying habits/patterns combining data gained from omnichannel marketing tech with the latest machine learning advances. Following their recent addtion of $40m+ round of funding, they are looking to hire a Data Science specialist who can help create value within their largest customers by deriving insights from data. This is a unique opportunity to play a pivotal role in their growth - GET IN TOUCH NOW!", 'Experience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)', 'Professional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and munging', 'Professional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.", 'Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQuery', 'You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.', 'A self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value Creation', 'Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up', '.', 'Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0', 'Desired Skills and Experience', 'You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniques', 'Basic $100K-150K + bonus + Stock + Benefits', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', 'Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.", 'Experience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling']

['', 'Preferred Qualifications', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Conduct code reviews and document best practices', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming languages and associated frameworks: C++, Python/Django, JavaScript/Node.js, or Ruby on Rails', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical, problem solving, and communication skills', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze a feature in production using analytics and testing', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform software life-cycle activities to ensure highest level of system performance, availability and compliance', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge/experience with full stack application development with particular emphasis on clean UX/UI', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of relational and non-relational database, experience in deployment', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of experience developing and designing complex, interactive software systems', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in cloud service infrastructure and operations', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrable experience in app development and deployment (Android, iOS, cross-platform)', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Awareness of security concerns', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with agile cross-functional teams (Product, UX/UI, Mechatronics, the specialties listed above) in product development projects', 'Minimum Qualifications', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Define, design, develop, and implement high quality software solutions in all layers of the application stack, from infrastructure to front-end', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performed as a team or tech lead', 'Your role will focus on designing, building, and working on the backend system that enables these interactions. You will work closely with dedicated front end developers and designers to allow users to interact on a variety of interfaces and in different roles. You will work with robotics engineers to deploy new capabilities and develop a monitoring and analytics infrastructure.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop infrastructure enabling data collection, auditing, and real-time monitoring', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop infrastructure coordinating inputs from multiple interacting clients on mobile and desktop', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in healthcare, life sciences, or medical organizations', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building consumer facing products and services', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design protocols and APIs between system components including server/client interactions and APIs', '\xa0', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work in fast paced environment to deliver well-designed high-quality code on time', '\xa0We are looking for software engineers who can develop and maintain an infrastructure that enables timely, rich, and robust interactions between users and autonomous agents. These interactions will enable users in a healthcare context to access the benefits of robotic technology–streamlining experiences and providing assistance. The system will coordinate communication, requests, authorization, and capabilities among multiple simultaneous users.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for Robotics', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field', 'Responsibilities', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Support Continuous Integration Continuous Deployment (CICD)', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong understanding of data structures, object-oriented design, and algorithms', 'UBTECH ROBOTICS, a global leading AI robotics company, is looking for top notch Software Engineers to join the team in Los Angeles. You will have the unique hybrid opportunity to work both on the new line of Enterprise service robots and also grow our talented North America Research and Development Center team to drive our innovative next-generation service robots. The R&D team is made up of an incredibly diverse set of skilled researchers and engineers with different areas of expertise including Autonomous Navigation, Perception and Computer Vision, Human-Robot Interaction and NLP, Manipulation and Control, and Mechatronics. The ideal candidate has a successful track record in productizing applications and will be able to work hand in hand with the team to deliver the newest cutting edge AI robotic ecosystem.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with ROS systems', 'Full Stack Developer', 'Principal positions available based on experience']

['', 'Requirements:', 'B2B SaaS', 'Electronics', 'A New York based startup marketing technology organization is actively looking for a Principal Software Engineer to join the team to build scalable APIs directed on supporting creative functions for clients’ email marketing teams. ['', 'Must have ability to communicate effectively both orally and in writing; negotiate complex and/or sensitive issues; and maintain good working relations.', 'Applies new methods, concepts, standards, and practices for IT, data analytics and visualization, machine learning, AI, cyber, and C4 matters across USG Agency operations to provide mission assurance and shared situational awareness.', 'Must have advanced skill in analytically articulating and negotiating very complex and sensitive issues with officials of diverse perspectives and often with different or opposing views. Expert ability to negotiate and defend findings and gain executive support for new program concepts.', 'U.S. citizenship is required. AFCS is an equal opportunity employer', 'To be considered qualified your resume must reflect the requirements listed below.', 'Must have skill to lead advanced study teams composed of industry, government, and academic experts; originate new ideas, projects, and methodologies; and execute projects and/or studies within established financial and/or time constraints.', "As the Command Chief Data Officer, employee is the authoritative representative who directs, manages, and leads pioneering efforts in developing advanced theories, innovative applications, new scientific principles, and solution options (ex., material, non-material, and policy alternatives) for C4 shortfalls, Key Global and National missions, International and Congressional policy, and the Command's Strategic Deterrence, Integrated Missile Defense (IMD), and Nuclear Command and Control (NC2) missions.", "The Air Force Civilian Service is currently looking for a Command Chief Data Officer, Command, Control, Communications, and Computer (C4) Systems Directorate and Command's Chief Information Officer (CIO) at Offutt AFB, Bellevue, Nebraska.", 'Identifies the need for special projects and initiates milestones and goals. Evaluates reports by analyzing data and performing appropriate research and prepares detailed responses. Directs research, data science, and AI efforts, determines/recommends appropriate courses of actions on pertinent issues.', 'As the U.S. Air Force leads in Air, Space, and Cyberspace are you ready to lead as an Operations Research Analyst (data Scientist)?', 'U.S. citizenship required ', 'To receive additional information about current and future job openings or future hiring events our AFCS recruiters will be attending, copy and paste the following link into your Internet browser: https://afciviliancareers.com/careers/', 'Duties include:', 'Must have expert professional knowledge of quantitative techniques and methods used to conceptualize, develop, adapt, modify, and apply new models to resolve the most difficult problems and to achieve support for alternative solutions within the scientific community.', 'Must have ability to plan, organize, direct, and lead the functions and staff of a branch and/or study team tasked to originate new ideas, projects, and methodologies.', "Reviews, evaluates, and interprets other agencies' C4, big data, cybersecurity, and AI studies of operations and capabilities and adapts results to solutions and to command mission requirements. Coordinates with appropriate departmental staffs to develop corrective measures to systems and processes that institutionalize corrective actions and modify independent oversight mechanisms to preclude similar deficiencies in the future.", 'Must have advanced knowledge and skill of a broad range of defense department or private sector C4 systems, big data analytics, machine learning, AI, cognitive science, programs, operations, strategies, tactics, resource and information processes, force structure, and weapons systems', 'Must be able to obtain and maintain a Top Secret security clearance', 'Top Secret', '\xa0', 'Must be able to obtain and maintain a Top Secret security clearanceMust have expert professional knowledge of quantitative techniques and methods used to conceptualize, develop, adapt, modify, and apply new models to resolve the most difficult problems and to achieve support for alternative solutions within the scientific community.Must have advanced knowledge and skill of a broad range of defense department or private sector C4 systems, big data analytics, machine learning, AI, cognitive science, programs, operations, strategies, tactics, resource and information processes, force structure, and weapons systemsMust have advanced skill in analytically articulating and negotiating very complex and sensitive issues with officials of diverse perspectives and often with different or opposing views. Expert ability to negotiate and defend findings and gain executive support for new program concepts.Must have skill to lead advanced study teams composed of industry, government, and academic experts; originate new ideas, projects, and methodologies; and execute projects and/or studies within established financial and/or time constraints.Must have skill to develop and utilize appropriate data collection techniques and design, build, and use models and simulation techniques.Must have ability to plan, organize, direct, and lead the functions and staff of a branch and/or study team tasked to originate new ideas, projects, and methodologies.Must have ability to communicate effectively both orally and in writing; negotiate complex and/or sensitive issues; and maintain good working relations.', 'Requirements: ', 'Must have skill to develop and utilize appropriate data collection techniques and design, build, and use models and simulation techniques.', 'This GS-15 position manages, plans, prioritizes, leads/directs and is an authoritative representative on highly technical and specialized Command, Control, Communications, and Computer (C4), data and analytics, visualization, machine learning, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and cybersecurity analyses of marked difficulty, responsibility, and national significance within each Command mission area as directed.']

On top of this, we also offer a 401(k) plan with company match.', 'What’s in this for you?', 'Invest in your success.', 'At least 7 years experience as a professional software developerProven track record of building complete, well-organized and tested web applicationsStrong understanding of modern software architectureExperience with Java and Angular 2+Experience with full-stack JS, React, Node.jsExperience with SQL and NoSQL databasesModern development tools and processes (Git, Scrum, Jira) Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skillsExperience handling large datasets in a web environment\xa0Experience with AWS', 'Strong understanding of modern software architecture', '\ufeff', 'Writing a best-in-class web application', 'Providing guidance to more junior developers', 'Live well = Work well.\xa0Relax with our Personal Responsibility Paid Time Off policy where you don’t have to accrue time off in order to take it!', 'Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills', 'Lead Software Engineer', 'Responsibilities: ']

['', 'We have a proven successful model, experiencing tremendous growth and are now looking at ways to streamline and scale. This is where technology and you come in. In the near term we want to enhance the relationships built with our clients by augmenting the human intelligence of our Care Guide’s with artificial intelligence and self service solutions. Find ways to use technology and data to extend reach, improve efficiency, and efficacy of our solutions and services.', 'React.js on the front end', 'Golang on the backend', 'Technology we use today:', "Bachelor's and/or Masters in computer science OR related field of study3+ years experience in post graduate software development (fulltime non-internship)Advanced proficiency in at least one (any) language.Proficiency in at least one (any) database technology.Desire and ability to learn the tech we use and the new tech we will be using in the future.", 'Who we are:', 'Homethrive provides technology, care management, and personal assistance services to help aging loved ones thrive at home with dignity and purpose while reducing the stress and workload on family members who support them. Homethrive matches each', 'Proficiency in at least one (any) database technology.', 'client and their family with one of its master’s level social workers (Care Guide) who develops an ongoing trusted relationship with the family. Homethrive’s Care Guide provides expert coaching to help seniors embrace healthy behaviors and help family members anticipate and better handle the challenges of supporting and aging loved one. Homethrive’s Care Guide also recommends and coordinates any necessary third-party services to provide meals, transportation, home care, medication delivery or other services.', 'Job Description Summary:', 'MySQL, MongoDB and Elastic search databases', "Bachelor's and/or Masters in computer science OR related field of study", 'Golang on the backendReact.js on the front endMySQL, MongoDB and Elastic search databasesFlutter for cross platform native app development.Cloud hosting on AWS using a mixture of Docker on Elastic-beanstalk and serverless architecture along with other services like S3, RDS, Lex, etc.', 'Over 10,000 people are turning 65 each day. 80% of whom desire to age in place at their home with dignity and independence, resulting in over $100 billion spent annually on at-home care. Homethrive is looking to disrupt the traditional care model and provide enhanced holistic solutions to our aging population.', 'We are looking for more tech savvy, innovative, full stack polygots who love problem solving and just making things work better. Software engineers with the foundational skills and the desire/ability to learn the latest tech should apply. This position can be partial/full remote.', 'Cloud hosting on AWS using a mixture of Docker on Elastic-beanstalk and serverless architecture along with other services like S3, RDS, Lex, etc.', 'All technology decisions are made together as a team always utilizing the best technological solutions available for the task at hand (we will be expanding to Rust/WASM development soon). We promote an Agile development environment with test driven development and continuous integration, leveraging communication over documentation and where the only measurement of progress is working software.', 'Flutter for cross platform native app development.', 'Homethrive is a very well-funded startup, offering competitive pay and full benefits, with a small versatile technology team. We are looking to at least double the team size this year and quadruple it by 2021. As a team we develop and own all of our software/technology and data in house only relying on 3rd party integrations/services where it makes sense.', '3+ years experience in post graduate software development (fulltime non-internship)', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Desire and ability to learn the tech we use and the new tech we will be using in the future.', 'Advanced proficiency in at least one (any) language.']

['', '**No 3rd parties please**', 'Qualifications:', 'The QA Engineer will be a member of a self-organizing agile testing team and will be responsible mainly for developing automated test scripts to be executed regularly during intra-sprint testing as well as performance testing as needed. This role will work closely with business, development and project management departments to ensure that the stories included in each sprint are thoroughly vetted and the product produced is fit for use.', 'Job Summary for AWS Cloud QA Engineer', 'Job Summary for Data Informatica QA Engineer', 'Experience testing in AWS cloud environment. AWS certification is a plus.Experience with Cloud technology implementation on AWS cloud-based environment.Toolset still similar: TestRail, Selenium, Java, JavaScript, Oracle, PL/SQL, UNIX, SoapUI, Jira, Swagger, Postman, Soap/Restful Services', 'Looking for a QA ETL resource that has strong data analysis skills ETL Informatica, data warehouse and reporting QS skills are essential. Cognos and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) skills are preferred', 'Experience testing in AWS cloud environment. AWS certification is a plus.', 'Toolset still similar: TestRail, Selenium, Java, JavaScript, Oracle, PL/SQL, UNIX, SoapUI, Jira, Swagger, Postman, Soap/Restful Services', "We're an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status. We cannot consider your application if you will require sponsorship for work authorization now or in the future.", 'Qualifications', 'Experience with Cloud technology implementation on AWS cloud-based environment.', '\xa0', 'Keyot is hiring for multiple Automation QA Engineers located in Texas or Minnesota for our Client. The ideal candidate must have AWS, Cloud and Automation/Selenium experience.\xa0In addition the client is seeking candidates with strong data testing and Informatica experience for one of the openings. ', 'Keyot is hiring for multiple Automation QA Engineers located in Texas or Minnesota for our Client. The ideal candidate must have AWS, Cloud and Automation/Selenium experience.\xa0In addition the client is seeking candidates with strong data testing and Informatica experience for one of the openings. Candidates can be located in the Minneapolis/St. Paul, MN, or Dallas/Fort Worth, TX, metro areas.\xa0This is a 6-month contract-to-hire job. W2 only candidates, no 3rd parties please.']

['', 'Proficiency in your favorite programming language.', 'A Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is a software developer with the primary responsibility of writing automated tools and frameworks to assess the quality of our products.\xa0 You’ll be writing code that automatically verifies and quantifies the quality of the 1upHealth FHIR-based API platform and applications. SDETs are able to understand software internals, debug code, automate repetitive tasks, and implement required automation to streamline our software quality process.\xa0', '1upHealth is an award-winning health technology company located in Boston, MA.\xa0 We deliver a platform that makes it extremely easy for developers to create healthcare applications with data aggregated from electronic health records. Specifically we are building standards-based API, provider, and patient facing products that will be the future platform for healthcare applications. 1upHealth was recently honored as the Mass Challenge Health Tech Diamond Award winner in June, 2019.', 'Knowledge of web application architectures in AWS, Azure, or GCP.\xa0\xa0', 'Demonstrable ability to develop automated API tests, tools, and frameworks.', 'BS/MS Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience.', 'Bonus points for experience in the following areas:', 'Software security testing techniques.', 'Agile SCRUM methodologies.', 'BS/MS Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience.Strong understanding of software QA methodologies and strategies.Demonstrable ability to develop automated API tests, tools, and frameworks.Significant experience automating feature, regression, and performance testing.Knowledge of web application architectures in AWS, Azure, or GCP.\xa0\xa0Proficiency in your favorite programming language.Ability to articulate technical challenges and solutions.Desire to have fun and have an impact.', 'Strong understanding of software QA methodologies and strategies.', 'As a collaborative member on the 1upHealth Engineering team, you will bring significant experience testing and deploying commercial web applications that operate at scale, including:', 'Desire to have fun and have an impact.', 'Significant experience automating feature, regression, and performance testing.', '\xa0', 'DevOps practices using CI/CD code pipelines.', 'Agile SCRUM methodologies.Software security testing techniques.DevOps practices using CI/CD code pipelines.Digital healthcare technologies and data standards such as HL7 FHIR', 'Ability to articulate technical challenges and solutions.', 'Digital healthcare technologies and data standards such as HL7 FHIR']

['Typical Qualifications', 'Summary', 'Principal Data Scientist', ' Advanced degree required in a relevant field such as (PhD, MS) in computer science, data science, math, statistics and other related disciplines.  7+ years of experience including 5+ years of professional experience in some or all aspects of designing, building, training, deploying and evaluating machine learning models in production software environments at scale  Expertise in leveraging advanced techniques in areas such as deep learning, NLP, classification, predictive modeling, etc.  Proficiency with Python and/or other programming languages, e.g., Perl, C/C++, java, etc.  Proficiency with data analysis and modeling tools, e.g., python, Jupyter, R, RStudio, and libraries like tensorflow and pyTorch. You are a data aficionado with a passion for machine learning and automation. ", "We are looking for a Principal Data Scientist who will serve as a senior member for client health's data scientists focused on machine learning, predictive analytics and related projects. ['', 'ABOUT THE ROLE', 'Stock Options', 'While our downtown Chicago office and workshop is a space where employees can meet, work, and use our products, we are a remote-first company and welcome talent located across the country.', 'Experience with React and Redux or similar libraries', 'Familiarity with AWS or similar cloud hosting services', 'ABOUT INVENTABLES', 'Experience with test-driven development', 'Experience with Ruby on Rails', 'BENIFETS & PERKS', 'We value the things that make us different and believe a diverse company drives innovation.\xa0Inventables\xa0provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants, and prohibits discrimination of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'Experience mentoring other developers', 'Experience building a production web application5+ years of software engineering experienceCurious, creative, and collaborativeExperience with Javascript, HTML, and CSSExperience with test-driven developmentExperience mentoring other developers', 'Extend Easel to support new 3D carving machines with new capabilities', 'Experience building CAD/CAM software or 2D or 3D graphic design software', 'Help the team iterate our development practices and continuously improve our execution', 'Experience working in software-as-a-service businesses or experience with woodworking or crafting', 'How we work', 'Inventables is a 3D carving company working to ignite a new product revolution by bringing manufacturing capability into the hands of millions of people. We’re doing this by building accessible tools for makers—including X-Carve, our affordable carving machine, and Easel, our easy-to-use design software. Together, Easel and X-Carve help makers of all experience levels create products out of a variety of materials, ranging from beautiful hardwoods to colorful acrylics.', 'Evolve our infrastructure to automate tasks and improve our ability to monitor and troubleshoot our software', 'Mentor other team members in software design and development', 'Annual “creative project budget” to help you stay creative', 'Paid parental leave', 'Preferred', 'We work collaboratively and iterate constantly. We use Javascript, React, WebGL, Ruby on Rails, and Node, and we deploy multiple times a day.', 'BCBS Health Insurance', 'Experience with React and Redux or similar librariesExperience with Ruby on RailsFamiliarity with AWS or similar cloud hosting servicesFamiliarity with the Linux command lineExperience building CAD/CAM software or 2D or 3D graphic design softwareExperience working in software-as-a-service businesses or experience with woodworking or crafting', 'Experience building a production web application', '401(k) program\xa0', 'Curious, creative, and collaborative', 'Collaborate with our Design, Product, Marketing, and Customer Success teams to identify the best ways our software can help scale our business', 'Flexible Accrued Vacation (“Take what you need” vacation policy)', 'Required', 'Familiarity with the Linux command line', 'You’ll have a real impact—you’ll help us grow our team and its capabilities, and the code you write will be used by thousands of people every day, including small business owners, crafters, hobbyists, and students.', 'BCBS Health Insurance401(k) program\xa0Stock OptionsAnnual “exploration budget” to feed your curiosityAnnual “creative project budget” to help you stay creativeAnnual conference budgetWeekly R&D days — spend your Fridays learning, experimenting, and working on projects of your choosingPaid parental leaveFlexible Accrued Vacation (“Take what you need” vacation policy)', 'Make improvements to help people use our tools confidently and successfully', 'Annual conference budget', 'Weekly R&D days — spend your Fridays learning, experimenting, and working on projects of your choosing', 'Build features that make it easier to create, share, and remix designs', 'ABOUT YOU', 'Annual “exploration budget” to feed your curiosity', 'Our team is growing & we’re looking for Software Engineers interested in working on one of the most creative and exciting products on the market! As a Senior Software Engineer at Inventables, you’ll help develop Easel, our web-based software that makes it easy to design and carve three-dimensional objects. You’ll encounter—and help solve—a variety of interesting technical and conceptual challenges. You will:', 'Experience with Javascript, HTML, and CSS', '5+ years of software engineering experience', 'Build features that make it easier to create, share, and remix designsMake improvements to help people use our tools confidently and successfullyExtend Easel to support new 3D carving machines with new capabilitiesEvolve our infrastructure to automate tasks and improve our ability to monitor and troubleshoot our softwareCollaborate with our Design, Product, Marketing, and Customer Success teams to identify the best ways our software can help scale our businessMentor other team members in software design and developmentHelp the team iterate our development practices and continuously improve our execution', 'We believe in making time for exploration and innovation. We set aside every Friday for each engineer to experiment with new technologies or work on problems they think are important. In addition we provide every employee with a carving machine and their own creative project budget.']

['', 'Linux system engineering experience', 'Installation/Deployment level knowledge of one of the following email security technologies: Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA), Ironport, Barracuda, Mimecast, Proofpoint, Sonicwall Email Security', 'Required Product Knowledge and Technical Skills:\xa0', 'Experience troublshooting mail flow issues', 'In this role, you will be responsible for providing technical assistance to customers. The role is part implementation engineering, and part technical account management. This team is responsible for providing white glove service to customers who recently purchased the Cisco Email Security Appliance product. The team helps customers overcome technical barriers they might experience as they deploy and use the new product. The candidate is not required to have experience with that tool, as long as they have been responsible for installing/implementing many email security devices throughout their career.  This Engineer has the skills of a seasoned, experienced professional with a full understanding of industry practices and company policies and procedures and resolves a wide range of issues in imaginative as well as practical ways. These issues often include product bugs, DNS issues, network configurations problems, and assistance with complex product configurations, performance tuning and optimization, troubleshooting delivery/connectivity issues and training the customer on unfamiliar features.', 'Linux system engineering experienceInstallation/Deployment level knowledge of one of the following email security technologies: Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA), Ironport, Barracuda, Mimecast, Proofpoint, Sonicwall Email SecurityStandard protocols such as SMTP, DNS, FTP, SSH, TCP/IPExperience troublshooting mail flow issues', 'Required Product Knowledge and Technical Skills:', 'Role & Responsibilities', 'Standard protocols such as SMTP, DNS, FTP, SSH, TCP/IP']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Big Data Platform
job_text: ['', 'A Little Bit About Us', ' Architect, build real-time batch data pipelines and data aggregation systems to deliver quality real-time analytical reports for our internal and external customers. Collaborate with Data Scientists, Backend Engineers, Data & Infrastructure Operations, and Products Managers to deliver new Data Platform capabilities. Develop clean, safe, testable, and cost-efficient solutions. Make well-informed decisions with deep knowledge of both the internal and external impacts on teams and projects. Foresee shortcomings ahead of time and be able to drive to resolution. ', 'As a Senior Software Engineer - Big Data Platform, you’ll get to:', ' BS in Computer Science or equivalent 8+ years experience, 3+ in Big Data Engineering Strong development skills in Java or Scala Solid background in the fundamentals of computer science, distributed systems, large scale data processing as well as a mastery of database designs and data warehousing. Practical experience managing AWS Cloud environments Experience in containerized deployment or Kubernetes is a big plus! Good understanding of a broad spectrum of NoSQL, traditional RDBMS, and analytical/columnar data stores including Postgres, Druid, Vertica, Redshift, Hadoop, Hive, Cassandra, Aerospike, and Redis Ability to build systems that balance scalability, availability, and latency. Strong ability to advocate for the continual deployment and automation tools, monitoring, and self-healing systems that can help improve the lives of our engineers. 'Passionate about developing software to advance drug discovery', 'Silicon Therapeutics (“SITX”) is a privately held, physics-driven integrated drug discovery compa-ny in the preclinical IND stage targeting innate immunity to start, but with the capability to move into many other franchise opportunities. The Company’s initial pipeline is focused on modulation of the innate immune system to “light the spark” within immunologically cold tumors by using its physics-enabled drug discovery engine for the design of small molecule therapeutics and the lead program is in late stage preclinical studies. SITX’s discovery efforts as well as physics-based plat-form are all completely in-house, with a full wet lab as well as a team of over 25 experienced R&D professionals spanning biology, biochemistry, chemistry, biophysics (NMR + X-ray) & preclinical sciences. SITX’s engine leverages quantum mechanics and molecular dynamics, which are de-ployed on its own internal supercomputer composed of over 400 GPU’s and FPGA’s and allows SITX to accurately simulate the physical motion and properties of biological targets at an atomistic level resolution. The platform is completely proprietary to SITX and was built from the ground up with the purpose of addressing difficult targets and using simulations to break through bottlenecks that has plagued traditional drug discovery approaches on such targets. It is currently the ONLY company which owns the entire spectrum of physics-driven drug discovery from chip-to-clinic with a team of over 60 individuals in Boston.', 'Conceptualize, implement, and maintain software engineering best practices', 'Demonstrated track record of overcoming challenging problems', "The Company’s initial focus is on innate immunity and its pipeline is currently composed of one project entering IND-enabling studies, another one entering hit-to-lead and two more ramping up. It's unique advantage in designing small molecules using all atom simulations has allowed it to advance a systemically available small molecule STING agonist into a preclinical development. The program is ramping up for IND enabling studies entry to the clinic in 2020. This differentiated product can be administered systemically via an IV dose and has single agent effects in early mouse efficacy studies using PD1 resistant tumor models and is a “rule-of-5” compliant small molecule. Beyond this one program, the Company is also advancing an ADAR inhibitor which can be considered an innate immune checkpoint as well as a multitude of targets that explore Innate Immunity’s role in cancer biology.", 'Experience in using/deploying workflow frameworks such as Airflow, CWL, etc.\xa0', 'Ability to mentor other software engineers and manage outsourced software development projectsExperience with parallel programming, especially data-parallel, using MPI, OpenMP, OpenACC or CUDA C/C++/FortranExperience working with containersAbility to manage HPC clusters (CPU and GPU based)Experience in using/deploying workflow frameworks such as Airflow, CWL, etc.\xa0Experience with scientific computing systems and schedulersPassionate about developing software to advance drug discovery', 'Flexible work hours to accommodate colleagues in China', 'Ability to manage HPC clusters (CPU and GPU based)', 'Create, integrate, and maintain databases for storage and access of results', 'Additional Preferred Qualifications', 'Boston, MA', 'Company Overview', 'Strong knowledge of Python', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience working with containers']

However, you must be authorized to work in the United States or Canada and ideally are in the Eastern or Central time zones.', 'Experience presenting to stakeholders, executives, and/or board members, displaying expertise in a product and its users', 'Bonus', 'Sales enablement: participate as product lead in customer-facing sales meetings', 'Experience working in an Agile product development environment', 'Early or growth stage startups', 'Productization of data', 'Lead post-launch tracking and reporting to stakeholders to measure engagement, user feedback, satisfaction, and decrease error rates', 'Create sketches or diagrams to shape ideas and drive feature development', 'Write product-focused user stories, technical tasks, and shape work with team members', 'Own and track business outcomes related to the product', 'Understanding of A11Y, assistive devices, Web, Apple, and Android accessibility principles to make products more accessible', 'Initiate and drive User Experience Validation, Unit Testing, and QA Testing for features to assess user and client satisfaction and highlight remaining technical issues', '8+ years of experience in technology or software development', 'Expertise with managing expectations for SaaS, B2B, or Enterprise-grade projects including technical expectations and modern software capabilities', 'Untappd is looking for an experienced Product Manager to anchor our newly forming Data & Insights team. The team will build and operate a data pipeline and data warehouse along with business intelligence and machine learning infrastructure. They will serve internal BI needs, build data-driven product-facing capabilities and will productize data and insights for external B2B customers. In this role, the Product Manager will work with the team’s lead engineer and senior leadership, meeting with internal and external customers to understand data needs. Early projects will involve wrangling existing data and ad-hoc data analysis - serving customers and learning from those experiences to determine the product strategy for ‘productized data’.', 'Responsibilities', 'Integrating sales and marketing automation platforms (e.g. Salesforce, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, CDPs such as Evergage or Segment.com)Productization of dataEarly or growth stage startupsExperience working within the alcoholic beverage industryDegree in business management, computer science or related field a plusCPM, PMP, CAPM, CSPO and/or PMI-ACP certification a plus', 'Collaborate with Data Analysts, Data Scientists, and internal specialists to test assumptions and validate proofs of concept', 'Communicate product readiness for new products, features, and changes', 'Ability to present concepts, sell solutions to stakeholders, and make informed decisions']

job_title: Data Engineer - Orlando and Surrounding area
job_text: ['', ' Handle multiple priorities simultaneously', 'Data Engineer Role', ' Be Supported: A large network of industry experts, internal training platform, and external learning opportunities to grow your skills and experience.', ' Be Rewarded: A competitive salary and instant vesting on 401k are only a few of the rewards for a job well done.', ' Provide technical requirements to the data engineering team for conversion of business requirements to reporting data layer.', ' 5+ years’ experience in designing and implementing the data structures (conceptual, logical, physical & dimensional models) for reporting tools like MicroStrategy, Tableau or any reporting tools', ' Be a Team: Team outings, happy hours, passion presentations, volunteer opportunities, meetups, etc. we are creating a community to continuously share and grow as a team.', ' Be Inspired - Collaborative workspace, personal days, paid birthday off, and vacation time to keep your mind fresh and ready to take on the next new idea.', 'Experience', ' Perform data analysis, data modeling and data design tasks / transformation on complicated datasets with potentially complex data integration scenarios related to reporting.', ' 8+ years database, data integration experience', ' Heavy, In-Depth Database Knowledge – SQL and NoSQL.', ' Be knowledgeable in visualization tools data requirements for MicroStrategy / Tableau', ' Proven track record working with complex, interrelated systems and bringing that data together on Big Data platforms.', ' 3+ years’ experience with Hadoop, SQL, and Big Data solutions', 'What do you get out of this?', 'Primary Responsibilities', '  Convert business requirements into Reporting Data layer design for Business Intelligence tools.  Provide technical requirements to the data engineering team for conversion of business requirements to reporting data layer.  Develop reporting data layer for business intelligence tools like MicroStrategy and Tableau using big data platform databases / querying (like Impala, Hive, Kudu) as well as modern cloud data warehouse like Snowflake.  Perform data analysis, data modeling and data design tasks / transformation on complicated datasets with potentially complex data integration scenarios related to reporting.  Build data structures / database objects and data blending technologies to support data harmonization and provide data to MicroStrategy / Tableau and self-service reporting templates. ', '  8+ years database, data integration experience  3+ years’ experience with Hadoop, SQL, and Big Data solutions  5+ years’ experience in designing and implementing the data structures (conceptual, logical, physical & dimensional models) for reporting tools like MicroStrategy, Tableau or any reporting tools  Supporting data enablement for enterprise Business Intelligence solutions using one or more of the following EDW platforms: Big Data Platforms / HANA / BW / Snowflake  Development experience in using Big Data solutions using open source technologies within the Hadoop ecosystem such as: Impala, Hive, Spark, Pig, etc.  Strong knowledge of scripting to support data requirements  Strong knowledge of reporting related data security principles  Proven track record working with complex, interrelated systems and bringing that data together on Big Data platforms.  Be knowledgeable in visualization tools data requirements for MicroStrategy / Tableau  Heavy, In-Depth Database Knowledge – SQL and NoSQL. ', ' Development experience in using Big Data solutions using open source technologies within the Hadoop ecosystem such as: Impala, Hive, Spark, Pig, etc.', ' Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams', '  Be Healthy - Health, dental, and vision offered through top tier providers and sick leave to keep you feeling at the top of your game.  Be Inspired - Collaborative workspace, personal days, paid birthday off, and vacation time to keep your mind fresh and ready to take on the next new idea.  Be Rewarded: A competitive salary and instant vesting on 401k are only a few of the rewards for a job well done.  Be Supported: A large network of industry experts, internal training platform, and external learning opportunities to grow your skills and experience.  Be a Team: Team outings, happy hours, passion presentations, volunteer opportunities, meetups, etc. we are creating a community to continuously share and grow as a team.', ' Build data structures / database objects and data blending technologies to support data harmonization and provide data to MicroStrategy / Tableau and self-service reporting templates.', '  Handle multiple priorities simultaneously  Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams  Establish and maintain a working environment conducive to positive morale, individual style, quality, creativity, and teamwork  Ability to work in a fast-paced, team environment ', ' Convert business requirements into Reporting Data layer design for Business Intelligence tools.', ' Establish and maintain a working environment conducive to positive morale, individual style, quality, creativity, and teamwork', ' Supporting data enablement for enterprise Business Intelligence solutions using one or more of the following EDW platforms: Big Data Platforms / HANA / BW / Snowflake', ' Develop reporting data layer for business intelligence tools like MicroStrategy and Tableau using big data platform databases / querying (like Impala, Hive, Kudu) as well as modern cloud data warehouse like Snowflake.', ' Ability to work in a fast-paced, team environment', ' Be Healthy - Health, dental, and vision offered through top tier providers and sick leave to keep you feeling at the top of your game.', 'About Pandera', ' Strong knowledge of scripting to support data requirements', ' Strong knowledge of reporting related data security principles', 'Essential Functions']

['', 'apply now!', "As a Software Engineer for Point & Pay, you will need to have a track record of delivering excellent software. You must be self-disciplined, passionate about innovation, and committed to a positive customer experience. In this role, you will be designing, building, and maintaining the Point & Pay software and features (JEE/J2EE & GUI). You'll also be identifying bottlenecks and bugs, assisting with the design and use of automated unit and integration testing, and maintaining code quality and organization. The success of our Software Engineers is measured on the performance, quality, and responsiveness of our applications & features.", 'Software Engineer', 'Point & Pay', 'Experience in the following:', 'Point & Pay, a wholly owned subsidiary of North American Bancard, designs, builds, and integrates advanced payment solutions for governments, utility companies, courts, HOAs, property management companies and other industries with unique payment needs. It’s simple. We make paying bills easier. Everything we do is backed by our best-in-class user interfaces, insightful features and high-quality service and support. We partner with your agency to provide audited, redundant, and compliant payment solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences for your organization’s most mission-critical functions. With over 20 years in business, over 3000 government related clients and millions of transactions completed, we’re proud to offer the best in-class services that help move our clients forward.', 'Using revision control systems such as Git or Subversion.', 'At North American Bancard, we celebrate diversity and create an inclusive environment for everyone. We are an equal opportunity employer.', 'Creating graphical user interfaces (GUI) using such tools as React, Flux, JSP, HTML, Tag Libraries, JavaScript or any other Java GUI framework', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience and technical trainingExperience in the following:Analyzing, designing and implementing solutions using JEE (J2EE) or other technology suite depending on specific job need (e.g. Ruby, C#, etc.)Designing/writing systems with a relational database such as Oracle, PostgresDB, or SQL Server.Creating graphical user interfaces (GUI) using such tools as React, Flux, JSP, HTML, Tag Libraries, JavaScript or any other Java GUI frameworkUsing revision control systems such as Git or Subversion.Writing automated unit tests using JUnit or similar.Designing and developing complex Web Systems.', 'Point & Pay in Oldsmar, FL ', 'Designing/writing systems with a relational database such as Oracle, PostgresDB, or SQL Server.', 'Designing and developing complex Web Systems.', '\ufeff', 'Writing automated unit tests using JUnit or similar.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience and technical training', 'What we need from you:', "If you're a talented and versatile developer who is eager to get more hands on experience and work for a growing company, apply now!", ' ', 'Analyzing, designing and implementing solutions using JEE (J2EE) or other technology suite depending on specific job need (e.g. Ruby, C#, etc.)']

Certain positions with Forcepoint require access to controlled goods and technologies subject to the International Traffic in Arms Regulations or the Export Administration Regulations. Applicants for these positions may need to be "U.S. Persons," as defined in these regulations. Generally, a "U.S. Person" is a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident, or an individual who has been admitted as a refugee or granted asylum. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at talentcoordinators@forcepoint.com. job_text: ['', ' Design, develop, integrate, test, deploy and maintain software applications', ' We offer competitive benefits and learning and development opportunities.', ' Experience with microservices, containers and software development and delivery', " Experience in design, development, or testing of weapons systems * Current TS/SCI What We Can Offer You: * We've been named a Best Place to Work by the Washington Post.", " For over 55 years, the principles of CACI's unique, character-based culture have been the driving force behind our success. CACI is proud to provide dynamic careers for employees worldwide. CACI is an Equal Opportunity Employer - Females/Minorities/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.", ' Experience using a modern JavaScript library/framework (Angular, Bootstrap, Cesium, or software engineering and 7+ years of related experience in software development", ' Design and develop new capabilities/applications', ' Security+ or CISSP', ' Oversee tasking and drive the (UI)s, cross-browser compatibility, general web functions and standards', ' There is no clearance requirement to begin employment. ['', 'Our ideal C# Engineer\xa0II\xa0will have:\xa0', 'Proficiency with Unit Testing, including strong experience creating tests, running tests, and managing outcomes\xa0', 'UI development experience for client-side consumption\xa0', 'We are a fast‐growing health tech company in Orlando that is rapidly transforming healthcare. We are also a team of serial entrepreneurs, health care experts, and tech wizzes, all grounded in a shared passion for improving healthcare and working with great people. Leveraging truly cutting‐edge AI built by a team that previously developed AI systems for Apple, Google, and SpaceX, we are actively helping physicians, hospital systems and health plans dramatically improve patient satisfaction, reduce cost and improve quality.\xa0', 'Experience with Visual Studio (required)\xa0', 'We offer medical, dental and vision insurance, a 401(K), commuter benefits, paid vacation and holidays, flexibility with working hours and many other benefits. For those who are interested, company swag is available.\xa0', 'Note: Given that confidential information will be handled as part of this role, background checks will be performed.', 'Note: Prior C# and Visual Studio experience as well as residing in/near Orlando are required for this role. ', 'C# experience (required)\xa0Experience with Visual Studio (required)\xa0Full Stack experience in Microsoft stack, ASP.Net Core 3.1\xa0Proficiency with Unit Testing, including strong experience creating tests, running tests, and managing outcomes\xa0UI development experience for client-side consumption\xa0Experience with Git, LINQ, Azure and SQL (preferred)\xa0', 'Develop software within Visual Studio including designing, developing, modifying, coding, unit testing, deployment and support\xa0Maintain current applications by implementing new features, troubleshooting and repairing bugs in existing code, performance tuning, and other changes as identified\xa0Create and modify SQL or LINQ database queries\xa0Adhere to security and data protection policies\xa0', "Our products are being used by healthcare organizations around the country, and\xa0we’re\xa0looking for a highly motivated, driven C# Engineer to join our team. You will play an important role in designing our software before it reaches our healthcare customers. Your work will impact the company's mission, and the products you work on will be used by a wide variety of customers, from small physician practices to large hospital systems.\xa0", 'Adhere to security and data protection policies\xa0', 'Verata’s\xa0Orlando office is near UCF (cross streets are Rouse Road & University Boulevard). This role requires work to be done from our office, though we are currently working remotely given COVID.', 'Company location:\xa0', 'Develop software within Visual Studio including designing, developing, modifying, coding, unit testing, deployment and support\xa0', 'Experience with Git, LINQ, Azure and SQL (preferred)\xa0', 'C# experience (required)\xa0', 'Benefits:\xa0', '\xa0', 'Full Stack experience in Microsoft stack, ASP.Net Core 3.1\xa0', 'Maintain current applications by implementing new features, troubleshooting and repairing bugs in existing code, performance tuning, and other changes as identified\xa0', 'Create and modify SQL or LINQ database queries\xa0', 'As a C# Engineer, Level II, you will:\xa0']

With top people in the industry, in a low-latency environment, and to see your code running in production, working for a highly regarded business with excellent career progression.\xa0', 'Experience with C++, python or other mainstream modern programming languages, in low latency Java.', 'The Role;', 'Low Latency Software Engineer C++', 'The primary focus of the role is on the build-out of liquid assets trading strategies in\xa0a highly distributed trading platform covering equities, fx, commodities, mid and intraday, components in the realtime investment platform.', 'Equities, FX, Futures, Options, Fixed income, C++, Java, ultra-low latency trading.', 'Required skills and experience:', 'Proven ability to develop high-quality software at varying levels of experience.\xa0', 'Proven ability to develop high-quality software at varying levels of experience.\xa0Experience with C++, python or other mainstream modern programming languages, in low latency Java.Strong experience working on distributed trading platforms.Strong commercial acumen, how technology affects a PnL and understanding of one or two assets.\xa0Experience with configuration management tools i.e. Chef, Terraform, Puppet, and Ansible Highly motivated and a keen eye for scripting and automation in Python, Ruby, and BashAppreciation of good software architecture, data structures, and algorithms.\xa0Low latency network interfaces and kernel bypassExcellent academics: 2.1 or better in computer science or a numerate subject from a top university is preferred.', 'Appreciation of good software architecture, data structures, and algorithms.\xa0', 'Strong experience working on distributed trading platforms.', '\xa0Experience with configuration management tools i.e. Chef, Terraform, Puppet, and Ansible Highly Technology is at the heart of what they do.', 'Develops components in C++and python.', 'Designing and building new components in the investment pipeline.', '\xa0', 'A global systematic hedge fund based in Chicago is recruiting a software Engineering that is core to the business and systematic trading team. By designing and implementing real-time systems, the engineers are solving some of the world’s most complex financial problems. You will be an enthusiastic, intelligent software engineer who can solve real-world problems.', 'Low latency network interfaces and kernel bypass', 'The Low Latency Platform build-out we are looking for an exceptional developer with a strong academic background to work directly on several components across crucial parts of the realtime investment platform.Develops components in C++and python.The primary focus of the role is on the build-out of liquid assets trading strategies in\xa0a highly distributed trading platform covering equities, fx, commodities, mid and intraday, components in the realtime investment platform.Designing and building new components in the investment pipeline.Improving, optimizing, and extending the capabilities of existing systems.Collaborating with trading and quants daily, the team operates in a fast-paced and continually changing environment. Technology is at the heart of what they do.', 'The Low Latency Platform build-out we are looking for an exceptional developer with a strong academic background to work directly on several components across crucial parts of the realtime investment platform.']

We are a mission-driven company committed to the power of AI, public data, and real-time information as a force for good in the world. Over the last decade, our team has established and refined the leading AI platform for real-time event and risk detection. We surface the earliest signals of unfolding events and emerging risks within an increasingly diverse and complex landscape of publicly available information, enabling more effective risk mitigation strategies, faster response, and better crisis management. Dataminr serves thousands of professionals in 70+ countries by delivering timely, relevant, and actionable alerts to public and private sector organizations around the world.We’ve grown to over 550 talented employees across seven global offices and raised $392 million in funding in our most recent investment round. Our culture promotes cross-team interaction, work-life balance and the sharing of information and ideas because it enables us to do our best work together, make a meaningful contribution, and have fun. Join us and help the world manage risk in real time.Who You AreYou're an experienced software engineer with superb software development skills interested in helping us build reliable systems that deliver actionable information to our customers in real-time. As well as setting technical direction for significant parts of our microservices based architecture, you'll mentor and train other engineers and care about how to make the team more effective every day.What You've Done Before  Built back end systems to manage massive amounts of data.   Demonstrated excellent problem solving skills and solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, including commonly used algorithms and data structures.   Worked with distributed systems using microservices architecture.   Built applications with OO languages (preferably in Java or Scala), using SQL and NoSQL data stores, and run them in containers in a cloud environment.   Led important initiatives and mentored junior engineers.  What Success Looks Like In Your First 6 MonthsIn this role, you will build the services and underlying infrastructure that allows us to deal with terabytes of unstructured data and:  contribute code to production systems from the get-go.   spend time with different parts of the company to understand how Dataminr works.   get up to speed on our tech stack and infrastructure with overview sessions and deep dives with your team.   mentor more junior members of our growing team.   design significant features that impact multiple platforms and apps.   own portions of our product suite and be responsible for reliability and scalability.   bring new ideas to our engineering-wide processes to help us improve constantly.   be influential in planning the next iterations of our architecture as we strive to get more alerts to our clients faster and with near-perfect reliability. Dataminr serves thousands of professionals in 70+ countries by delivering timely, relevant, and actionable alerts to public and private sector organizations around the world.We’ve grown to over 550 talented employees across seven global offices and raised $392 million in funding in our most recent investment round. Our culture promotes cross-team interaction, work-life balance and the sharing of information and ideas because it enables us to do our best work together, make a meaningful contribution, and have fun. Join us and help the world manage risk in real time.Who You AreYou're an experienced software engineer with superb software development skills interested in helping us build reliable systems that deliver actionable information to our customers in real-time. As well as setting technical direction for significant parts of our microservices based architecture, you'll mentor and train other engineers and care about how to make the team more effective every day.What You've Done Before  Built back end systems to manage massive amounts of data.   Demonstrated excellent problem solving skills and solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, including commonly used algorithms and data structures.   Worked with distributed systems using microservices architecture.   Built applications with OO languages (preferably in Java or Scala), using SQL and NoSQL data stores, and run them in containers in a cloud environment.   Led important initiatives and mentored junior engineers.  What Success Looks Like In Your First 6 MonthsIn this role, you will build the services and underlying infrastructure that allows us to deal with terabytes of unstructured data and:  contribute code to production systems from the get-go.   spend time with different parts of the company to understand how Dataminr works.   get up to speed on our tech stack and infrastructure with overview sessions and deep dives with your team.   mentor more junior members of our growing team.   design significant features that impact multiple platforms and apps.   own portions of our product suite and be responsible for reliability and scalability.   bring new ideas to our engineering-wide processes to help us improve constantly.   be influential in planning the next iterations of our architecture as we strive to get more alerts to our clients faster and with near-perfect reliability.  Why You Should Work Here  We recognize and reward hard work with:   company paid benefits for employees and their dependents, including medical, dental, vision, disability and life insurance   401(k) savings plan with company matching   flexible spending account for out-of-pocket medical, transit, parking and dependent care expenses    We want you to be your best, authentic self by supporting you with:   a diverse, driven, and passionate team of coworkers who want you to succeed   individual learning and development fund and professional training   generous paid time off; including sick leave and 100% company paid parental leave   in-office perks such as a kitchen stocked with snacks and beverages, and catered meals   remote working friendly perks such as expanded telehealth options for mental and physical well being, virtual yoga, meditation and health and fitness app reimbursements   …and this is just to name a few!", ' mentor more junior members of our growing team. ', '  Built back end systems to manage massive amounts of data.   Demonstrated excellent problem solving skills and solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, including commonly used algorithms and data structures.   Worked with distributed systems using microservices architecture.   Built applications with OO languages (preferably in Java or Scala), using SQL and NoSQL data stores, and run them in containers in a cloud environment.   Led important initiatives and mentored junior engineers.  ', ' design significant features that impact multiple platforms and apps. ', 'Who We Are', ' spend time with different parts of the company to understand how Dataminr works. ', ' 401(k) savings plan with company matching ']

['', '-Experience developing enterprise grade software with MVC', "Senior .NET Developers and Architects can go anywhere they want! You don't even have to look, job opportunities find you! If you happen to find this one, you may want to take a moment and hear what we have to say! Even if you're comfortable where you're at, doesn't the concept of leading the design and development of enterprise software at the most explosive leader in their industry sound appealing? We need someone bold and experienced enough to establish, estimate, develop, mentor, collaborate, manage, delegate, and LEAD a multi-billion dollar company into their future architecture to dominate their industry! You will be personally and technically rewarded with the budget and the team you need to successfully set the roadmap for our future technology stack while collaborating with some of the best experts in IT.", '-Intimate understanding of SOLID principles', 'Designing, develop, architect enterprise grade software with reusable components (30-50% development)Establish best practices and patterns in software development while creating and enforcing architecture standards', '-8+ years of experience in Software Development (.NET stack required)', '-Familiarity with domain-driven design, CQRS, and event-sourcing', 'SQL, Oracle', 'Designing, develop, architect enterprise grade software with reusable components (30-50% development)', 'ASP.NET, JavaScript, CSS', '.NET stack required', 'SKILLS:', 'Establish best practices and patterns in software development while creating and enforcing architecture standards', '-Experience with UML, BPMN, or other diagraming standards', 'Enterprise Applications Engineer/Architect', 'PDR4 provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, PDR4 complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. PDR4 expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status.', '-Experience establishing coding standards', '-5+ years of experience using web-based technologies (ASP.NET, JavaScript, CSS)', '-Experience in an AGILE environment', '-Relational database design/development experience (SQL, Oracle)', 'MVC']

', '\xa0', '• You conduct or participate in multidisciplinary research and collaborate with equipment designers, FW engineers, software engineers, and hardware engineers in the areas of design, development, reviews, configuration, and support. ', 'You have 5+ years of software development experience. ', '• You support, enhance, and extend existing test automation frameworks to validate hardware, software, and firmware. ', 'You have demonstrated competence with advanced data structures and algorithms. ', 'Are you looking for a unique, truly innovative role? ["Software Engineer - Yocto Project158777San Jose, CA, United StatesSep 8, 2020 DescriptionJob DescriptionAt Xilinx, we are leading the industry transformation to build an adaptable, intelligent world. ARE YOU bold, collaborative, and creative? At Xilinx, we hire and develop leaders and innovators who want to revolutionize the world of technology. We believe that by embracing diverse ideas, pushing boundaries, and working together as ONEXILINX, anything is possible.Our culture of innovation began with the invention of the Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA), and with the 2018 introduction of our Adaptive Compute Acceleration Platform (ACAP), has made a quantum leap in capability, solidifying our role as the adaptable platform supplier of choice. From the start, we have always believed in providing inventors with products and platforms that are infinitely adaptable. From self-driving cars, to world-record genome processing, to AI and big data, to the world's first 5G networks, we empower the world's builders and visionaries whose ideas solve every day problems and enhance people's lives.If you are PASSIONATE, ADAPTABLE, and INNOVATIVE, Xilinx is the right place for you! At Xilinx we care deeply about creating meaningful development experiences while building a strong sense of belonging and connection. We foster an environment of empowered learning, wellness, community engagement, and recognition, so you can focus on work that matters - world class technology that improves the way we live and work. We are ONEXILINX.Job DescriptionXilinx is looking for a talented individual for the position of Embedded Software Engineer. This team develops the Linux operating system that runs on Xilinx embedded devices along with its applications. As an Embedded Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to design, develop, and debug various software components and tools for Yocto Project. Deliverables include building complex software related to embedded Linux, e.g. systems software, software development tools, applications, kernel development, and board support packages (BSP).#mhJob RequirementsBS with 2+ years of experience or MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Related Equivalent Strong C/C++, BASH, Python programming and debugging skills Experience with implementing Linux applications and daemons Experience with the Yocto Project, Debian/Ubuntu distribution desired Experience with developing or customizing board support packages (BSP) desired Experience with embedded systems and Linux kernel/driver development for multi-processor heterogeneous systems a plus Familiarity with the Linux operating system internals, kernel modules a plus Experience with source control (Git) Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Excellent communication skills You must be capable of working in a dynamic, high pressure environment", 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills ', 'You must be capable of working in a dynamic, high pressure environment', 'Familiarity with the Linux operating system internals, kernel modules a plus ', 'Experience with source control (Git) ', 'BS with 2+ years of experience or MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Related Equivalent Strong C/C++, BASH, Python customizing board support packages (BSP) desired Experience with embedded systems and Linux kernel/driver development for multi-processor heterogeneous systems a plus Familiarity with the Linux ['', 'Job Description:', 'About RK Management Consultants, Inc; Founded in 1988 by technical professionals with over 30 years of experience in the IT industry, RKMC is a globally recognized leader in the IT consulting arena.
