We also provide independent assessment of projects currently underway and measure such projects on the effectiveness of the chosen process, resources and the implementation technology.', "You have 1+ years of experience writing production-ready Android apps. job_title: Sr. Software engineer - Game Developer On The Beach (20-00021)
job_text: ['', 'Participate actively with all members of the product development team to develop game designs into published online content.', 'Implement and verify functionality of underlying math framework; ensure regulatory compliance for all behaviors and game states.', 'Effective technical leader with ability to assist with project scheduling.', 'Solid development experience using C#, HTML5, XML, JSON, JavaScript/TypeScript, CSS3, SQL, UML and OOP.', 'Develop code for browser-based HTML5 online casino gaming applications.', 'JOB DESCRIPTION: SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER', 'Participate actively with all members of the product development team to develop game designs into published online content.Demonstrate exceptional ability to adopt new tools, techniques and procedures in a challenging and rapidly-evolving business sector.Work within and around application limitations to develop compelling and polished game content. Contribute to technical and creative problem-solving sessions.Accurately estimate the time required to complete tasks, manage time effectively and meet all project deadlines while delivering consistently high-quality, error-free code that adheres to defined coding standards.Proactively maintain communication with off-site partners and contribute ideas organization-wide for improving processes and developing tools, engine/game features, and shared library codebases. Work with QA, design and automation team members to ensure functional requirements are met and fully tested.Possess strong self-management skills. Ability to own and see through tasks to polished completion without extensive oversight. Show initiative in taking on new tasks and projects and in managing communications with stakeholders.', 'Work with game design to implement visual and audio assets, set up complex animation systems and tune game event timing.', 'This role includes a significant variable compensation program above the posted salary. Relocation assistance available.', 'Must possess excellent written and verbal communication skills, attention to detail and ability to document technical requirements.', 'In Addition, a Senior Software Engineer Must', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Accurately estimate the time required to complete tasks, manage time effectively and meet all project deadlines while delivering consistently high-quality, error-free code that adheres to defined coding standards.', 'Ensure solid device-independent stability with consistent behaviors across all platforms and layouts.', 'Develop code for browser-based HTML5 online casino gaming applications.Design game engine extensions and custom user interface code to accommodate new features and functionality.Work with game design to implement visual and audio assets, set up complex animation systems and tune game event timing.Implement and verify functionality of underlying math framework; ensure regulatory compliance for all behaviors and game states.Ensure solid device-independent stability with consistent behaviors across all platforms and layouts.Contribute to common code libraries, perform code reviews and participate in establishing functional requirements for new engine features and components.', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'Able to work on multiple projects simultaneously under tight deadlines.', 'Work within and around application limitations to develop compelling and polished game content. Contribute to technical and creative problem-solving sessions.', 'Degree or Diploma in Software Development.', 'Proactively maintain communication with off-site partners and contribute ideas organization-wide for improving processes and developing tools, engine/game features, and shared library codebases. Work with QA, design and automation team members to ensure functional requirements are met and fully tested.', 'Design game engine extensions and custom user interface code to accommodate new features and functionality.', 'Degree or Diploma in Software Development.6+ years professional experience in software development with multiple shipped titles / projects. Video or casino gaming experience highly desired.Solid development experience using C#, HTML5, XML, JSON, JavaScript/TypeScript, CSS3, SQL, UML and OOP.Effective technical leader with ability to assist with project scheduling.Able to work on multiple projects simultaneously under tight deadlines.Excellent working knowledge in use of development frameworks, libraries and agile methodologies.Proficiency Unit Testing and Automation a plus.Must possess excellent written and verbal communication skills, attention to detail and ability to document technical requirements.', 'Demonstrate exceptional ability to adopt new tools, techniques and procedures in a challenging and rapidly-evolving business sector.', 'Possess strong self-management skills. Ability to own and see through tasks to polished completion without extensive oversight. Show initiative in taking on new tasks and projects and in managing communications with stakeholders.', 'Excellent working knowledge in use of development frameworks, libraries and agile methodologies.', 'Note that all applicants are required to pass an engineering assessment test as part of the interview process. ', 'Proficiency Unit Testing and Automation a plus.', '6+ years professional experience in software development with multiple shipped titles / projects. Video or casino gaming experience highly desired.', 'Contribute to common code libraries, perform code reviews and participate in establishing functional requirements for new engine features and components.']

['', '• Experience with Rest APIs', '\u200b', 'Responsibilities will include:\xa0', '• Experience in Front end development using ReactJS, knockoutJS', '• NoSQL databases such as MongoDB', '• Bachelor’s degree is required', '• Familiarity with standard development tools such as GIT, IntelliJ Idea, Eclipse, SQL Developer, Jenkins.', 'Mediaocean is the world’s largest, independent advertising technology company. Our clients include the most successful advertising agencies, media specialists, media owners, and advertisers. Mediaocean’s mission is to enable advertising agencies to leverage the power of technology in a rapidly changing digital landscape. Mediaocean is making this a reality through the creation of global, open and neutral operating systems that will benefit and transform the entire industry.', 'Who We Are:', '• Good communications skills; ability to express oneself effectively depending on the context', '• Support and enhance existing software and/or participate in the development of new software initiatives', '• Respond to straightforward disruptions of production systems in a timely manner', '• Spring Security', '• Experience with user provisioning and authentication using CAS Single Sign-On technology', '• Perform unit testing and debug new and/or modified code', '• Develop, maintain and document code based on user stories', '• Participate in basic code reviews that include pull-requests; reviewing others’ code.', '• A strong understanding of concurrent, parallel, and distributed systems', '• Demo your solutions at regular intervals to product and QA teams', '\xa0', 'Who You Are:\xa0', '• Fact-finding and technical research', '• Experience with Java, J2EE, Spring, Spring MVC, micro service architecture and SQL', 'Any experience working with the following is a plus:', '• Experience with hibernate and Spring Data JPA\xa0', '• 5-7 years of software development experience', '• Experience with Relational Databases like Oracle(12c), MS SQL server\xa0', 'What You Will Do:', '• Demonstrate a general understanding of programming principles, methodologies, tools, and techniques', 'Mediaocean is searching for a\xa0Senior Software Developer to join our global development team. You will work with Team to develop high quality, high performant, testable, and maintainable code. Working in a friendly and motivated team, you will be following agile best practices to interpret business problems, provide design solutions by working with team and write elegant software solutions. Mediaocean allows flexible work hours.', '• Queuing technologies like JMS, AMQP (we use IBMMQ and RabbitMQ)']

job_title: Sr. Software Engineer in Test - (Able to work remotely anywhere in United States
job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical, diagnosis, and troubleshooting skills.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with engineering development departments within Spectra Logic to facilitate the transfer of knowledge to the Test group for new projects and products.', 'Specific Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be able to work in an Agile environment where requirements and priorities can change very quickly.', '\xa0Education and Experience:', '*** Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to age 40 and over, color, disability, gender, gender identity, genetic information, military or veteran status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or any other applicable status protected by state or local law.', 'Education and Experience:', 'Sr. Software Engineer in Test - (Able to work remotely anywhere in US) - ( 3 opportunities) ', 'Located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Boulder, Colorado, Spectra Logic provides a career and\xa0work experience second to none.\xa0Develop high quality solutions while gazing at the fabulous view; work out on your own or with our trainer at one of the on-campus gyms; grab lunch or snacks onsite or challenge the CEO to a game of pinball; and grow your career with peers who are second to none.\xa0Privately held since its inception in 1979,\xa0Spectra is allowed to do what is right without having to\xa0satisfy the analysts each quarter. That means our associates and customers come out as winners.\xa0', 'Status: Full Time', '\xa0Status: Full Time', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with basic System Administrator for Windows, Unix, and Linux environments.', 'Summary of Position:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A thorough understanding of the Spectra Logic Deep Storage Devices product line.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be passionate about creating world class products by applying new testing methodologies.', 'Isn’t\xa0it\xa0time you joined our winning team?', 'Benefits: Spectra Logic provides a casual work environment, competitive salaries, and a compensation structure that rewards contribution and hard work. Our full benefits package includes 401(k), medical, life, AD&D, flex spending accounts, and company paid short and long term disability.', 'Equal\xa0Employment Opportunities (EEO) Statement: Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to race, religion, sex, age, gender, minority, veterans, national origin or ancestry.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform root cause analysis on issues found in order to develop an automated regression tests', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Effectively communicate with other development groups in order to provide all necessary information needed to fix the bugs found.', 'Why choose to work at Spectra Logic? Enjoy both company-wide and Engineering-centric outings (baseball games, retreats, BBQ’s, etc...). On campus gym and fitness classes with a personal trainer, full cafeteria, and last but not least - work and life balance so you remain positive, productive and most of all, happy! Our casual work environment allows you to enjoy stocked snacks in our kitchens, Foosball, pinball, horseshoes, and volleyball. We are having fun here, come join us!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of Test Engineering experience preferred.', 'You will work in the Test Engineering Group, focused on automated validation of Emerging Markets storage solutions. Day to day activities will include test planning and test case design, implementing automated test infrastructure and automated tests, tracking, and reporting.\xa0Programming experience a must, (i.e., Java or C++ or any mainstream OOP language). Go programming a plus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with HW and SW integrated solutions a plus.', 'Why Spectra?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design test plans and test cases using a variety of technologies that are precise, accurate, repeatable, maintainable, and clean.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of B.S. degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or 5+ years of related experience.']

['', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Familiarity with modern software engineering best practices, including iterative/agile development, scientific software development lifecycles, version control, troubleshooting and testing is a must, as is the ability to make project decisions independently.', 'The Position', 'We are looking for a computational biologist or software engineer with a sustained track record of success in developing and maintaining large-scale software applications to address complex scientific data challenges.This position requires a Ph.D. or Master’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience in the computer sciences, bioinformatics, or a scientific field of study such as Biology, Chemistry, or Biochemistry. Exceptional candidates without an advanced degree but with a demonstrated history of equivalent relevant experience are encouraged to apply.A working knowledge of both Python and R, with a mastery of either or both languages, is required.Knowledge of containerization, RESTful web service development and relational database design are highly desired; familiarity with PHP is a plus.Experience developing scientific algorithms, with basic biological concepts, research laboratory data and familiarity with the analysis of proteomic data are highly desired.Familiarity with modern software engineering best practices, including iterative/agile development, scientific software development lifecycles, version control, troubleshooting and testing is a must, as is the ability to make project decisions independently.Experience in and knowledge of semantic web concepts, including ontologies and data modeling, is a plus.', 'This position requires a Ph.D. or Master’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience in the computer sciences, bioinformatics, or a scientific field of study such as Biology, Chemistry, or Biochemistry. Exceptional candidates without an advanced degree but with a demonstrated history of equivalent relevant experience are encouraged to apply.', 'A working knowledge of both Python and R, with a mastery of either or both languages, is required.', 'SCHEDULE', 'JOB TYPE', 'Knowledge of containerization, RESTful web service development and relational database design are highly desired; familiarity with PHP is a plus.', 'Experience developing scientific algorithms, with basic biological concepts, research laboratory data and familiarity with the analysis of proteomic data are highly desired.', 'Research Informatics COMPANY/DIVISION', 'Job Facts', 'Experience in and knowledge of semantic web concepts, including ontologies and data modeling, is a plus.', 'Who We Are', 'We are looking for a computational biologist or software engineer with a sustained track record of success in developing and maintaining large-scale software applications to address complex scientific data challenges.']

['', 'As a Principal Software Engineer, you will use your skills to:\xa0', 'Endpoint is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under federal, state or local law.', '10+ years of experience designing and building customer facing software products from concept to launchExperience developing in a microservices architecture, following domain-driven design principlesSolid coding practices including writing technical specifications, peer code review, and testing (unit, integration, end-to-end)Excellent communication and collaboration skills, and a strong team mentalityDemonstrated leadership abilities driving operational excellence and best practices', 'We offer great benefits - Health, Dental, Vision and 401K match', 'Your hard work, ownership, and self-sustainability will be greatly valued', 'Work with cross-functional teams to deliver timely, high quality, and well-tested code', 'Competitive compensation, including a Long Term Incentive Plan', 'Principal Software Engineer', 'Mentor other developers and contribute to the growth and development of our team', 'Why work at Endpoint:', 'Real estate is the largest asset class in the world—and yet it has also been one of the slowest to adopt innovative, new technologies. It has become increasingly important for the industry to evolve alongside a consumer-base who are accustomed to mobile-first, on-demand, and personalized experiences in every area of their lives. Founded in 2018, Endpoint emerged from a collaboration between First American and BCG Digital Ventures, the venture capital arm of the Boston Consulting Group. The new company combines First American’s title and settlement expertise, with the innovative approach of an agile technology company, to provide a seamless real estate closing from start to finish. At Endpoint, we believe the combination of modern technology, a standardized and simplified closing process, and a highly dedicated team of people will completely change the industry – and deliver an experience that instills the joy of an effortless close for all.', 'Dog-friendly office, fully stocked snack bar and weekly catered lunches', 'Help define and enforce standards regarding architecture, quality, and performance', 'Excellent communication and collaboration skills, and a strong team mentality', 'Solid coding practices including writing technical specifications, peer code review, and testing (unit, integration, end-to-end)', 'Lead the design and development of projects that involve any or all layers of our stack', "You'll come to Endpoint with:", '10+ years of experience designing and building customer facing software products from concept to launch', 'Why work at Endpoint:\xa0', 'Responsibility, autonomy, and opportunities to advance your career as we grow', 'Responsibility, autonomy, and opportunities to advance your career as we growYour hard work, ownership, and self-sustainability will be greatly valuedCompetitive compensation, including a Long Term Incentive PlanWe offer great benefits - Health, Dental, Vision and 401K matchDog-friendly office, fully stocked snack bar and weekly catered lunches', 'Lead the design and development of projects that involve any or all layers of our stackWork with cross-functional teams to deliver timely, high quality, and well-tested codeHelp define and enforce standards regarding architecture, quality, and performanceMentor other developers and contribute to the growth and development of our teamHelp evolve the engineering culture at Endpoint', 'Endpoint\xa0', 'Endpoint is looking for a Principal Software Engineer. Our stack is JavaScript/TypeScript –\xa0our client applications are written in React and React Native, our service layer in Node.js.', 'Demonstrated leadership abilities driving operational excellence and best practices', 'Help evolve the engineering culture at Endpoint', 'Experience developing in a microservices architecture, following domain-driven design principles']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Game Engine Security
job_text: ['', 'A leader', 'Work with product and engineering teams to design and implement secure architectures', " Experienced: you're an expert in C++ with 5+ years of professional experience. Pointers, templates, and raw blocks of memory are tools to write high-performance code, not your enemies Engine/platform oriented: excited about developing security mechanisms from scratch to protect a game engine or a similar platform, and comfortable developing cross-platform code Self-sufficient: Able to write clear design specifications, mentor senior and junior engineers and guide projects from beginning to end Test driven: you love writing unit and integration tests A leader: you are comfortable in building and growing partnerships across engineering teams to build and deploy secure features A team player: you have a positive attitude, communicate well, motivate and efficiently collaborate with other team members Eager to learn: able to adapt to a dynamic-everything environment where pre-computation isn’t possible ", 'Experienced: ', 'Test driven: you love writing unit and integration tests', 'A leader: you are comfortable in building and growing partnerships across engineering teams to build and deploy secure features', 'A team player: you have a positive attitude, communicate well, motivate and efficiently collaborate with other team members', 'WHY ROBLOX?', 'Experience with Lua', ' Design, build and deploy security software solutions to protect Roblox game engine from malicious users/attackers Work with product and engineering teams to design and implement secure architectures Identify attack vectors that can be used to exploit Roblox software and develop defensive tools and techniques Review designs and software implementations of general product features. Collaborate with Roblox engineering teams to remediate flaws in software, recommend solutions to fix potential security risks and ensure that security best practices are followed.  Self-organize and take ownership of the project throughout its full lifecycle, with opportunities to help build a team that does the same. Find out how Roblox is special and how you can harness that to deliver a secure platform using industry-leading techniques across all platforms ', 'Review designs and software implementations of general product features.', 'You Will', 'Self-sufficient: Able to write clear design specifications, mentor senior and junior engineers and guide projects from beginning to end', "Experienced: you're an expert in C++ with 5+ years of professional experience. ['', ' Work closely with the electrical engineers, test engineers, system engineers, and production engineers to realize challenging requirements.', '_ _**', 'Job Posting:* 11-Sep-2020, 3:29:02 PM', "Cobham's** values of Trust, Talent and Technology have driven us from our launch in 1934 by Sir Alan Cobham, an aviation innovator, to becoming a global leader in state-of-the-art aerospace and defense systems. And it’s the insights of our innovators today that will secure our collective future. Innovators like you.", ' Experience utilizing popular development tools including Bugzilla and Subversion.', ' This position requires access to technology, materials, software or hardware that is controlled by export laws of the US. In order to be eligible you must be either a US Citizen or Permanent Resident', 'Job Category:* Engineering', ' Support bare metal drivers at the chip level and complicated protocol requirements.', ' Program in Perl, C#, LabView, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, etc, in addition to the majority of the development which is in C.', 'Cobham** is seeking an **Embedded Software Engineer** that will work with a small dedicated group of other software engineers to bring to life a systems responsible for providing internet and television connectivity to the maritime community. This position is located in Concord, CA.', ' Minimum 1+ years of strong embedded software experience.', "Cobham** is one of the world's leading companies engaged in the development, delivery and support of leading-edge aerospace and defense systems in the air, on land and at sea. Our clients and partners trust **Cobham** to deliver the mission-critical technology they need, and we trust our employees to draw on their ingenuity and passion to deliver those solutions. This leads to an empowering culture for our people. Our Leadership team is open, sharing plans for the next five years, driving retention by offering demanding, exciting work, and providing full guidance and mentoring.", ' Working knowledge of VSAT technology and communication.', ' Scripting in Python or Perl.', 'Organization:* CCC - SATCOM', ' Knowledge of SMX RTOS desired.', ' Knowledge of device drivers, BSPs and real time OS concepts.', ' Develop and document code for use on a three axis stabilized antennas. The antennas range in size from 0.6 meters to 4.3 meters. Software is used to stabilize the antenna, identify the target, control the RF radio mounted to the antenna, and interface with the modems to ensure connectivity.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, etc.', ' Experience in real time environments along with some web development experience.', ' Knowledge of PID and control system concepts.', ' Experience developing software applications in C & C++ in a real time environment.', ' Experience with Windows programming.', 'Recruiter:* Michael Bodner', ' Knowledge of Oscilloscope/Logic Analyzer.', ' Fix and maintain embedded code written in C.', '_Cobham is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and embraces diversity in our employee population. It is the policy of Cobham to provide equal opportunity to all qualified applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, protected veteran status, or genetic information. Cobham will refrain from discharging, or otherwise discriminating against, employees or applicants who inquire about, discuss, or disclose their compensation or the compensation of other employees or applicants._**', 'Schedule:* Full-time', 'Req ID:* 314180', ' Work closely with the production floor to gain valuable feedback from actual systems shipping to customers. ['', 'At Nyla, we talk about employee investment, not employee costs—a small way we outwardly provide our great people with benefits that cover your overall well-being.\xa0Nyla offers group benefits, 100% paid by Nyla, that include CareFirst medical, dental, and vision coverage. ['', 'You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.', 'You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.', 'You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.', 'You will help to radically lower drug prices and expand access, by identifying novel opportunities for partnerships and delivery across the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs from pharma companies to patients. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines through the unification, comprehension, and modelling of human health and disease across data sources. You will drive the adoption of machine learning for the improvement of human health in building a radically different, digital-native and data-first life sciences company, where we bootstrap our way to rapid increases in scale and efficacy across functions. You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a novel, modern paradigm in drug development.', 'You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science.\xa0', 'You will map and optimize the complex interrelationships of pharma companies, drug manufacturers, pharmacy benefit managers, payors, and patients to drive EQRx’s strategy to dramatically lower drug prices while promoting equity and access. You will use novel computational techniques to design, refine, and select novel drug candidates.\xa0 Using the tools of modern data science and machine learning, you will help to build a data driven, end-to-end digital native life sciences company, enabling our core mission of rapid, equal, and equitable access to medicines.\xa0', "The Impact You'll Have", 'You have significant experience in the data science in industry.', 'You have significant experience in the data science in industry.You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science.\xa0You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.', '\xa0', 'Your Superpowers', 'You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.', 'You will integrate disparate EHR, clinical, claims, and other medical data sources, extracting consistent information across ontologies, and deriving insights from disparate data sources to allow experts to rapidly understand the meaning, applicability, and extensibility of results from observational and randomized clinical experimentation. You will build ML tools for anomaly-tracking to enable rapid, more effective clinical trialing and the integration of data sources throughout the life sciences.\xa0 You will model the trajectory of disease across patient populations to identify key opportunities and indications and to rapidly test and develop candidate medicines.']

['', 'Making an impact on the world with every line of code', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginning', 'The company', 'Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data form small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data, and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver.', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginningOpportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expandsInvolvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clientsCompetitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share optionsMaking an impact on the world with every line of code', 'Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options', 'The Role', 'Qualifications ', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experienceExtensive experience in leveraging Deep Learning ( ANN, CNN, RNN, Auto-encoders, GAN, etc.)Strong understanding of the underlying math and learning concepts in these algorithmsProficiency in Python, and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.) and deep learning hardware (CPU, GPU, multi-node)Self-motivated, highly disciplined, passionate about learning, and making a change in the world', 'We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', 'Strong understanding of the underlying math and learning concepts in these algorithms', 'Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, passionate about learning, and making a change in the world', '\xa0', 'We are looking for an exceptional deep learning data scientist join our exceptional team. We have a fast-paced, high-performance, and result-oriented culture, looking for candidates hungry for learning. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', 'Proficiency in Python, and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.) and deep learning hardware (CPU, GPU, multi-node)', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experience', 'Extensive experience in leveraging Deep Learning ( ANN, CNN, RNN, Auto-encoders, GAN, etc.)', 'Why you should join ReviveMed']

['DUTIES: DUTIES: Contribute to a team responsible for developing the Mercury Platform, a middleware Application Program Interface (API) layer for mobile application and portal consumption of Business Voice Services; use Java, Scala, Akka, Cassandra, Ansible, and Docker to develop systems software within Agile environments; develop design documentation to be used by other developers on the team; design systems architecture using Microservices architecture; participate in the full software development lifecycle (SDLC) for the Mercury Platform, including analysis, implementation, support, and enhancements; write and test code used to upgrade legacy systems and software applications into Microservices architecture; deploy developed code into multiple environments; and participate in code reviews with other software development engineers.REQUIREMENTS: REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree (or foreign equivalent) in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field, and one (1) year of experience using Java to develop systems software within Agile environments; of which six (6) months includes using Cassandra, Scala, and Akka; utilizing repository and code review tools to develop systems software; and developing design documentation.Comcast is an EOE/Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer', 'Business Unit']

['', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Company Description:', 'Job Description:', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'General Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0']

['', ' Data collection, data mining, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data that is fed to predictive models ', 'Job Duties', 'Required Skills/Tools', ' Working closely with Network Operations, Systems Operations, Product, Sales and Marketing teams to understand business problems and develop suitable predictive models ', 'About RingCentral', ' Performing ad-hoc data analysis and presenting results in clear manner ', ' Analyzing complex processes and translating them into business and functional requirements for Analytics use by RingCentral’s customers  Working closely with Network Operations, Systems Operations, Product, Sales and Marketing teams to understand business problems and develop suitable predictive models  Data collection, data mining, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data that is fed to predictive models  Performing ad-hoc data analysis and presenting results in clear manner  Utilizing cutting-edge technology including Hadoop, Hive, Machine Learning and Deep Learning to ingest network and call data for products including Glip, RC Meetings and multiple databases  Developing predictive models based on network traffic data and call data to analyze outages and possible security exploits using machine learning and deep learning  Designing and developing predictive and prescriptive models for churn prediction and product adoption depending on customer usage data  Analyzing the network and system level security threats depending on data and network logs for telephony and RC Meetings applications. ', 'Job Description', 'Data Scientist (Full Time; Multiple Openings) ', ' Utilizing cutting-edge technology including Hadoop, Hive, Machine Learning and Deep Learning to ingest network and call data for products including Glip, RC Meetings and multiple databases ', ' Analyzing the network and system level security threats depending on data and network logs for telephony and RC Meetings applications. ['', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'About Us:', 'Our Team:', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across the frontend.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'About You:', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'As part of being a frontend engineer, you will work closely with product designers and implementation teammates to work on intuitive interfaces for our users.\xa0The challenges on the frontend are beyond the basic; we are dealing with rendering thousands of points on maps, organizing data on a network graph, implementing intricate and interactive data visualizations, and more. Our frontend stack leverages React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js.\xa0', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with it', 'The Frontend Software Engineer Role:', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'What We Look For:', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code basesShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with itStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users']

["We're looking for a software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. They're working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay active.Our companies look for software engineers proficient in Python or Java. The ideal candidate is motivated by working on complex technical problems and curious about the world around them. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.To apply to the network, we'll ask you to fill out a 60-second web form. It's absolutely free.If accepted, you'll hear directly from founders, hiring managers, and other key decision makers starting the following Monday. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer. To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.--- ", 'Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.']

['', 'EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY (EEO) STATEMENT', 'Python', '5+ years’ experience preferably in the medical device or a similarly regulated industry.', 'Sr. Data Engineer', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to type at a keyboard and produce working computer software.', 'Experienced implementing production-grade big data solutions on Amazon Web Services', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in our company.\xa0We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '5+ years’ experience preferably in the medical device or a similarly regulated industry.PythonExperience with EHR/EMR integrations via HL7 or FHIR is a plusExperience implementing and documenting any of the following standards as it pertains to cloud infrastructure and ETL solutions: Soc2, ISO 27001/27002, HITRUST, PCI DSS, NIST 800-5, FEDRAMP.Familiarity with Agile methodologyResponsible for performing all duties in compliance with FDA’s Quality System Regulation (QSR), ISO13485, ISO 14971, the Canadian Medical Device Regulations, and all other international regulatory requirements with which Potrero Medical complies.', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear and participate in conference calls', 'At Potrero Medical, our mission is to help clinicians transform patient care by developing a predictive technology platform for supporting the early detection of critical illnesses.', 'This role will implement pipelines to extract, transform and load data from various sources, including data downloaded from medical devices used in clinical trials, as well as the electronic medical record (EMR). The pipelines are then used by Potrero data scientists to develop predictive health algorithms that run on Potrero medical devices. This position will build and maintain data tools to support the analytics and clinical teams in working with the data.\xa0Finally, the role will ensure that the data infrastructure is secure and in compliance with recognized cybersecurity standards, including required documentation and testing.', 'Experienced implementing production-grade big data solutions on Amazon Web ServicesExperience with relational or analytics databases (Postgres and Redshift or Snowflake).Experience with an IAC language such as Terraform for provisioning cloud microservices in containerized environments.Experience moving data (ETL)Ability to modify or write scripts with pandas, NumPy, or bokeh that move data or provide visualizations.Familiar with HIPAA regulationsPerform additional responsibilities or other functions as assigned', 'Familiarity with Agile methodology', 'We are a Silicon Valley-based predictive health company developing the next generation of medical devices with smart sensors and artificial intelligence. Founded in the historical Potrero Hill neighborhood of San Francisco, we emerged out of Theranova, a MedTech incubator focused on tackling the biggest challenges in healthcare.', 'Our medical device, the Accuryn® Monitoring System, received 510(k) clearance from the FDA in 2016 and helps hospitals accurately measure patients’ vital signs such as urine output, body core temperature, and intra-abdominal pressure.', 'This job operates in a professional office environment, it can be performed remotely.', 'WORK ENVIRONMENT', 'This job operates in a professional office environment, it can be performed remotely.This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets and fax machines.', 'Perform additional responsibilities or other functions as assigned', 'The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS\xa0(Included but not limited to)', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear and participate in conference callsWhile performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to type at a keyboard and produce working computer software.The employee is occasionally required to sit; balance; and stoop, kneel, or crouch. The employee must frequently lift and/or move up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus.', 'Responsible for performing all duties in compliance with FDA’s Quality System Regulation (QSR), ISO13485, ISO 14971, the Canadian Medical Device Regulations, and all other international regulatory requirements with which Potrero Medical complies.', '\xa0', 'Experience moving data (ETL)', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS', 'EDUCATION', 'Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.', 'PHYSICAL DEMANDS', 'Familiar with HIPAA regulations', 'This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets and fax machines.', 'The employee is occasionally required to sit; balance; and stoop, kneel, or crouch. The employee must frequently lift and/or move up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus.', 'Experience implementing and documenting any of the following standards as it pertains to cloud infrastructure and ETL solutions: Soc2, ISO 27001/27002, HITRUST, PCI DSS, NIST 800-5, FEDRAMP.', 'Experience with EHR/EMR integrations via HL7 or FHIR is a plus', 'POSITION DESCRIPTION', 'Experience with an IAC language such as Terraform for provisioning cloud microservices in containerized environments.', 'BS in computer science or similar field.', 'Experience with relational or analytics databases (Postgres and Redshift or Snowflake).', 'Ability to modify or write scripts with pandas, NumPy, or bokeh that move data or provide visualizations.']

['**Role can be located in Austin, TX or Newport Beach, CA**Role:We are seeking a hardworking application developer to join our team. Building on top of PIMCO’s modern cloud-based solution infrastructure, we develop and maintain the central applications, platforms and tools that are the backbone of PIMCO’s trading and portfolio management processes by maximizing scalable technology solutions provided by PIMCO’s core engineering team. Dedicated to supporting a culture of diversity, inclusion and acceptance, at PIMCO we work to create an environment where all our people can be their authentic selves. We strive to heighten our employees’ appreciation for diverse perspectives and skills, facilitating increased collaboration and enhancing our ability to attract and engage top talent.In this role, you will be working on:•  Trade risk sizing and capital allocation decision support tools•  Order generation•  Fine-grained trade risk and performance tracking•  Portfolio PnL and historical performance attribution•  Customized Trade Floor reportingResponsibilities:•  Forward development of new system components and enhancements to the existing codebase•  Direct interaction with business users (Trade Floor, PMs, Risk Managers, etc.) in order to define, rollout, and support new platform features•  Detailed understanding of various aspects of PIMCO business and operational processes•  Architecture, design, and coding; solving engineering challenges associated with large data processing volumes, complex calculation dependencies, horizontal compute scale vs centralized data storage, etc. ', 'Requirements:•\xa0Candidates should have 5 years of experience in the investment domain building large-scale application solutions by using modern full stack technologies in a front office environment or supporting a portfolio management technology capacity•  Solid experience in writing backend services using Java or C# (while we are using Java, we will consider strong candidates in other languages as long as they show ability to learn Java)•  Interest in learning about / working with modern UI technologies']

['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Working with product, design and other engineering teams to deliver simple solutions for application developers. Cultivating a high-performance culture within your team that iterates frequently and learns continuously without sacrificing product quality. Setting performance goals for team members; evaluating performance; providing coaching and facilitating professional development. Recruiting and hiring world-class engineers to work on Gemini’s products. ', 'Help us Build the Future of Money ', 'Working with product, design and other engineering teams to deliver simple solutions for application developers.', 'Cultivating a high-performance culture within your team that iterates frequently and learns continuously without sacrificing product quality.', 'Excellent verbal and written communications skills with the ability to work closely across teams and manage dependencies.', 'Experience in fintech/crypto/blockchain technologies and products', 'Understanding of modern application development and architecture.', 'Sound business judgment, with a proven ability to influence others and make excellent decisions.', 'Gemini is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.', 'Ownership in the company via profit sharing units', 'Competitive base salaries across all departments', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience managing a high-performing team of engineers.', 'Amazing benefits, 401k match contribution, and flexible hours', 'A customer focused empathy and understanding of the challenges that face developers when using an application development platform, and a vision for how great products can help.', 'Setting performance goals for team members; evaluating performance; providing coaching and facilitating professional development.', 'The Department: Engineering', 'All of Gemini’s engineers are able to work across the software platform, not just on their own specialization or subteam. We value a thoughtful, collaborative software development process, coupled with a pragmatic approach to problem solving and delivering software.', 'Snacks, Perks, Wellness Outings & Events', ' Experience in fintech/crypto/blockchain technologies and products ', 'The ability to adapt and handle multiple competing priorities in collaboration with peers.', 'Demonstrated ability to lead positive change; empower people; cultivate product technology visions and innovative solutions.', 'The Role: Senior Software Engineer', 'At least 6 years of previous software engineering experience', 'Recruiting and hiring world-class engineers to work on Gemini’s products.', 'Responsibilities', ' At least 6 years of previous software engineering experience Good verbal, written communication, problem-solving skills with a strong sense of ownership Experience managing a high-performing team of engineers. Demonstrated ability to lead positive change; empower people; cultivate product technology visions and innovative solutions. Sound business judgment, with a proven ability to influence others and make excellent decisions. The ability to adapt and handle multiple competing priorities in collaboration with peers. A customer focused empathy and understanding of the challenges that face developers when using an application development platform, and a vision for how great products can help. Excellent verbal and written communications skills with the ability to work closely across teams and manage dependencies. Understanding of modern application development and architecture. ', 'It Pays to Work Here', 'Good verbal, written communication, problem-solving skills with a strong sense of ownership', ' Competitive base salaries across all departments Ownership in the company via profit sharing units Amazing benefits, 401k match contribution, and flexible hours Snacks, Perks, Wellness Outings & Events ', 'Gemini is regulated and licensed like a bank, but it’s run like a tech startup, and engineering is the core of the company. There’s a wide range of tough problems to solve at Gemini – from properly securing hundreds of millions of dollars worth of customer funds, to developing innovative new blockchain products, to finding new techniques to combat fraud, to shaving microseconds off our API response times, and everything in between.']

['', ' 2-5 years of experience programming in 2 major languages (Python, Go, Java, C++, Javascript) and a willingness to pick up more as needed.', ' Identify feature gaps in the technologies and work with the open source community to co-design and co-develop features and bug fixes', ' Production experience with NoSQL databases or other distributed storage technologies in a platform/infrastructure software engineering role.', ' Upstream, accepted contributions to open source projects. A strong understanding of distributed systems. Production experience with NoSQL databases or other distributed storage technologies in a platform/infrastructure software engineering role.', ' Improve the usability of the platform by building tooling such as our proxy service that does workload management for multi-tenant deployments and our database copy system.', ' Strong knowledge of data structures and algorithms.', ' A strong understanding of distributed systems.', "Bloomberg's NoSQL Infrastructure team offers Apache Cassandra as a hosted service. The team has visibility across the organization as we're providing a pathway for scalable data storage. We support critical and highly-visible applications such as ultra low-latency market data caches and geo-replicated trade event stores. The team manages over 1000 Cassandra nodes storing over 500 terabytes of data and processing nearly 20 billion requests per day. The team is looking for senior engineers with interest in distributed databases and data management to continue to drive the platform forward.", 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' Help application teams looking to use Cassandra with workload characterization, performance tuning and failure analysis. Improve the operability of the platform by developing automation such as cluster auto-healing and auto-expansion. Improve the usability of the platform by building tooling such as our proxy service that does workload management for multi-tenant deployments and our database copy system. Identify feature gaps in the technologies and work with the open source community to co-design and co-develop features and bug fixes', ' Improve the operability of the platform by developing automation such as cluster auto-healing and auto-expansion.', ' 2-5 years of experience programming in 2 major languages (Python, Go, Java, C++, Javascript) and a willingness to pick up more as needed. Experience with modern development methodologies and tools (Jira, Jenkins, Git, etc) Experience with object-oriented design. Strong knowledge of data structures and algorithms. Strong problem solving and communication skills.', ' Upstream, accepted contributions to open source projects.', "If you are a software engineer who is passionate about distributed systems, and is interested in developing backend software infrastructure, we'd like to talk to you about an opening on our team.", ' Experience with object-oriented design.', ' Strong problem solving and communication skills.', "The team's focus is to foster Cassandra adoption by improving its usability within Bloomberg. The team has developed automation workflows for managing the lifecycle of clusters, keyspace deployment and schema management. We've implemented client libraries for service discovery that we are looking to enhance with custom load balancing and retry policies. We also provide solutions engineering for application teams, helping them with data modeling and architecture. Currently, we are focused on improving our core automation of Cassandra, developing a feature-rich self service console for managing Cassandra databases, developing a proxy service to provide a simpler access layer and offering a system to provide self-managed backups and database copies. ", 'https://github.com/bloomberg, our recent talk at Datastax Accelerate:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RjypMRrit9U and some of our recent work on Cassandra Reaper:https://github.com/thelastpickle/cassandra-reaper/pull/635. ', ' Help application teams looking to use Cassandra with workload characterization, performance tuning and failure analysis.', ' Experience with modern development methodologies and tools (Jira, Jenkins, Git, etc)']

['', '\xa0\xa0', '\xa0-Java (native and Android SDK)', '- Knowledge of networking technologies such as SD-WAN Cisco/Juniper architectures and implementations, WAN Multi-Topology Routing, Cisco/Juniper configuration via CLI and SNMP, Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC).\xa0', '- Strong software and systems skills and experience in prototype development:', 'Required:', '-\xa0Tun/Tap implementations (Android, Linux, Windows)', 'The Robinson Group is staffing a newly created position for a Network Tester/Support Specialist', '-\xa0Linux programming (netlink, netfilter, sockets, iptables, iprule, iproutes)', 'This is a year long contract that will likely be extended.', 'Desired:', 'This is an enviroment that is developing networking software for more efficient and reliable network communications in disconnected, intermittent wireless environments.', 'This is a flexible role in which you can go in to the office for meetings and work a majority of the time from home (so not a pure telecommute posiition). Should be commutable to the office.', '.', '- B.S./M.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.', '- Knowledge of computer networking with emphasis on wireless mobile networks, wireless systems engineering, and Internet technologies (TCP/IP protocol stack; unicast, multicast, and overlay routing protocols).\xa0\xa0', '-\xa0Windows programming (pipes, WinDivert library)', 'Will be working in diverse areas related to wireless systems architectures and protocols.', '- 5+ years of experience in designing, implementing, and integrating complex software systems.', '-\xa0C/C++ (native and Android NDK)', 'Must be able to pass a Federal Background Check and be eligible for a Security Clearance that would be provided.', '- Experience with Tactical Radios like SINCGARS, ASIP, TSM, HF; Bridging devices like Ultralink and Taclink; BFT2 control and data stack, and BFT2 transceivers and simulators; NCW, FDMA radios/modems; Tactical systems like AFATDS, MFoCS/JBC-P; ATAK/MTAK architectures; MILSTD-2045-47001C.']

['', 'You are adaptable, collaborative, and love eliminating ambiguity by figuring things out', 'Experience building Microsoft Windows applications using Visual Studio and have written unit tests using MSTest or NUnit', 'Used tools and written scripts to manage continuous deployment and integration, monitor usage and troubleshooting', 'You have 5+ years’ experience developing and deploying web services on cloud based infrastructure (e.g. AWS, Azure) on a large scale supporting at least 5,000 simultaneous users', 'You can communicate effectively & persuasively, both in person and in the written form', '(e.g. AWS, Azure)', 'You will be part of an engineering organization that will entrust you to architect, design, develop, and maintain various portions of our applications with lots of autonomy while receiving guidance and feedback to help you grow. You will work with our full software stack along with our team of iOS, Android, and Front End, and Back End Engineers who along with you are responsible for evaluating new tools and technologies, building prototypes, and extending the capabilities of our cloud platform. And you will be expected to collaboratively experiment, prototype, take risks, and document your work while helping to build new applications, web services, and tools used by our Avigilon Cloud Service offerings.', 'You know how to build SQL queries to manipulate data in a database', 'Somerville, MA', 'Experience building Microsoft Windows applications using Visual Studio and have written unit tests using MSTest or NUnitUsed tools and written scripts to manage continuous deployment and integration, monitor usage and troubleshootingFamiliar with Azure DevOps, Bitbucket, Bamboo and scanning your code using FortifyDouble bonus points if you have experience developing applications that handle video data', '(i.e. C#, Java, or similar', 'What You’ll Do', 'As a Principle Software Developer on the Avigilon Cloud Services team, you will help us architect and build new features, enhance our existing software, tools, and experiences to help delight our customers by extending our application capabilities and enhancing the existing AI technologies we use. You will help design and build new APIs, web services, and microservices while supporting the worldwide operations of our cloud-based security solutions.', 'You have developed RESTful APIs used with web browsers, mobile applications, and back-end servers', "You have outstanding technical problem-solving, design, and coding skillsYou have 10+ years' experience writing performant, multi-threaded code in a high-level programming language (i.e. C#, Java, or similar)You have 5+ years’ experience developing and deploying web services on cloud based infrastructure (e.g. AWS, Azure) on a large scale supporting at least 5,000 simultaneous usersYou have developed RESTful APIs used with web browsers, mobile applications, and back-end serversYou know how to build SQL queries to manipulate data in a databaseYou can communicate effectively & persuasively, both in person and in the written formYou are adaptable, collaborative, and love eliminating ambiguity by figuring things outHave a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline, or equivalent experience", 'Double bonus points if you have experience developing applications that handle video data', 'Principal Software Engineer, Cloud Services', 'Preference will be given to candidates with the following:', 'Qualifications', 'You have outstanding technical problem-solving, design, and coding skills', '\xa0', 'Familiar with Azure DevOps, Bitbucket, Bamboo and scanning your code using Fortify', ' Our team is a talented set of AI Researchers, Computer Scientists, Hardware Engineers, and security experts who work every day on challenging problems involving artificial intelligence and computer vision. Avigilon’s solutions have been installed in more than 120 countries at thousands of customer sites, including school campuses, transportation systems, healthcare centers, public venues, critical infrastructure, prisons, factories, casinos, airports, financial institutions, government facilities, and retailers. If you want to be part of a team that has been doing important work for over 15 years while changing the world – we need you!', 'We are seeking developers who are passionate about distributed computing and who want to build large scale data platforms. As we transmit video and other situational information in real-time from our clients’ devices to their command centers, we turn this data into actionable intelligence that helps to keep people safe. If you’re someone who has developed Microsoft .NET applications, and is also comfortable working with other technology platforms such as JavaScript and React – come join our team!', 'Have a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline, or equivalent experience', ' ', "You have 10+ years' experience writing performant, multi-threaded code in a high-level programming language (i.e. C#, Java, or similar)", 'Avigilon, a Motorola Solutions company, is defining the future of the security industry through innovative end-to-end-solutions. We’re changing the landscape of the surveillance industry through advanced award-winning AI based surveillance systems. Artificial Intelligence is transforming the world and our team is advancing the field as it applies to the intersection of computer vision and real-time video analysis. We are proud to be industry leaders in video analytics with features such as Appearance Search and Unusual Motion Detection along with our innovative Avigilon Blue cloud service platform.']

job_text: ['', 'ABOUT THE ROLE', 'BENEFITS AT GAP INC.', 'Expertise in designing and integrating with service-oriented architectures, keeping performance and security in mind.', 'Develop code using standards-based solutions, drive adoption via mentoring and guiding others', 'Proficient in Hadoop HDFS administration. Knowledge of database installation, upgrades, patching, maintenance, security and administration', 'Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk', '7-10 years of database engineering experience with a primary focus on multi-node database systems, backing extremely high-volume Java-based services', "But we’re more than the clothes that we make. We know that business can and should be a force for good, and it’s why we work hard to make product that makes people feel good, inside and out. It’s why we’re committed to giving back to the communities where we live and work. If you're one of the super-talented who thrive on change, aren't afraid to take risks and love to make a difference, come grow with us.\xa0", 'Gap Inc. is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to providing a workplace free from harassment and discrimination. We are committed to recruiting, hiring, training and promoting qualified people of all backgrounds, and make all employment decisions without regard to any protected status. We have received numerous awards for our long-held commitment to equality and will continue to foster a diverse and inclusive environment of belonging. This year, we’ve been named as one of the\xa0Best Places to Work by the Humans Rights Campaign\xa0for the fourteenth consecutive year and have been included in the\xa02019 Bloomberg Gender-Equality Index\xa0for the second year in a row.', 'Engage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodology', 'Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*Employee stock purchase plan.*Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*See more\xa0of the benefits we offer.', 'Solid experience in query tuning, performance optimization and database “build and run” with a DevOps mindset', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.', '7-10 years of database engineering experience with a primary focus on multi-node database systems, backing extremely high-volume Java-based servicesIn-depth knowledge and technical expertise with both SQL and NoSQL based database and data cache systems including Oracle RDBMS / RAC, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, Redis, HBaseProficient in Hadoop HDFS administration. Knowledge of database installation, upgrades, patching, maintenance, security and administrationExperience running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, leveraging Cloud-native PaaS databases such as Cosmos, Azure SQL, RDS is a major plus.Solid experience in query tuning, performance optimization and database “build and run” with a DevOps mindsetExpertise in designing and integrating with service-oriented architectures, keeping performance and security in mind.Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk', 'Create robust database solutions and multi-task across initiatives while maintaining code simplicity and extensibility, reliability, scalability and performance', 'Our past is full of iconic moments — but our future is going to spark many more. Our brands — Gap, Banana Republic, Old Navy, Athleta, INTERMIX and Hill City —\xa0have dressed people from all walks of life and all kinds of families, all over the world, for every occasion for more than 50 years.', '\ufeff*For eligible employees', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*', 'Experience running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, leveraging Cloud-native PaaS databases such as Cosmos, Azure SQL, RDS is a major plus.', 'ABOUT GAP INC.', 'At Gap Inc., we are passionate about creating and delivering quality software by utilizing Agile and DevOps best practices. We are creating Cloud-based solutions using Automation, Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration & Delivery, Pair Programming, and story-based iterative development. In this role, you will have key responsibilities for enhancing, scaling and optimizing high-performance database systems powering one of the most trafficked e-commerce sites on the Internet!', 'See more\xa0of the benefits we offer.', 'WHO YOU ARE', 'Work collaboratively with engineering and technical operations team members to build integrated, high-volume services', 'Employee stock purchase plan.*', 'We are looking for imaginative individuals experienced with cutting-edge database technologies, and state-of-the-art Engineering and DevOps practices powering commerce systems at scale.', 'In-depth knowledge and technical expertise with both SQL and NoSQL based database and data cache systems including Oracle RDBMS / RAC, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, Redis, HBase', 'One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*', 'Engage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilities', 'Work collaboratively with engineering and technical operations team members to build integrated, high-volume servicesCreate robust database solutions and multi-task across initiatives while maintaining code simplicity and extensibility, reliability, scalability and performanceEngage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodologyEngage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilitiesDevelop code using standards-based solutions, drive adoption via mentoring and guiding others', 'Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*']
