['', 'Skills / Experience required for a Lead C++ Software Engineer ', 'Compensation', '- Small team with growth opportunity', 'Overview:\xa0', '$410k', 'Skills / Experience required', '- PhD or Masters in STEM field', 'Nice to have:', '- Exposure to all aspects of the financial technology services industry', '- 5+ years of experience as a developer at a buy side firm', '- Excellent C++ programming skills, good working knowledge of Linux platform, and solid Computer Science fundamentals', 'Lead C++ Software Engineer', 'Responsibilities of a Lead C++ Software Engineer ', '- Experience building low latency applications from scratch in a greenfield environment', '-\xa0Good understanding of networking protocols (TCP/IP, Multicast)', '-\xa0Develop exchange connectivity services, including market data feeds and order entry gateways', '-\xa0Develop tools to monitor, analyze, and further automate existing trading processes', 'Volatility Trading Firm based with offices in NYC and SF is urgently looking for a strong and motivated C++ software engineer to join the core Options Market Making High Frequency Trading Team. The Lead HFT Software Engineer will be playing a key role in the design of the firm’s next generation etrading platform.', '-\xa0As a Lead C++ Software Engineer you will contribute to the design and implementation of a world-class research pipeline for discovery and optimization of automated trading strategies', 'Responsibilities', 'Company Perks', '- Prior working knowledge of Market Data, Electronic Trading Architecture, FIX Connectivity, and Order Management Systems', '- Quantitative Software Developer experience at a buy side firm', '- As a Lead C++ Software Engineer your salary is commensurate with experience - Up to $410k Guaranteed Total Compensation', '-\xa0Create systems that capture and provide efficient access to large volumes of historical market data']

['', 'Lead projects related to data movement and transformation from design through development.', '6 years of professional software development experience or 3 years with a  relevant advanced degree.Software development experience in Java.Experience with Ruby and SQL. ', 'Experience in Cloud API development.', 'Experience with language development and database/information technologies.', 'Experience with Ruby and SQL. ', "Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.With your technical expertise you will manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions.", 'Minimum qualifications:', 'Experience in developing scalable systems, comprehensive applications and intuitive interfaces.', 'Preferred qualifications:', 'Advanced degree in engineering, computer science or other technical related field.Experience in Cloud API development.Experience in developing scalable systems, comprehensive applications and intuitive interfaces.Experience with data modeling. Experience with language development and database/information technologies.', 'About the job', 'Exemplify technical excellence in collaborative planning, implementation, and review of code.', 'Empathize with customers and your peers.', 'Drive technical discussions regarding application architecture in support of high quality and maintainability of complex systems.', 'Looker is a unified platform that powers data experiences and delivers actionable business insights to employees at the point of decision. Looker integrates data into the daily workflows of users to allow organizations to extract value from data at web-scale.', 'Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Santa Cruz, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA', 'Santa Cruz, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA', 'Provide seamless support for integrating Looker modeled data in data pipelines and data workflows.', 'Software development experience in Java.', 'Lead projects related to data movement and transformation from design through development.Provide seamless support for integrating Looker modeled data in data pipelines and data workflows.Exemplify technical excellence in collaborative planning, implementation, and review of code.Drive technical discussions regarding application architecture in support of high quality and maintainability of complex systems.Empathize with customers and your peers.', '6 years of professional software development experience or 3 years with a  relevant advanced degree.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with data modeling. ', 'Advanced degree in engineering, computer science or other technical related field.', "The Model Development Team is responsible for the Data Modeling Language (LookML) which powers the entire data platform and in-database transformations. In this role, you will be a back-end engineer that helps our users leverage database technologies and integrate with ETL tools. As a Software Engineer, you'll be passionate about programming languages, data pipelines, and seek to empower the next generation of business intelligence, data analytics, and applications."]

', 'Deep understanding of a server side programming language (Java, .Net, Python or PHP preferred).', 'Wayfair’s Ad Tech & Customer Intelligence Engineering team builds solutions that let Wayfair communicate with new and existing customers effectively across advertising, email, and onsite touchpoints. We are using cutting edge intelligent systems, big data at scale, and world class ad tech to drive phenomenal growth in a multi-billion dollar business. ', 'Proficient in cross-functional consensus building and influencing without authority.', 'Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', 'Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.', "What You'll Do", 'What You’ll Need', " Storefront: Shopping for your home can be overwhelming. Wayfair is an extreme case - it's visited by two million people daily, shopping across more than 14 million products. Our software engineering teams work to make an extremely complex process seamless for our customers. Shopping for your home should be exciting, and we want every customer to come away feeling like they've found the perfect item for them. ", 'Provide high quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.', ' Wayfair’s Ad Tech & Customer Intelligence Engineering team builds solutions that let Wayfair communicate with new and existing customers effectively across advertising, email, and onsite touchpoints. This team is at the intersection of product, marketing, data science, and technology which allows us to be a leader in the Ad Technology space. We are using cutting edge intelligent systems, big data at scale, and world class ad tech to drive phenomenal growth in a multi-billion dollar business.  The Supply Chain teams are responsible for all of the systems related to the physical movement of Wayfair products. Everything from warehousing, order tracking, inventory forecasting to routing systems and final mile delivery. This group is essential to ensuring customers are provided with the best service experience in e-commerce. The majority of Wayfair’s business is built on repeat customers and it is important for them to have a smooth delivery experience to ensure they keep them coming back.  The Sales, Service and Enterprise platforms are focused on building and improving software that directly impacts customers, customer service agents, sales associates, Finance, Talent Management and external vendors. Our engineers are responsible for all the tools and processes to support these business-critical operations of Wayfair, along with supporting the continued enhancement and scaling capabilities of these systems. Engineers use data, user-centric design, machine learning, and Agile to achieve operational excellence, fueling company growth.  ', 'Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of Wayfair engineering. ', 'Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.', ' Provide high quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy. Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of Wayfair engineering.  See your work as it powers improved customer understanding / experience or enables new features and functionality in our ad tech stack.  Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks. Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others. Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders. ', ' A BS in Computer Science, Information Systems, other Engineering discipline or Data Science, with five (5) years’ experience in software development, or alternatively an MS with two (2) years of experience. Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale. ['', 'What you will have : ', 'Plus if you have: ', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'Previous experience in the advertising domain', 'Develop highly scalable services to process millions of requests per day and solve complex software systems problems by leveraging state-of-the-art technology.', 'We are a highly motivated group of engineers and data scientists, working in an agile group to solve sophisticated and high impact problems. We serve billions of ad requests every month with our high-performance ad servers. We build smart data systems that ingest, model and analyze massive flow of data from online and offline user activity. We use cutting edge machine learning, data mining and optimization algorithms to analyze data. Above all, we are passionate about delivering experiences that our customers and advertisers love. ', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being\xa0human-led\xa0is our true disruption.\xa0', 'Strong inclination towards exploring and learning new technologies.', "7+ years’ experience in internet-scale distributed technologies (e.g. Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, and similar technologies ) and/or Big Data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Storm and similar technologies)Relevant experience with relational / non-relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, etc)Strong background in algorithms and data structuresExpertise in one or more programming languages (e.g. Java, Scala, etc).Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience", 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Gain exposure to various technologies used in Advertising and E-commerce platforms.', 'Advanced knowledge of performance, scalability, and system architecture with an eye toward avoiding and reducing technical debt.', 'Develop highly scalable services to process millions of requests per day and solve complex software systems problems by leveraging state-of-the-art technology.Gain exposure to various technologies used in Advertising and E-commerce platforms.Work with the data scientists and product managers to carry out various experiments across different areas of the AdTech platforms to improve customer experience and ad relevance.Drive projects of high visibility across the organization.\xa0', 'We’re virtual\xa0', 'Strong background in algorithms and data structures', 'Expertise in one or more programming languages (e.g. Java, Scala, etc).', 'Hands-on experience developing in a service-oriented architecture for a Linux environment', 'Previous experience in the advertising domainAdvanced knowledge of performance, scalability, and system architecture with an eye toward avoiding and reducing technical debt.Strong inclination towards exploring and learning new technologies.Understanding of machine learningHands-on experience developing in a service-oriented architecture for a Linux environment', 'What you will do: ', '7+ years’ experience in internet-scale distributed technologies (e.g. Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, and similar technologies ) and/or Big Data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Storm and similar technologies)', 'Relevant experience with relational / non-relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, etc)', '\xa0', 'Understanding of machine learning', 'Walmart’s Advertising Technology group enables the connection between supplier brands and retail shoppers at an unprecedented scale. As primary stewards of our brand promise, “Save Money. Live Better,” we work alongside some of the most talented people in the world to engage with the more than 150M households who shop with us. This position is part of the Sponsored Products team in the Advertising Technology organization. Walmart is investing in building a world-class advertising platform and the Sponsored Products team is responsible for building performance advertising products that drive discovery, sales, and profit. The team operates an end to end advertising platform that includes the ad server that serves hundreds of millions of impressions each day, sophisticated ad matching algorithms, real-time measurement, self-service buying interface for end to end campaign management. ', 'Work with the data scientists and product managers to carry out various experiments across different areas of the AdTech platforms to improve customer experience and ad relevance.', 'Being\xa0human-led\xa0is our true disruption.', "Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience", ' ', 'Drive projects of high visibility across the organization.\xa0']

job_title: Software Engineer (.NET Core or NodeJS / Cloud)

job_text: ['Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasetsUse your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problemsDesign, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization PlatformParticipate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Participate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasets', 'Use your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problems', 'External Title:', 'As a Data Scientist in our Decision Sciences R&D organization, you will be responsible for researching and building machine learning, natural language processing, and recommender system applications to extend\xa0Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform. Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform analyzes anonymized data at Internet scale and evaluates more than one trillion advertising opportunities per month in real-time. You will work on real-world problems as part of our highly collaborative R&D team, and your solutions will directly and rapidly impact our business.\xa0This includes analyzing raw source data and derived data,\xa0researching and developing models, algorithms, and applications,\xa0building tools and analyses for new and existing products\xa0and presenting findings.', 'Internal Title:', 'Design, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.', 'Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization Platform', 'External Title: Data Scientist\xa0Internal Title: Decision Science, Scientist\xa0']

['Fast growing and exciting company has an immediate need for a Senior Front End Engineer on a direct hire basis.  In this role, you will work on a small team and focus on building web apps that will have a direct impact on the bottom line.  You must be highly skilled, passionate about your craft, a true software engineer, a dedicated technologist, and understand how your work impacts a small team.  This is a fully remote position, and their work is centered on hiring extremely smart individuals who enjoy good work and collaboration.  Highly competitive base salaries, equity, full benefits. ['', 'Hillrom’s Digital Health software solutions analyze real-time clinical data from point-of-care devices to identify risk and communicate hospital defined actions to healthcare providers. As part of this high growth initiative, the Lead Software Engineer\xa0applies expert and diversified knowledge of engineering principles and practices in a broad area of assignments. Makes decisions independently on technical problems and methods and contributes to the organization resolving important and/or complex challenges. The knowledge and expertise required for this level usually result from demonstrated progressive experience. May provide direction or guidance to other technical level staff.', 'At Hillrom, we bring passion, dedication and innovation to work.\xa0We offer employees challenging work experiences, collaborative team environments, and comprehensive benefits.\xa0However, the strongest reason to work at Hillrom is the opportunity to\xa0make a true difference in peoples’ lives by enhancing outcomes for patients and their caregivers.\xa0', 'Position Summary']

job_title: Junior Software Engineer with Security Clearance
job_text: ['', ' Experience with Linux', " Abilityto obtain and retain a government security clearance at the level to perform the job Minimum Education and Experience: * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Electrical Engineering from an accredited university and 0-2 years of experience Preferred Qualifications: * TS/SCI with Poly highly desired * The ability to rapidly prototype systems is desired * GPA 3.0 and above * Experience in government contractor working similar customer projects * Internship experience with similar products, technologies and/or industry * Knowledge of RF Communications and Digital Signal Processing * Experience with detection, demodulation and processing of modern RF communications systems * Knowledge of Software Defined Radio (SDR) frameworks and standards such as Software Communications Architecture (SCA), GNU Radio, REDHAWK and X-Midas What We Can Offer You: - We've been named a Best Place to Work by the Washington Post. - Our employees value the flexibility at CACI that allows them to balance quality work and their personal lives. - We offer competitive benefits and learning and development opportunities. - We are mission-oriented and ever vigilant in aligning our solutions with the nation's highest priorities. - For over 55 years, the principles of CACI's unique, character-based culture have been the driving force behind our success. Job Location US-Dulles-VA-VIRGINIA SUBURBAN CACI employs a diverse range of talent to create an environment that fuels innovation and fosters continuous improvement and success. At CACI, you will have the opportunity to make an immediate impact by providing information solutions and services in support of national security missions and government transformation for Intelligence, Defense, and Federal Civilian customers. CACI is proud to provide dynamic careers for employees worldwide. CACI is an Equal Opportunity Employer - Females/Minorities/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.", ' Apply and perform systems analysis, modeling and simulation of processing systems and demonstrate systems via simulated and/or real data input', ' Travel to other CACI Locations or Customer Sites as necessary', ' Perform functional analysis, performance analysis and synthesis of protocol implementations (including physical transmission convergence and higher layer) for Radio and Core Access Technologies', ' Knowledge of Microsoft software applications and other software applications as required', ' Knowledge of common software, platforms, systems to include:', ' Ability to leverage open source programs, rapid integration methods, web interfaces and services implementation, XML implementation methods', ' Perform other duties as required Minimum Qualifications: Skills and Knowledge: * Knowledge of Object-Oriented (OO) Design and Analysis', ' Object oriented architecture, programming and programming methods required', ' Bash/shell scripting, MongoDB, REST', ' Excellent communication and interpersonal skills', ' Conceptualize, define, design and prototype systems engineering solutions', ' C, C++, Java, Python, Eclipse RCP, Linux, HTML5, JavaScript']

['Design, build, deploy, maintain, monitor, tune, and upgrade the Linux based infrastructure used to support development, test, and production systems without downtimeLeverage both new and existing technologies to automate deployment and configurationProvide technical leadership and guidance for multiple assignments/projects simultaneouslyMaintain personal accountability for getting things done on time and with quality resultsDevelop solid relationships with global Support, Operations, QA, and Development teamsMaintain awareness of current technologies and trends and assimilate new technology into the company work environmentWork as part of cross-functional teams to create, maintain, and implement policy, process and best practiceServe as an emergency escalation point for critical system and application failureResponsible for a 24x7 on-call rotation to support immediate response to critical system issues', 'The systems that the Global Cloud Operations team support are critical to the ongoing success of BluJay Solutions, so we are committed to hiring the best and providing them the tools and knowledge to succeed. Although we embrace a relaxed work environment combined you’ll need to be willing to ask questions, ready to learn (and to teach), and driven to succeed. Transforming supply chain logistics with the BluJay Global Trade Network, we enable customers to unlock the power of more than 40,000 universally connected partners.', 'Occasional international travel required', 'Experience supporting Java-based applications, including JVM tuning, in a production environment', 'Experience with Public and Private cloud platforms', 'Position Qualification Summary', 'Maintain awareness of current technologies and trends and assimilate new technology into the company work environment', 'Leverage both new and existing technologies to automate deployment and configuration', 'BS or BA in Information Systems, Computer Science, or related fieldAdvanced CentOS / RedHat / Oracle Linux AdministrationStrong problem-solving skills5-7 years Designing and Architecting enterprise system landscapesExperience with Public and Private cloud platformsExperience with VMWare administrationExperience with SAN storage technologies (Nimble, NetApp, and IBM)Mentor members of the Linux Systems Administration TeamExperience with configuration management systems and concepts (Terraform, Chef etc.)Experience with Shell scripting or other scripting or programming language (Python, Perl, Ruby, PHP, c, Java, TCL, …)Experience supporting Java-based applications, including JVM tuning, in a production environmentZenoss, Zabbix, OpsGenie, or other enterprise monitoring systemOccasional international travel required', 'Mentor members of the Linux Systems Administration Team', 'BluJay Solutions Linux Engineer is responsible for designing and implementing the infrastructure that powers our web-based applications for the supply chain industry.\xa0Our Systems Admins work with both co-located and public cloud data centers. Our applications utilize a variety of open source and commercial middleware and platform applications, and our internal infrastructure leverages a similar variety of configuration and orchestration tools. This means our System Admins learn and apply skills for a variety of different architectures and designs.\xa0We utilize a number of industry leading technologies including Cisco UCS, VMWare, NetApp, Nimble, and Oracle to support BluJay applications.', 'Experience with SAN storage technologies (Nimble, NetApp, and IBM)', 'Qualifications', '5-7 years Designing and Architecting enterprise system landscapes', '\xa0', 'Strong problem-solving skills', 'Experience with configuration management systems and concepts (Terraform, Chef etc.)', 'Zenoss, Zabbix, OpsGenie, or other enterprise monitoring system', 'Advanced CentOS / RedHat / Oracle Linux Administration']

job_title: Staff Data Engineer - World Wide Publishing Technology

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' You work well with non-engineers. You can lead a conversation in a room with designers, engineers, and product managers. ', 'About You', ' You work backward, starting from the user. You care about creating usable, useful software that solves real problems and brings delight to users. ', ' Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills. ', 'Other Locations', ' Strong grasp of Unix-like operating systems ', ' Experience building multi-tenant, virtualized infrastructure a strong plus. ', 'Organization', ' You work backward, starting from the user. You care about creating usable, useful software that solves real problems and brings delight to users.  You have solid communication skills. You can clearly explain complex technical concepts.  You work well with non-engineers. You can lead a conversation in a room with designers, engineers, and product managers.  You are comfortable with ambiguity. You have a strong sense of ownership, and are able to drive development of new projects and features to completion.  You are comfortable working at all levels of the stack. ', ' BS in Computer Science, or equivalent experience ', 'Location', ' Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, operating systems, and distributed systems fundamentals. Working familiarity with networking protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP) and standard network architectures. ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Oracle is an Affirmative Action-Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.', ' 3+ years of experience shipping services software ', 'Job', ' Experience in a start-up environment ', ' MS in Computer Science  Experience in a start-up environment  Experience delivering and operating large scale, highly available distributed systems.  Strong grasp of Unix-like operating systems  Experience building multi-tenant, virtualized infrastructure a strong plus. ', ' You have solid communication skills. You can clearly explain complex technical concepts. ', ' You are comfortable with ambiguity. You have a strong sense of ownership, and are able to drive development of new projects and features to completion. ', ' BS in Computer Science, or equivalent experience  3+ years of experience shipping services software  Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, operating systems, and distributed systems fundamentals. Working familiarity with networking protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP) and standard network architectures.  Strong understanding of databases, NoSQL systems, storage and distributed persistence technologies.  Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills. ', ' MS in Computer Science ', ' Strong understanding of databases, NoSQL systems, storage and distributed persistence technologies. ', ' You are comfortable working at all levels of the stack. ', 'Job Type', ' Experience delivering and operating large scale, highly available distributed systems. ']

job_title: DB Software Engineer, flex US locations
job_text: ['', '· Developing tools in Go/Python/Java to automate the operation (server and database provisioning, backups, fail-overs, monitoring, etc.)\xa0\xa0 of our database infrastructure to reduce possibilities for manual error and increase team efficiency.', 'Do you want to work on databases that process hundreds of billions of transactions per month?\xa0', '· Partner with internal development teams on datastore selection, schema design, query optimization, Tuning opportunities and\xa0\xa0 monitor database capacity.', '· Strong engineering mind set and dev-ops mentality', 'View our\xa0privacy policy and accessibility info', 'You’ll be involved in solving world class one of a kind issues and provide consulting to application teams on how to scale their application better.', '· Knowledge of handling distributed systems.', '· Proficiency using Go and/or Java to automate system-level tasks', 'Do you strive to build database systems that are highly reliable, performant, and easy to operate using the automation you write?\xa0', 'Your Opportunity: ', '· Experience operating databases hosted on cloud platforms', '· Investigating database tuning settings and query changes needed to improve performance, availability, and reliability.', 'As a part of the Database team, you’ll be working with engineers who build and support our database environment which hosts thousands of\xa0 Oracle databases along with MySQL and NoSQL databases. NoSQL database platforms includes MongoDB, Couchbase, Cassandra, Foundation-DB for site facing applications along with TimesTen for Oracle Caching', 'What You’ll Do', '· Proficiency using Perl/Python', 'About the Team:', '· Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible, Salt, Puppet or other', '· Experience using Kubernetes managed databases', 'eBay Inc. is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, and disability, or other legally protected status.\xa0 If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at\xa0talent@ebay.com.\xa0 We will make every effort to respond to your request for disability assistance as soon as possible.', 'Your Qualifications ', 'accessibility info', 'Nice-to-have:', '· 4+ years of experience supporting database systems or in system administration roles.', '· Assist in the creation, administration, and monitoring of Oracle, MySql and other NoSQL platforms.', 'We believe in automation to increase reliability and reduce toil, so you’ll have the opportunity to use your programming skills and\xa0out-of-the-box thinking to create tools that automate remediation work flows not only on Oracle but other different platforms and set up\xa0advanced database monitoring.\xa0', 'Must-have:', 'If you find these challenges exciting, we encourage you to apply.\xa0', '· Experience with Docker container deployments and administration', '· Build systems that help teams migrate from our database platform from VMs to Containerized environments.', '· Real-world experience administering Oracle and MySQL and at least one industry popular nosql database in production.', 'eBay i', 'This is an opportunity to work from home or a remote office in Portland, New York, Philadelphia or Austin.', 'Core Technology (CT) is a global team responsible for the end-to-end eBay technology platform. This platform runs our entire infrastructure and all the services that come together to form ebay.com.', 'This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to browse the site, you agree to our\xa0use of cookies', 'For more information see:\xa0 EEO is the Law Poster and EEO is the Law Poster Supplement', 'location flexible in US']

The categories of Personal Information that we may collect include your name, government-issued identification number(s), email address, mailing address, other contact information, emergency contact information, employment history, educational history, criminal record, and demographic information.\xa0We collect and use those categories of Personal Information about you for human resources and other business management purposes, including identifying and evaluating you as a candidate for potential or future employment or future contract positions, recordkeeping in relation to recruiting and hiring, conducting criminal background checks as permitted by law, conducting analytics, and ensuring compliance with applicable legal requirements and Company policies.', 'Providing high quality support to customers, prospects, management and peers', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:', 'Gain well rounded experience: Alarm.com offers a diverse and dynamic environment where you will get the chance to work directly with executives and develop expertise across multiple areas of the business.', 'The Cloud Systems Engineer’s primary job responsibilities will include:', 'For more information, please visit\xa0www.alarm.com.', 'Work with the latest technologies:', '7+ years relevant work experience in private / public cloud, SAN and networking', 'Experience supporting multi-site and hot-hot architectures', 'Make an immediate impact: ', 'WHY WORK FOR ALARM.COM?', 'Tracking, controlling, and reporting status of system conditions, software, documentation, and infrastructure changes to management', 'COMPANY INFO', 'Focus on fun: ', 'Alarm.com is an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Collaborate with outstanding people: We hire only the best. We make the Smart Home broadly accessible by enabling easy automation and control across a range of connected devices through our single, intuitive user interface.\xa0Alarm.com earned the Top Workplace™ award for its employee culture and the meaningful work we do every day to develop and bring to market new technology that will make millions of people safer and help them use energy more efficiently. We’re seeking those who are passionate about creating change through technology and who want to make a lasting impact on the world around them.\xa0Our solutions are exclusively distributed through a network of authorized service providers.', 'Basic understanding of Linux operating systems is desirable.', 'Implementing and maintaining configuration and automation frameworks to prevent drift and sustain company growth', 'Experience implementing and updating configuration management frameworks and applications: Ansible, Puppet, Chef, etc.', 'Designing, implementing and automating cloud agnostic solutions for high availability / scalability and performance.', 'Working knowledge of hyper-converged infrastructure', 'COMPANY BENEFITS', 'Working knowledge of Windows Server operating systems is a must', 'Designing, implementing and automating cloud agnostic solutions for high availability / scalability and performance.Monitoring, maintaining and updating hardened configurations and baselinesImplementing availability and performance monitoring frameworksImplementing and testing system level High Availability and Disaster Recovery plansTracking, controlling, and reporting status of system conditions, software, documentation, and infrastructure changes to managementTroubleshoot and remediate issues across the infrastructure and create plans to prevent the same problem in the futureImplementing and maintaining configuration and automation frameworks to prevent drift and sustain company growthDevelop and maintain automation scripts to simplify and quicken deployments and modifications.Providing high quality support to customers, prospects, management and peersDevelop and implementing capacity planning methodologies and operational reporting']

['', 'Able to lead by example\xa0', 'Able to communicate complex, technical concepts to a wide range of stakeholders with varying perspectives and technical expertise', 'There’s no such thing as the perfect candidate. ', 'As the Principal Software Engineer, you will…', 'As a Principal Software Engineer, you will be responsible for leading the implementation and adoption of Kubernetes as a service across Acquia. You will work with your fellow Platform engineers, Product Engineering, Operations, and Customer Success teams to identify opportunities to harness the power of containerized infrastructure and then propose and lead the implementation with your team.', 'Support engineering teams to design and implement application prototypes, using modern application development practices and open source emerging technologies, covering domains like microservices, API management, web-scale architectures\xa0', 'Debug technical issues inside a very deep and complex technical stack involving containers, microservices, AWS services across the different layers of a web stack (Edge, Data, etc.)', 'Contribute as part of a larger team to maintain a deep understanding of system functionality and architecture, with a primary focus on the operational aspects of the service (availability, performance, change management, emergency response, capacity planning, etc)\xa0', 'Over 8 years of experience in design and Software Development Background and over 4 years of experience in working with Containers and Cloud-Native Development\xa0', 'Extra credit if you have...', 'Able to work in an agile DevOps methodology collaborating and enabling all around them', 'The Principal Software Engineer is an integral member of the Acquia technology team and ensures that the company’s software products are well engineered, operable, maintainable, and aligned with the strategy and vision of the business.\xa0', 'Lead solutions for modernizing Acquia infrastructure and drive adoption of Kubernetes and Cloud-Native Technologies\xa0', 'Knowledge of CI/CD tools like Jenkins (preferred), Bamboo, Gitlab\xa0', 'Strong experience in helm-package manager, cluster-autoscaler, cert-manager, and logging-operator.', 'Headquartered in Boston, we have been named as one of North America’s fastest growing software companies as reported by Deloitte and Inc. Magazine, and have been rated a leader by the analyst community and named one of the Best Places to Work by the Boston Business Journal. We are Acquia. We are building for the future of the web, and we want you to be a part of it.', 'Thank you for considering Acquia for your next career move, and we look forward to receiving your application. There’s no such thing as the perfect candidate. So, we’re not looking for someone who matches all of our criteria; we’re looking for someone with the potential to grow outward and upward. Regardless of how much of the criteria you meet, you should apply!', 'AWS Certification\xa0', 'Strong knowledge on the network layers and SSL/TLS basics', 'Over 8 years of experience in design and Experience in architecting/designing software products to drive data & analytic efforts using Java/python as the programming language. Experience/Knowledge of building applications using Public/Private cloud infrastructure Frameworks: Micro Service, Spring boot, Spring Cloud, Spring Integration, Hibernate Experience building event-driven architecture patterns using eventing/streaming frameworks like JMS, Kafka and Kinesis Database - Oracle, No SQL DB like MongoDB ", 'Experience/Knowledge of building applications using Public/Private cloud infrastructure', 'Responsibilities', 'Elementary networking skills, switching, routing, Firewalls, load balancing.', 'AWS Knowledge - Lambda, API Gateway, EC2, Step Function, AppSync, Dynamo DB, Cloudwatch, EKS.', 'Trains and develops other engineers.', 'Identify and utilize new and emerging technologies to define comprehensive, sustainable, extensible architecture to meet defined business needs, including cloud or on-premises solutions', 'Partners with other internal teams and peers in the department to ensure solutions meet the holistic needs of various stakeholders.', " Design and implement a centralized Unstructured data management ecosystem to collect, analyze, store, protect and govern Unstructured data for the enterprise. Build a scalable platform for the evolving needs to support Company's Unstructured Data Strategy. Identify and utilize new and emerging technologies to define comprehensive, sustainable, extensible architecture to meet defined business needs, including cloud or on-premises solutions Design and establish governance and data management frameworks for Unstructured data. Provide recommendations on implementation of organization wide processes and procedures for the management of data risk especially if the solution is based on a public cloud services. Coordinate with Network and Infrastructure teams to design systems that can scale to the operational needs of handling large volumes of Unstructured data Define strategies to Investigate, evaluate, interpret and classify Unstructured data in order to define and clarify information structures which describe the relationships between the Unstructured content and its associated metadata. Leverages and uses best practices to develop technical solutions used for handling of Unstructured data. Supports Innovation; regularly provides new ideas to help people, process, and technology that interact with data ecosystem. Develop and builds frameworks/prototypes that integrate Unstructured data and advanced analytics to make better business decisions. Supports a clear communication strategy that keeps all relevant stakeholders informed and provides an opportunity to influence the direction of the work Trains and develops other engineers. "]

title: Staff Software EngineerLocation: Santa Clara, CA, USA (HQ)CompanyWork matters. job_title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer | Series B ($38m) AI Data Startup
job_text: ['', 'Strong understanding of Javascript with an interest in using Typescript, NodeJS', "8+ years' experience in a fast-paced startup environmentStrong understanding of Javascript with an interest in using Typescript, NodeJSStrong experience in cloud-native environments, particularly AWS,\xa0with Kubernetes and Docker\xa0- GCP experience also welcomedBackend experience in Go, Java, NodeJSDetailed experience taking charge of end-to-end successful projects and delivery to end-users at scaleExperience managing/scaling SQL databases, orchestrating migrations, and disaster recoveryExperience working with Redux and architecting large single-page applicationsExperience and interest in frontend testingOptimizing data models and database configurations for both ease-of-use and performant response timesBuilding new features and resolvers in our GraphQL API with Node.JSExperience with SQL databasesExperience optimizing web trafficExperience with RabbitMQ (or other message broker) and RedisExperience constructing and monitoring ETL pipelinesExperience with Logstash / Elasticsearch", 'Experience working with Redux and architecting large single-page applications', '**This position is open for SF, remote USA, and remote Canada**', 'Strong experience in cloud-native environments, particularly AWS,\xa0with Kubernetes and Docker\xa0- GCP experience also welcomed', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0• Very competitive on compensation, open to discussing\xa0', 'Building new features and resolvers in our GraphQL API with Node.JS', 'Optimizing data models and database configurations for both ease-of-use and performant response times', 'Experience managing/scaling SQL databases, orchestrating migrations, and disaster recovery', 'GraphQL ', 'I am on the market for a Senior Engineer with Technical Leadership skills, startup chops, and interest in scaling platforms with world-class colleagues. The Engineering team is currently growing from 30 to 50 this year, now is the time to get on-board!', 'Typescript, NodeJS', "8+ years' experience in a fast-paced startup environment", 'Detailed experience taking charge of end-to-end successful projects and delivery to end-users at scale', 'On Offer:', 'Kubernetes', 'AWS', 'Backend experience in Go, Java, NodeJS', 'Experience with SQL databases', "Based in San Francisco, my client has raised $38m ($25m during COVID-19) to scale its end-to-end platform that creates training data for AI and ML (via data labeling) - They have already begun to help some of the world's largest tech companies make better sense of their data. They are already working with some of the world's largest companies and are generating significant revenue. ", 'Go, Java, NodeJS', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0• Strong early-stage equity & remote flexibility', "What You'll Bring:", 'Experience with RabbitMQ (or other message broker) and Redis', 'Experience with Logstash / Elasticsearch', 'Javascript', 'Their vision is to become the default software for data scientists to manage data and train neural networks in the same way that GitHub or text editors are defaults for software engineers.', 'Experience optimizing web traffic', 'RabbitMQ ', 'Experience and interest in frontend testing', 'Experience constructing and monitoring ETL pipelines', 'Node.JS', 'Docker\xa0']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A Master’s degree in a Qualified Engineering Field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university plus eighteen (18) years of systems engineering experience\xa0OR', 'At Nyla, we talk about employee investment, not employee costs—a small way we outwardly provide our great people with benefits that cover your overall well-being.\xa0Nyla offers group benefits, 100% paid by Nyla, that include CareFirst medical, dental, and vision coverage. To support your personal goals for overall well-being and health, we provide a healthy living and fitness benefit of up to $500.00 per anniversary year. We believe that an ongoing investment in your professional learning and development is a cornerstone to our success, so we go all-in and provide up to $5,000 per anniversary year to support your growth.\xa0Tuition assistance of up to $5,250 per year. We want to protect you and your future—Nyla provides, at no cost to you, short-term and long-term disability, and life insurance. And, to augment your finances beyond today’s salary, Nyla offers up to 10% employer contribution/match in our retirement plan. Lastly, we understand the importance of recharging and replenishing yourself, so we provide new employees with 4 weeks of Paid Annual Leave and 10 holidays, plus each year you are with the company, you get an extra day off.', 'Providing technical direction for the development, engineering, interfacing, integration, and testing of specific components of complex hardware/software systems to include requirements elicitation, analysis, and functional allocation, conducting systems requirements reviews, developing concepts of\xa0operation and interface standards, developing system architectures, and performing technical/non-technical assessment and management as well as end-to-end flow analysis\xa0Leading, providing technical supervision, and guiding mid-level engineering staff', 'Nyla’s culture is built on the understanding that together, with our collective energy, talent, and fierce determination, we never stop believing and building the impossible. We are life-long learners, ever-curious, and not afraid to dream. To learn more about Nyla’s culture and exceptionalism, check out our Culture Deck here.', 'We are pursuing five (5) individual(s) for the position of Principal Systems Engineer.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer--but we are more than that – We are open-minded, and care only about your capability, your drive, and your desire and determination to contribute your gifts and talents fully.', 'Team Nyla shows up every day with the intention to be awesome—proactively work to accurately interpret and fully understand our client’s challenges and add your value to solving those challenges. Knowing the mission, context, and end-users is how we deliver optimal, creative, and innovative technological solutions. We design our systems with precision, logic, and adaptability, solving the technical and engineering needs of today with an eye on scaling for tomorrow. We endeavor to meet the highest standards of personal conduct and act as a trusted-provider for our clients--this is how we develop and maintain our enduring relationships with\xa0customers and business partners.\xa0', 'Nyla Technology Solutions is a women-owned small business with a bold approach and forward-thinking vision. Headquartered in the heart of Baltimore, Nyla delivers exceptional software systems engineering services for the U.S. Government. Our customers like how we tackle their toughest problems., and so Nyla is adding people who have a passion for doing fun, impactful work. If you are a person who welcomes opportunities to apply your skills in new ways, Nyla has challenges for you. We seek out people with agile, diverse mindsets who are looking for a place to grow—professionally and personally. We create opportunities for you to share your knowledge and experience with the Team, and learn from others via training, mentoring, and movement across the many contracts Nyla supports. Nyla endeavors to give back to our community—lending our energy and talents to support local area organizations helping people in need. At Nyla, you will have a place to grow, get, and give where you are passionate.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A PhD in a Qualified Engineering Field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university plus eighteen (18) years of systems engineering experience.', 'Providing technical direction for the development, engineering, interfacing, integration, and testing of specific components of complex hardware/software systems to include requirements elicitation, analysis, and functional allocation, conducting systems requirements reviews, developing concepts of\xa0operation and interface standards, developing system architectures, and performing technical/non-technical assessment and management as well as end-to-end flow analysis\xa0Leading, providing technical supervision, and guiding mid-level engineering staff\xa0', 'uniquely Nyla', 'We are pursuing five (5) individual(s) for the position of Principal Systems Engineer.\xa0Below is the position overview, the experience needs, and technical qualifications.\xa0If the position sounds like a good fit, and you have a track record of delivering solid technical results and developing trusted customer relationships, please consider the following opportunity:', 'Progress Through Our People', 'here.', 'How We Show Up Every Day', 'here', 'We Have the Total Package | Healthy Lifestyle, Learning, Health and Wellness, Financial Wellness, Financial Protection', 'We Have the Total Package | Healthy Lifestyle, Learning, Health and Wellness, Financial Wellness, Financial Protection\xa0', '\xa0To learn more about our exceptional benefits packages click here.', '\xa0', 'We Have the Total Package | Healthy Lifestyle, Learning, Health and Wellness, Financial Wellness, Financial Protection\xa0From the start, Nyla is different. We never embraced the idea of a workplace and policies stuck in the industrial age--we treat our employees valued contributors, not commodities.\xa0At Nyla, we strive to understand the needs of our workforce and are committed to continuously evolving practices and policies, making adjustments that meaningfully address the changing needs and desires of our workforce.', 'If you have the unique experience and expertise we are seeking, along with the desire and determination to invest your time and energy as a part of Nyla’s Team, we will provide you with a first-class compensation package along with our uniquely Nyla benefits.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A Bachelor’s degree in a Qualified Engineering Field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university plus twenty (20) years of systems engineering experience OR High School Diploma or GED plus four additional (4) years of general systems engineering experience (any Process Area). OR', 'Qualifications: ', '\xa0We are an equal opportunity employer--but we are more than that – We are open-minded, and care only about your capability, your drive, and your desire and determination to contribute your gifts and talents fully.', 'Nyla Technology Solutions', 'investment,']

['', 'As a Senior software engineer on the e-commerce ERP(Enterprise Resource Planning) Integrations team, you will work on a platform responsible for streaming transactional and master date e-commerce events to downstream ERP systems.', '•You have acute attention to detail and dedication to quality.\xa0', '•You have excellent communication and teamwork skills.\xa0', 'Location:New York, NY', '•You have a love for clean, elegant code. You have an understanding of agile, lean, and DevOps principles.\xa0', '•Ability to say NO, respectfully challenge ideas, and call out potential trade-offs.', '•Write understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability and scalability.\xa0', '•Passionate about technology, new ideas, and always willing to learn new things.\xa0', '•Collaborate with other engineers by taking part in pair programming, whiteboarding solutions, team discussions to work as a team rather than working in isolation.\xa0', '•Backend development with a variety of languages including but not limited to Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Kotlin, etc.\xa0', '•Become a domain expert in e-commerce by working closely with our product managers and stakeholders.\xa0', '•Experience with at least one database engine (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.) •Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases', 'Experience Level: 7+ years', 'EEO: This company is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.', '•Promote iterative development, using best practices such as feature toggles, CI/CD, canary releases, test automation, logging, and monitoring to ensure confidence in our release process\xa0', '•Promote constant refactoring while developing features or touching existing code to keep the codebase as clean as possible.\xa0', 'Job Description:', '•Partner with our SRE and infrastructure teams to scale and monitor our services.', '•Active engagement in technical discussions during architecture meetings, code reviews, and design docs to help promote a culture of learning and constant improvement.\xa0', 'JobTitle: Senior Software Engineer', '•Defend the integrity of the codebase, never compromising on code quality.\xa0', '•You have an understanding of testing and CI/CD. Solid understanding of object-oriented and/or functional programming design principles.\xa0', '•Help to evolve our system, organically without over-engineering, to promote simplicity, and working software.\xa0', '•Experience with two or more aspects of our tech stack (Python, Kotlin, Javascript/TypeScript, Postgres, AWS, GraphQL, DataDog, Docker, Kubernetes).\xa0', '•Actively maintain and build a culture of learning, respect, transparency, and trust.\xa0', 'EEO:', 'Position type: Contract', '•Capacity to work in high growth, fast-paced environments, and can adapt to change.\xa0', '•You have an expert understanding of industry best practices and standards.\xa0', 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:\xa0', '•6+ years of software development experience in development.\xa0', 'Key Tasks include:', '•Familiar with at least one backend framework like Django, Rails, Spring, or similar.\xa0', 'Required:\xa0']

['', 'You have 5+ years of experience in data science in the life science/healthcare industry.', 'You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.', 'You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.', 'You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.', 'You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You have 5+ years of experience in data science in the life science/healthcare industry.You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science.\xa0You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You will help to radically lower drug prices and expand access, by identifying novel opportunities for partnerships and delivery across the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs from pharma companies to patients. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines through the unification, comprehension, and modelling of human health and disease across data sources. You will drive the adoption of machine learning for the improvement of human health in building a radically different, digital-native and data-first life sciences company, where we bootstrap our way to rapid increases in scale and efficacy across functions. You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a novel, modern paradigm in drug development.', 'You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science.\xa0', 'You will map and optimize the complex interrelationships of pharma companies, drug manufacturers, pharmacy benefit managers, payors, and patients to drive EQRx’s strategy to dramatically lower drug prices while promoting equity and access. You will use novel computational techniques to design, refine, and select novel drug candidates.\xa0 Using the tools of modern data science and machine learning, you will help to build a data driven, end-to-end digital native life sciences company, enabling our core mission of rapid, equal, and equitable access to medicines.\xa0', "The Impact You'll Have", 'You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.', '\xa0', 'Your Superpowers', 'You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.', 'You will integrate disparate EHR, clinical, claims, and other medical data sources, extracting consistent information across ontologies, and deriving insights from disparate data sources to allow experts to rapidly understand the meaning, applicability, and extensibility of results from observational and randomized clinical experimentation. You will build ML tools for anomaly-tracking to enable rapid, more effective clinical trialing and the integration of data sources throughout the life sciences.\xa0 You will model the trajectory of disease across patient populations to identify key opportunities and indications and to rapidly test and develop candidate medicines.']

Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions for cloud based data stores, which include the use of relational, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests  Identify meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', ' Excellent technical documentation and writing skills ', 'Your Mission', 'Your Competencies', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field ', ' Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS) ', ' Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions for cloud based data stores, which include the use of relational, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests ', ' Using a panoply of database technologies, relational and non-relational, including MSSQL/Oracle, Redshift, Snowflake, Athena, Redis, Hadoop ', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field  Minimum 5 years of experience working in data engineering and or data science ', ' Medidata Solutions, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. ["We're looking for a senior software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. They're working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay active.Our companies look for senior software engineers proficient in Python or Java. The ideal candidate is motivated by working on complex technical problems and curious about the world around them. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.To apply to the network, we'll ask you to fill out a 60-second web form. It's absolutely free.If accepted, you'll hear directly from founders, hiring managers, and other key decision makers starting the following Monday. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer. To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.--- ", 'Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.']

['Stay current with the latest research and technology and communicate your knowledge throughout the enterprise ', 'Hands-on experience in distributed training of deep architectures: multi-GPU, multi-node, synchronous and asynchronous ', 'Preferred Qualifications: ', 'Our team is responsible for enabling a wide variety of Bosch engineering teams to make use of advancements in AI through centralized services that involve streaming data from connected services to building and deploying state-of-art AI solutions. ['', '    Experience with Rapid', '    Drive engineering best practices and quality', 'Insights are a groundbreaking new way for clients to approach their workflow in the terminal. Instead of memorizing many different mnemonics and functions, clients have the ability to surface related, and potentially hard to discover, content where and when they need it within their day-to-day workflow in platforms such as IB, Mobile, and Launchpad.  Clients have the opportunity to easily and swiftly dive further for more context to make critical financial decisions.', '    Strong communication & interpersonal skills (verbal & written)    Strong ability to understand business requests and convert into technical deliverables    Strong architecture and design skills    Strong C++ and/or Python experience    BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related technology field', 'We are looking for a strong full stack engineer to help architect and scale IPaaS. A key challenge of IPaaS is performing calculations across many different data sets within several milliseconds for client interactions. The individual would also be heavily involved with collaborating with our 2 sister teams, working with business and stakeholders to define both client and non-client facing features, and mentor individuals on the team or sister teams. IPaaS currently has 40+ types of microservices written primarily in C++ and Python installed on Full Managed Linux(FML) machines. Our team strongly believes in adhering to the best industry practices, innovating impactful solutions, and continuous deployment to PROD.', '    Experience with Streaming technologies (BMS Kafka, BMQ, RabbitMQ)', '    Experience working in an "Agile" environment (i.e. Scrum, Kanban, PI)', '    Experience with DPKG, JaaS, and other DevX/SRE tooling', '    BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related technology field', '    Strong ability to understand business requests and convert into technical deliverables', '    Experience working in a Linux environment', '    Mentor the team and sister teams', '    Identify bottlenecks and design strategies to address', '    Strong architecture and design skills', '    Collaborate within the team, with sister teams, with Insights Product, and with external partners    Take ownership of the technical direction    Drive engineering best practices and quality    Mentor the team and sister teams    Identify bottlenecks and design strategies to address', '    Strong C++ and/or Python experience', "If this sounds like something you would be passionate about, please apply! We'll get in touch with you to let you know what the next steps are. ", 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '    Strong communication & interpersonal skills (verbal & written)', "The Insights organization's mission is to make discovering the breadth and depth of impactful financial data available easier and quicker for finance professionals. IPaaS (Insights Platform As A Service) offers suggestions (known as insights) based on the context of the client's current workflow. An insight is a carefully crafted auto-generated short sentence. Similar to a well-written news headline, an insight communicates the bottom line without the need to read the whole story. Insights often come with clickable links, abstract text, and other metadata to provide even more information, analogous to reading the full body of a news story.", "The IPaaS Framework team is primarily focused on scaling, stability, and storage of Insights data. Our platform's challenge is to provide a generic framework which uses the breadth of Bloomberg's financial data to quickly compute insights. Over 75,000 clients, and rapidly growing, access insights data per month in over 10 different UIs across the mobile app, in-panel, and Launchpad. Our ingestion pipeline handles 15 Million+ events per day and the query engine handles over 50K+ requests per day. In the next year, we expect the ingestion pipeline to handle over 50 Million events per day and the query engine, 1M client requests per day.", '    Experience with DPKG, JaaS, and other DevX/SRE tooling    Experience with Streaming technologies (BMS Kafka, BMQ, RabbitMQ)    Experience working in an "Agile" environment (i.e. Scrum, Kanban, PI)    Experience working in a Linux environment    Experience with Rapid', '    Collaborate within the team, with sister teams, with Insights Product, and with external partners', '    Take ownership of the technical direction']

['', 'Doctor on Call – Whenever possible, we want members to start their care with us. Central to this experience is Doctor on Call: unlimited, 24/7 access to a doctor that’s completely free for most members and accessible directly in the website or mobile app. We’re able to resolve around two-thirds of all requests, often averting a more expensive trip to the emergency room or urgent care.', 'Reasonable Accommodation', 'Life At Oscar', 'Broker Platform ', 'Experience understanding our problems and user requirements and translating them into solutions.', 'Pay Transparency Policy', 'Cost Estimates – One of the biggest issues for members is price transparency. It’s difficult to find out how much something in healthcare will cost beforehand. in a different location can result in a difference in costs. We’re building a cost estimates tool for members so they can get accurate price estimates for the service they’re planning on receiving. This will help our members make informed decisions and avoid surprise medical bills.', 'Knowledge Management – Our Concierge Care Guides field thousands of questions every day from our members, ranging from payments to benefits to help with finding a doctor. They essentially have to become experts on everything. We’re creating a platform that automatically surfaces relevant answers based on the member’s inquiries, ensuring the content is specific to the member and their plan and demographics.', 'A passion for fixing healthcare. The current healthcare experience is broken: it’s expensive, confusing, and doesn’t focus enough on patient outcomes. Our goal is to refactor healthcare piece by piece.', 'What We’re Doing', 'Doctor on Call – Whenever possible, we want members to start their care with us. Central to this experience is Doctor on Call: unlimited, 24/7 access to a doctor that’s completely free for most members and accessible directly in the website or mobile app. We’re able to resolve around two-thirds of all requests, often averting a more expensive trip to the emergency room or urgent care.Appointment Scheduling – Finding a doctor and scheduling an appointment shouldn’t require calling up every doctor in the directory. We’ve partnered with select doctors to reserve appointment slots for Oscar members, and it’s just a few clicks for our members to find the right doctor, view their availabilities, and immediately book an appointment.Cost Estimates – One of the biggest issues for members is price transparency. It’s difficult to find out how much something in healthcare will cost beforehand. in a different location can result in a difference in costs. We’re building a cost estimates tool for members so they can get accurate price estimates for the service they’re planning on receiving. This will help our members make informed decisions and avoid surprise medical bills.', "Become the expert on your team's business and technical domains.", "Become the expert on your team's business and technical domains.Lead the planning, execution and release of complex technical projects.Work with partners, product managers, and designers to solve challenging problems.Work with other engineers on the team to improve technology and apply best practices.Implement step-wise technical migrations of our existing applications.Grow the team by attracting, onboarding, and coaching new/junior engineers.", 'Requirements', 'Cost Estimates', 'Appointment Scheduling – Finding a doctor and scheduling an appointment shouldn’t require calling up every doctor in the directory. We’ve partnered with select doctors to reserve appointment slots for Oscar members, and it’s just a few clicks for our members to find the right doctor, view their availabilities, and immediately book an appointment.', 'Lead the planning, execution and release of complex technical projects.', 'Grow the team by attracting, onboarding, and coaching new/junior engineers.', 'Implement step-wise technical migrations of our existing applications.', 'Doctor on Cal', 'Work with partners, product managers, and designers to solve challenging problems.', 'Component Library – Part of what makes Oscar stand out is having visually appealing and easy to understand user experiences. We’ve designed and built a React component library that’s branded and web accessible. Every web application at Oscar, whether external or internal, uses the component library. Read more about it here.', 'An eagerness to collaborate with other engineers, product managers, designers, and operational partners across Oscar. We believe the best ideas emerge when people share different perspectives and work together.', 'Component Library', 'About This Role', 'Knowledge Management – Our Concierge Care Guides field thousands of questions every day from our members, ranging from payments to benefits to help with finding a doctor. They essentially have to become experts on everything. We’re creating a platform that automatically surfaces relevant answers based on the member’s inquiries, ensuring the content is specific to the member and their plan and demographics.Component Library – Part of what makes Oscar stand out is having visually appealing and easy to understand user experiences. We’ve designed and built a React component library that’s branded and web accessible. Every web application at Oscar, whether external or internal, uses the component library. Read more about it here.', '5+ years of professional software engineering experience.A passion for fixing healthcare. The current healthcare experience is broken: it’s expensive, confusing, and doesn’t focus enough on patient outcomes. Our goal is to refactor healthcare piece by piece.An eagerness to collaborate with other engineers, product managers, designers, and operational partners across Oscar. We believe the best ideas emerge when people share different perspectives and work together.Experience understanding our problems and user requirements and translating them into solutions.The ability to architect creative and maintainable applications across our web and mobile clients. We seek the right balance between moving quickly and improving the operability, performance, and scalability of the systems we build.An interest in using the best tool for the job. Our current favorites are React (and React Native), Python, Kafka, Postgres, and gRPC.', 'An interest in using the best tool for the job. Our current favorites are React (and React Native), Python, Kafka, Postgres, and gRPC.', 'The ability to architect creative and maintainable applications across our web and mobile clients.
